title: An Amazing Stay
text: Steve made our stay amazing. He was a big help with getting our room in order and it was lovely working with him. The rooms were very clean and the bedding and bathroom amenities were great quality. The hotel is in a convenient location if you want to explore the city. I will definitely be staying again.

title: Great location & service
text: I was very overwhelmed when I was looking for a hotel and picked Le Soleil.  Let me tell you I'm so glad I did.  This was the perfect location for a lot of main attractions but also some amazing restaurants and bars on the same street.  The staff at the hotel were nothing but lovely.  They helped with all my questions and even provided a list of comedy clubs and restaurants to try.  Would stay here again.

title: Excelente
text: Steve was really great and lovely. The hotel room was spacious and had many amenities. Would recommend coming here for a getaway. It is a also in a very convenient location if your visiting New York, there’s many things to do nearby this hotel

title: Excellent
text: My family and I were in town visiting. We enjoyed our stay here. It was close to time square, and very close to a lot of attractions. Staff here was great as well. We had everything we needed, and was quickly attended to if we needed anything further. Thank you.

title: Holiday
text: Good position of hotel. Subway entry was near and shopping. Rooms was nice and clean. Front desk clerk Steve was helpful and kind. The bed was super comfortable with great pillows. Rooms were very clean. Would recommend to any visitors first time or other travellers.

title: Perfect location
text: Nice rooms and views, Steve at the desk was super helpful. The beds where nice, the room exceeded our expectations with the view of the empire state building. A close walk from most of the sights and the subway. Would recommend to both families and couples.

title: Very nice hotel!
text: Very nice hotel and perfect location. Thank you Shelley for the service and managing our reservation. The hotel is clean and quiet, I recommend to stay in this hotel. It’s the third time we stay here and I completely recommend you to stay here. Very good option in NYC!

title: Amazing location near the time square
text:
The hotel is located a few minutes from the time square, and there is a lot of good restaurants near the hotel.
The room is big and spacious, there is a coffee machine and a small refrigerator in the room, the bed is large and comfortable. 
The receptionist are very kind and take care to us to receive the room soon.

title: Great hotel
text:
Very nice hotel in a central location in Manhattan. The service was courteous, the airport service was reliable, and the bar in the hotel was recommended.
Good restaurants nearby, Timesquare is about 10 minutes away

title: Never Disappoints!
text: I have stayed here multiple times, and the staff is always incredibly warm and helpful. The rooms are larger than many comparably priced hotels in the area, and it is in a fantastic location. The rooms are also incredibly clean, comfortable and well-maintained.

title: Great midtown hotel
text: The hotel staff are friendly yet professional and very helpful. The rooms are extremely clean and facilities are good although breakfast is a bit pricey so we ate out. The gym was clean and not busy. there was always someone around who could help or answer questions which felt nice in a central location. The only thing I didn't like was that the bathroom door didn't close properly so there wasn't great privacy in a room sharing with a teenage son. However, overall the rooms had everything you need including great coffee and were always clean. Location is within walking distance of The Empire State and Time Square plus subway.

title: I expected more and they have caused me harm with the card charges
text:
It's a shame because the hotel is centrally located and the cleanliness and even the facilities are correct, but they have to improve a lot in customer service and in controlling the charges on the card. They charge you and it bothers them to give you explanations and, of course, they don't give you a solution.

To improve: customer service, card charges and operation to provide solutions and answers to customers.

The room and the bed are not big but in the end if the treatment and service is good, it doesn't matter.

title: Great, comfortable, quiet stay.
text: Incredibly comfortable bed. Great service from considerate staff. Location is first-rate, walking distance to everywhere we wanted to be -- and yet, even in the middle of town, our room was very, very quiet (didn't hear a siren once). Definite thumbs up.

title: Fabulous good Restaurant clean Rooms Outstanding Staff
text: Very clean beautiful view/ Staff went above and beyond for us Jamie at the front door was Amazing Super Star/ Shelly at the front desk was so kind I’m from California rumor has it people in New York are mean FALSE RUMORS I witnessed a lot of acts of kindness!

title: New York
text:
Hotel located in the central area of New York, a stone's throw from Brayan Park and Time Square. Small but functional hotel. There were 4 of us traveling and we had a room with a sofa bed and a very comfortable double bed. Large bathroom. Every day coffee pods and water. The only flaw is the staff in charge of the rooms. In fact, after the first day we left a tip to the maid, from the second day we left nothing there.
Room was partially redone.A lack of style for a 4 star hotel.

title: Holiday in New York
text:
Hotel located in a strategic position to visit the main points of interest on foot, near 5th Avenue and Times Square.
 Very good initial impression, room clean and quite spacious. There were four of us, we took a room with a sofa bed and a double bed, divided into two communicating rooms. There is a small coat hanger and some chests of drawers, sufficient for a stay of a few days.
As soon as we arrived, some towels and a bathrobe were missing, we wrote to the number received from the hotel and they were brought to us shortly after. The next day everything ok. On the third day, upon returning in the evening, we found unmade beds and missing towels. Having informed the reception, they took action promptly. On the last day a bed had not been made again. One morning we had a problem with the bathroom and they sent a plumber straight away. All in all, they always made it right quickly.
The coffee machine and capsules in the room are useful. At the end of the block there is a bakery cafe to buy croissants and have breakfast at acceptable prices.

title: Good location, poor bed for 4 person.
text: 3 minute from empire state building, very clean room, the mattress on the main bed is used-up. the couch is difficult to fold (sleeping place for 2 another person). Reception is very helpful. Breakfast too expensive.

title: My favorite NYC hotel
text:
I've stayed at several other NYC hotels over the years, and by far Executive Hotel Le Soleil is my new favorite and the only place I want to stay for future trips!

1. The location is perfect—not just that it's centrally located in Manhattan, but also the block itself has a variety of dining choices (at a nice variety of prices).
2. The hotel lobby is welcoming, with complimentary hot chocolate, fruit-infused water and a cozy fireplace.
3. The adjacent Trademark restaurant/bar is a great place for a fancy breakfast or a relaxing nightcap after a day on the town.
4. Our suite was spacious and perfectly appointed with everything we needed. The queen suite with sofabed gave my teenage son and I plenty of privacy. For NYC standards, it was quite large. The bed and pillows were very comfortable, and the desk was handy.
5. Each member of the hotel staff we encountered was gracious and hospitable. A big shout-out to Meredith at the front desk for making us feel special and to manager Steve for attending to our needs above and beyond.

title: Best hôtel ever
text: Beautiful hôtel with standing luxurious amenities. The restqurqwas wondeful too.  The best part was the front des stqmaff and the service from the manager Steve who always went out of hus way to help me and my company. I cant thank him enough. I will be back

title: Fabulous hotel in a great location
text:
The hotel is on 36th Street., between 5th & 6th Avenue It is really easy to walk to Central Park in one direction and then head towards Manhattan in the other direction .
All the hotel staff were incredibly welcoming, the hotel was very clean.
Our room was 1801 on the 18th floor. We had a fabulous view of the Empire State Building!

title: Excellent Hotel!
text:
We had an amazing experience in Le Soleil New York this past weekend. Everything - from the location, welcoming atmosphere, to the room amenities - was great! 
The lobby was nicely decorated. The staff were welcoming. The room was sparkling clean and with a nice view. I was pleased that the hotel accommodated my request of a higher floor. 
Loved the bedding - the mattrass and pillows were comfy, and the high-standard 100% cotton sheets were lovely. 
Little chocolates and complimentary water were a nice touch. 
L'Occitane soap, shampoo, conditioner, etc. were top-notch. 
I highly recommend this hotel. It is a gem in Midtown Manhattan.

title: Great Hotel, Centrally Located
text:
Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hotel was clean and nicely furnished. The soaps were L'occitane, which I found to be very nice and luxurious. Rooms were very quiet, and the beds were comfortable. The shower pressure was comfortable.

My room was a suite, and I found the space was suitable. A bit small but appropriately sized for a NYC hotel. It was also very centrally located, which made day to day living very easy and comfortable.

There is a fitness center in the hotel, and a nice fireplace in the lounge area which was really helpful for chilly days in New York, especially after a long rainy day.

title: Great location, fabulous Staff.
text:
From booking to check-in everything was made so easy.
The hotel itself is in a great location, very clean and comfortable.
The Staff are exceptional, so helpful and nothing is a problem.

The downside:
Breakfast vouchers, why not give them all at check-in instead of having to ask each morning.
Automated text messages can be annoying especially when it states that the hotel are “trying to reach you”.
They are not but messages keep coming in.

Other than that, great hotel, great staff and good value. Would definitely recommend and will definitely return.

title: Shelley the attentive and caring host
text: Shelley was absolutely the sweetest front desk woman I ever met. She greeted me with care and helped deliver more than the best customer service I could receive when finishing up a long road trip of 2 weeks across the US. I appreciate her hospitality, attention to detail and compassionate awareness to taking care of her guests at LeSoleil Hotel.

title: Excellent Stay
text: Excellent service the front desk is outstanding… Yaya co yes not have done more to make my checkin more seamless which I needed after a very long day! And I had a few requests during my stay and Erranny was extremely helpful! A pleasurable stay

title: Empire views amazing location
text:
Perfect warm and welcoming. 

We loved it here. Clean and lovely. Had plenty of space in our room with empire views and seperate living area lounge. Had a fridge and sink!
Free coffee in room. For bottled water in room. 
Hot Shower, just what you need.

title: Wonderful room for my weekend vacation
text: The reps were all friendly and helpful, they held our bags until we were able to check in and they had really good coffee in the lobby each morning! It was wonderful and my favorite part of the room besides the amazing view was the heated tile in the bathroom!!! I loved it and will always book there each time i visit NY

title: Excellent service
text: I chose this hotel just from reading reviews.  It didn’t fail to impress me.  Beautiful hotel with luxurious bedding but the best part was the staff. They were truly outstanding!  Led by the manager Steve, who always went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable throughout our stay. Definitely a class act and the best service I’ve received in any hotel. Would stay there again just for the staff and Steve.

title: FAR Exceeded Our Expectations!
text: We booked this hotel because of it's great location and price point. I was traveling with my teenage son and the room offered a queen bed and sofa bed, which is rare in Manhattan. It is a quick few blocks from Grand Central and Penn Station. As soon as you step into the lobby, it's a relaxing atmosphere with a beautiful lounge area that is like the den at posh club. The front desk staff were very professional and personable.  Everything in our room seemed brand new.  We heard no street noise and the we slept great with full blackout curtains.  I brought home the pen so I won't forget this hotel for our next trip to NYC!

title: Lovely central hotel. Good value.
text:
We had a really nice stay here in a room on the 13th floor overlooking the Empire State Building. The location is ideal - really central and easy to walk everywhere. The staff are LOVELY and there’s a nice bar and restaurant. Bed was soft and comfortable and we slept well. 

Our only slight negatives were the poor lighting in the room, cleanliness of the bathroom - there were a lot of long black hairs in our shower (rest of room spotlessly clean), the noisy aircon and beeps of lift directly outside were a bit distracting but earplugs helped and we would’ve liked a kettle in the room but could make tea in the microwave so fine. 

All in all, we really enjoyed this hotel, and if we were coming back to New York City, we would definitely book it again.

title: Great Service in the Heart of New York
text: Excellent hospitality by True professionals. Hotel is located in Mid town within walking distance to most of the attractions in the city. Room was comfortable and breakfast at the restaurant was superb. Will definitely stay at the LeSoleil New York again.

title: Serenity in the big apple!
text:
Great location in mid-town NYC - yet once you step into the foyer it all feels serene and cozy.
Had a great stay!  spacious room for the 4 of us, being off the avenue meant it was super quiet especially at night - perfect for a good rest!
Free hot chocolate by the fireplace in the shared lounge room downstairs was a nice touch!
Friendly staff - an enjoyable stay!

title: I truly loved how comfortable and cozy the room felt and especially the robe!!
text: I honestly loved the hotel, everything was so clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly especially sheerly, she was literally the sweetest thing and helped me out when I needed her. The only thing I can say I did not like was that I had decorated the room with some balloons and after like 3 hours the fire alarm started going off due to the helium. I ended up popping all the balloons around 1 am but the alarm went off the entire night so I decided to check out at 6:30.

title: Fabulous Hotel
text: My 12 year old and I checked in very late after having to leave another hotel .I researched the hotel online ,we arrived and were greeted by Andre who was a superstar -professional, calm and confident we would be well taken care of at this hotel . He was right we booked a Queen suite -amazing ! Very comfy and spacious.All staff were lovely .The restaurant was great -food was yummy and service was great . Tea was strong and drinkable not weak ! The fire in the reception was fabulous after a long day sightseeing.

title: Prime location and excellent Hospitality Experience
text:
Enjoyed the great hospitality in the heart of New York Midtown during my 3 night stay last week. 
Excellent customer service by the team that cares about their guests and location very convenient to everything.

title: Great , Clean Hotel
text: Ask for a room with a city view and know they have no parking , you will have no access to your car until check out , its 3 doors down in a privately owned parking garage . Hotel was clean, restaurant on site was very clean and good food and happy hour .

title: Exactly What I Needed
text: The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. And the suites are extremely roomy, especially for a boutique hotel. Location was perfect. Close to everything without being in the insanity of Times Square. Great restaurant right downstairs.

title: Great stay
text: I loved my stay. The staff was great! Especially Shelley at the front desk. The room was beautiful and comfy. Food and drink close by. I will definitely stay here again. I can’t wait to come back for pleasure instead of business. It’s nice to be treated like family.

title: One more reason to love this place!
text:
Huge shout out to Shelly, Andrew and Nicole who went over and above on my check in. All of them were super helpful and extremely friendly, and Shelly even remembered me from my last stay! 

I come the NYC for work ever 6 weeks and I often stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil because it is conveniently located, comfortable, one of the cleanest hotels in their price range, and has all the amenities many other hotels are doing away with. Now I have another reason to stay here - in 3 years of doing this regular trip to New York, no other hotel (and I only stay at 3 of them) has ever remembered me. I felt so taken care of today as I checked in between meetings. It feels good. 

Thank you, Shelly, Andrew and Nicole. This will be my first pick from now on. 

Customer for life.

title: Lovely hotel
text: Shelly ftom the front desk was amazing as I was going through a hard time the morning I checked out. She was very understanding and patient as was all the staff during my stay. Overall a beautiful hotel and location thank you for everything!

title: 6 out of 5 stars
text: Booked the hotel super last minute and Shelley was absolutely wonderful. She was so kind and always made sure I was good to go whenever she saw me. Definitely made the experience super delightful. The room itself was good , clean and very nice. Loved the robe they provided and the tv shows were decent for a hotel (would’ve preferred Netflix but that’s probably the Gen-Z in me lol). All in all a great experience and very close to everything which made it better. Definitely would book again

title: Great!
text:
We were on holiday in New York for a week and afterwards we were very satisfied with our choice. The staff was extremely nice and helpful. The hotel is fairly centrally located on 36th street and an oasis of peace in the middle of this energetic city. Our room was on the eighth floor and very well insulated, we were not bothered by any noise at any time. The room is very large by New York standards and has plenty of storage space. We had two large suitcases with us and could easily store everything. the bathroom with walk-in shower was also equally good with very good water pressure. Around the corner from the hotel is the subway station on 34th which will help you travel in New York with great ease. We took the subway, leaving to the airport at the end of the week and it brought us to Jfk easily for just a subway fee instead of an overrated taxi price. The Empire State building and Macys are both just one block away. The central located Time Square is just a few minute walk and easily accessible via Broadway. If I have to mention a downside (which we didn’t really experienced) it is the price-quality ratio, for the money we would have at least expected any kind of breakfast, but it did not spoil our enjoyment. There are plenty places on the street that you can choose and it gives you the  advantage not being tied to early morning wake-up, which is useful because you have to get used to the time difference during the first few days when you come from Europe. Yes!! Next time we would definitely choose the same hotel again it made our stay in New York very pleasant.
We advise Breakfast at the very clean and friendly Korean Cafe Joa Kitchen just next door. We enjoyed diner at the Keg Room, an Irish Pub one minute away in front on 36th. Enjoyed a dayly “happy hour” at any Applebee’s (our preferred was on 50th / 6th).
Thanks for having us, we appreciated our journey.

title: I had a phenomenal experience getting a microwave at four in the morning very accommodating.
text:
The service is actually phenomenal.  Shelly needs a raise! Night and day staff. All accommodating rooms are beautiful very clean.

Going when I walk walk in at anytime a day or night Shelley is just smiling and ready to help and assist at all times 20 million stars.

title: Great experience
text: Everything was superlative, from position  to cleaning. Perfect isolation from external noises, only 5 minutes far from fifth avenue by walk, subway station close and surrounded by restaurants, pubs and shops. We will highly recommend the stay to visit New York City

title: best hotel ever
text:
Our 4th visit back says everything. great staff. everyone friendly. The bedroom suites are large. great location. comfortable beds.
The bathroom soap, shampoo, conditioner and body lotion are excellent quality.

title: Delight at Le Soleil
text:
I really liked this hotel. It's in a great location for plays and subway service. The room was very clean, quiet, and comfortable. There is a wall thermostat you can set to your liking. The shower was warm and full flowing. The bed and pillows were blissful.

There is a beautifully decorated lounge that we ate breakfast in (bagels from a few doors down) and had an evening by the gas fireplace. Coffee and water with just a touch of fruit in the lobby. The elevators were quick, the hallways ample and attractively adorned. The staff were friendly and helpful.

title: Great stay lovely hotel
text:
Lovely room , very clean and nice decoration. Modern bathroom with very nice amenities. 
My special thanks to Shelley who made as feel so welcome at check in and was so extremely helpful  and attentive!
We will definitely come back on our next stay to NYC

title: Great hotel great staff
text: Absolutely fabulous hotel. Clean comfortable nicely appointed rooms. I cannot say enough about the front desk staff most notably Yadira she cannot do enough to make your stay memorable and happy. Eranny also  at the front desk made our check in a breeze. Great hotel with an amazing staff.

title: Great location
text: Wonderful location! Yadira was able to get us checked in early. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family. Easy access to public transportation and walkable to many attractions. The room was clean and a comfortable size.

title: Pour 2 mais pas pour 4.
text:
Avions réservé une chambre pour 4… 
Résultat : un lit double et un vieux clic clac pour les deux autres. 
Pb le matelas de clic clac vraiment pas top, nous alternons un soir sur 2 pour dormir dans le lit tellement nous dormons mal sur ce convertible. 
Chambre équipée de 2 bouteilles d’eau, 2 verres, 2 tasses, deux serviettes, je suis persuadée qu’il s’agissait une suite de 2… Vente mensongère. Une fois le canapé déplié impossible de bouger dans la chambre, une vraie galère pour ouvrir les valises, et les stocker. 
L’hôtel reste propre et très bien situé.

title: Will recommend to friends & family.
text: Already like it upon check-in. Receptionist is very helpful and thoughtful. I checked room and find it super clean. Room seems small but no complain at all. It is New York . Right? But it has everything smartly arranged. It is quiet as well .Definitely a A plus hotel compared to other 4-stars in the area.

title: Great hotel in Midtown Manhattan!
text:
We have been staying at LeSoleil for years. It is next to several different subway stations near Hersld Square making it easy to get around Manhattan and beyond. The staff is always warm and friendly! Rooms are a bit small but just enough- who stays in the room while in NYC! Rooms are very clean and nicely decorated. The Trademark restaurant is an added plus for a good brunch or evening drinks. 
Will be back for sure!

title: First visit to New York
text: New York in winter has always appealed to us. It was very cold, first snow in 3 years, making Central Park look like a scene from Disney. Warm clothing and a wish list of places to visit and we enjoyed every minute.

title: great stay
text:
stayed for 3 nights with friend. overall stay was great. location great, very clean room. great check in experience. room was ready when we got there. would stay again without hesitation. 
no complaints

title: Great hotel and staff
text: Lovely hotel with nice room and great staff. Steve the manager was a great help and very warm and welcoming. We will be back because of him. Thanks for a great stay. The lobby was beautiful and the restaurant had great food and service. Steve was great.

title: Absolutely amazing experience! Everyone treats you like family. The attached restaurant is delicious, excellent service!
text: The employees treat you like family here. This is the best hotel I’ve ever stayed at (40ish years of traveling).  From check-in to checkout it’s amazing! Special shoutouts to Juan and Meredith for making me feel welcome. I was here at Thanksgiving 2023, too. 😊

title: EXECUTIVE HOTEL LESOLEIL
text: Love this hotel.  Staff is excellent.  Furnishings are great!  Restaurant is on the  premises.  Great location close to many restaurants and shops.  Very nice toiletries- provide robes and slippers- very nice touch!

title: New York trip
text: The hotel is in an ideal location within walking distance of many popular areas within New York City. The hotel was very clean and the staff were very helpful. The views from the room were great. I would highly recommend and hopefully able to visit again soon.

title: Excellent Hotel
text:
This Hotel is one of the best priced hotels for your money in midtown.
Rooms are not small, rainhead shower, bathrobes, Keurig coffee maker, Glass encased furniture, floor to ceiling windows, comfortable beds and bedding. And a very accommodating staff. Better than Hotels that charge twice the price or more.

title: Prime Location & The Best Staff
text: Very excited to write this review for the hotel. My wife and I had arrived just coming off of being married to celebrate our special weekend in the city, we were welcomed with such cheer by the staff that we immediately felt at home. Luis, Shelley, and Nikko are staff worth mentioning, should you choose to stay at this hotel I hope you get the pleasure of their company and accommodating approach to their craft. I highly recommend this hotel for your stay in the city, not just for the prime location but the homey decor, staff and feeling the hotel has to offer.

title: The only issue is that my bond hasn't been released although the manager said that it was.
text:
My bond still hasn't been released. For no reason. A month after the check out.
Although the manager said that it was released.
We are Disappointed and unfortunately.  There is no o response to my emails.
They are still holding my money.

title: Going above and beyond
text: A friend called to send my mom and I a bottle of champagne as we were celebrating her birthday and her first visit to NYC. Steve took the call and shared that he would also like to help us celebrate. He personally brought up the Champagne and then asked if the hotel could upgrade us to a bigger room free of charge. He later hand delivered chocolates to our room and made sure that we had a good itinerary for our trip. This was so much beyond what we could have expected and I would highly recommend this hotel for this reason.

title: Le Soleil shines again!☀️
text:
Great service by Shelley who remembered me from several months back.
Perfect location for my stays when I come into NYC on business.  
This is my third time staying at Le Soleil and it has been great every time!
Will definitely become my NYC home!

title: THE place to stay
text: The location is fantastic and central to everything you could need. Very modern and well equipped rooms with tons of space. Amenities are great. The staff here are super kind and extremely friendly. Nikko and Shelley are particularly helpful and always make sure you have what you need and are really reputable. Cannot thank them enough for their efforts to go absolutely above and beyond. I can not recommend this place enough.

title: Good exprerience
text: Tutto ok, posizione veramente strategica per visitare Manhattan, ottimi ristos vicinissimi e luoghi per colazione. Peccato solo che fossimo ad un piano molto basso, un po’ deludente questo. Da foto camere sembrano più grandi. Comodissime e pulitissime però

title: Great experience!
text: We had a great experience staying at this hotel! The hotel was clean and close to places we visited. We felt security and comfortable. The beds were very comfortable and room amenities were very nice and hotel was very well kept. We had a three night stay and every day here was a great experience.

title: Great Location and Service
text: This is our second time at the hotel and we were not disappointed.  As soon as you arrive you are warmly greeted.  Check in is very easy and the everyone is friendly, professional and very accommodating. We're definitely planning to return again.

title: Soleil Olé
text: Location was perfect for what we planned to do in the city.  Close to multiple subway lines.  Staff was attentive and friendly. Small glitches were fixed promptly.  Lobby area was attractive and comfortable.  This is a hotel that values its guests.

title: A Good Nights Rest
text: The staff was helpful, the room was clean and quiet. I was only there one night and had no desire to leave the property, but the bar and restaurant were closed. Otherwise I would have given them a five.

title: Staying at a mid town hotel that makes you feel you are staying on 5th Avenue
text: I found this hotel on a Facebook group page called New York City tours and Tips and decided t give it a try. I was surprised and pleased that the manager emailed to welcome me and to expect 5 ⭐️ service. The customer service was outstanding and the staff made us feel welcomed and valued. It was a special anniversary and we had a bottle of wine and a box of chocolate. We will definitely be back and I encourage everyone to enjoy this experience!

title: Honest review
text:
Location & cleanliness was perfect. 
24hr gym - I really liked it l. 
Shelley the front desk worker was charming and kind, always smiling and something that the rest of the staff should admire and in general in a lot of business. 
I’m sure I’ll be back :)

title: Amazing Hotel in the Heart of NYC
text:
A fantastic boutique hotel in a fantastic location. We stayed for a week and the stay could not have been better. The staff were great and very friendly, the rooms were clean and comfortable, and we were very surprised how quiet the room was with us having a room on one of the lower floors.

If we are ever back in NYC we will definitely be staying here again.

title: Jan 2024 Visit
text:
Shelley and Steve were excellent and accommodating hosts. 

Highly enjoyed my stay in NYC! Great room at a great price. Beautiful lobby, helpful staff, nice view. 

I appreciate the close proximity to midtown and everything in Manhattan. Will definitely consider staying again.

title: Excellent European Boutique Hotel
text: From the moment the door man meets you at the entrance and assists you with a cart for your luggage and you enter the lobby where cold water filled with slices of fruit is available to guests, you know this will be a great experience. The lounge has a warm fire and comfortable upholstered sofas and chairs. The location is close to St. Herald Square subway station, near Macy’s and the fashion district. .

title: Hidden gem of midtown
text:
Yadira and Eranny have consistently gone above and beyond making every visit amazing to this hotel amazing. Every morning they are there to greet you with a “good morning” and a friendly smile. 

There have been visits where I have mis booked my reservation, Yadira and Eranny provided white glove service and got everything resolved in less than 5 minutes.

They are superstars and the reason why I’ve been coming back to Le Soleil for the past two years.

Amazing, boutique, quaint gem of a hotel!

-Cesar

title: A great place to stay in NYC
text: The Executive Hotel Le Soleil is an excellent choice if you are coming to NYC to see shows, visit museums and other sites, and sample great ethnic cuisine.  The hotel is well situated for all of these activities, as well as for bus and train travel throughout the metro area.  Plus, the property is well maintained, the rooms well-appointed and the front desk staff welcoming and helpful.

title: Beautiful and great location! Just book it you will not regret it!
text: 1st time visiting NYC and I did my research! I found this gem of a hotel through my Sam's Club membership and am so glad we chose it! It was beautiful! I didn't want to stay in a big hotel chain. If you have never been to New York and are looking for a quiet, safe, quaint hotel with an NYC feel look no further! Our stay here was excellent. From walking in the doors we knew we picked the right place. The marble floor and the decor was beautiful. The room was clean, comfortable and spacious. The bed and the pull out sofa bed were both comfortable. They offer free bottled waters at the front desk and have hot coffee in the morning, or there is a Keurig in your room,  and since it was winter time hot chocolate throughout the day, and even umbrellas if you need them. The location was excellent, 1 block from the Empire State building. While not right in Time Square, it was a short walk and the subway was down the block making for easy travel to all the sights further away. But we were able to get to great restaurants and shopping just by walking down the street. The Trademark restaurant that is attached to the hotel was excellent. I could not express how this hotel made my first trip to NYC even better. My next trip back will definitely be at this hotel. If you are questioning where to stay do not hesitate you will not regret your experience staying here!

title: Home Away from Home
text: Always a win to stay here!  Shelley is incredible at the front desk. She is attentive and remembers me each time I arrive. The hotel is centrally located for my needs and always clean and safe. This is my go-to hotel!

title: Прекрасный отель для отдыха и знакомства с городом
text:
Прекрасный отель с отзывчивым персоналом, уборка номера проводилась ежедневно, постельное белье менялось регулярно, отопление работало отлично. В номере было тихо и не было слышно шума с улицы, учитывая что мы жили на 4 этаже. 
Wi-fi предоставляется бесплатно, и работает очень хорошо. 
Рядом с отелем очень много различных кафе и ресторанов, большенство достопримечательностей в шаговой доступности, рядом все ветки метро. 
У меня был Представительский  номер с кроватью king-size. Площадь комнаты прекрасно подходит для размещения двух взрослых людей, а кровать действительно большая. В номере есть холодильник, сейф, кофемашина, утюг, гладильная доска. По моей просьбе мне предоставили электрический чайник. 
В номере ежедневно нам оставляли две бутылки воды, а если не хватало, всегда можно попросить дополнительную воду на ресепшене. 
Шкаф открытого типа, имеет две полки,  три ящика для одежды и достаточно вешалок для одежды. Обе Прикроватные тумбочки имеют ящик. Я считаю, что это прекрасный отель для того, чтобы насладиться городом и потом прекрасно отдохнуть в своей комнате. На первом этаже для гостей отеля бесплатно предлагается горячий шоколад и вода.

title: Fantastic hotel and experience
text:
This is an amazing hotel.  Please do yourself a favor and stay here.  The hotel and rooms are beautiful and the staff are very nice and helpful.  A HUGE thank you goes out to Nico as he was very helpful and we stayed at this hotel again in January 2024.

This is where we will be staying when we head to NYC.

title: Charming European Style Hotel
text: This little gem is our go to hotel for business and personal stays in NYC.  I love the European flair, and the little extras -- chocolates, water with fresh fruit, hot chocolate, plush robe... The staff is friendly and eager to please.

title: Great hotel to visit the city
text: Perfect location, well connected to all the main touristic activities. Room clean and with all comforts. Staff overall kind and welcoming. Gym room as a plus. Very recommended to visit the city and surroundings

title: Super hôtel idéalement placé dans NY !
text: Première fois à NY et cet hôtel était parfait ! Il est idéalement placé dans NY à deux pas de l’empire state building. L’hôtel est très propre. Il y a du café et/ou du chocolat chaud à disposition à l’accueil gratuitement pour les clients de l’hôtel.

title: New York Trip w/ Family
text: Great room. Clean and super conveniently located for everything we wanted to do (Times Square, Empire State Bldg, Central Park, Broadway play, etc). Service was excellent … Very accommodating, helpful and friendly staff!

title: Quiet, comfortable hotel
text: Great location, friendly and helpful staff. Very comfortable bed. Quiet within hotel and we didn’t hear street noise. Rooms are small but that’s expected in NY. Good gym. No microwave and just a Keurig coffee maker but staff brought a tea kettle when I requested one. Definitely would stay here again!

title: Wonderful Hotel
text: Nicely located. Friendly and helpful staff from doorman, concierge, housekeeping and staff. Well sized room with comfortable beds and nice bathroom. Clean and cozy. Nice lobby with chimney. Average food in restaurant but gets the job done. Very good choice for staying close to Times Sq

title: Perfect choice
text: Excellent location in Manhattan, near Time Square and the 5th Avenue, very professional and kind service, confortable room and bed, delicious breakfast at a very reasonable rate. I strongly recommand this hotel.

title: Five star hotel, an amazing service
text: Excellent service and Mr Nikko Wong was very helpful and assisted us throughout the days. Extremely recommend this hotel. Clean rooms and all hotel was clean as well. We will come back here again for sure we love this clean hotel and the stuff

title: Fantastic Hotel in top location A++
text: We've now stayed at the Execuitive Hotel Le Soleil on multiple occasions. The staff is great and the rooms are clean and spacious. The location is also very good as you have easy access to everything. This is our NYC hotel of choice moving forward - can't wait to visit again.

title: Ottima esperienza!
text: Super consigliato!! Siamo stati benissimo in questo hotel che ha un'ottima posizione (vicinissimo all'Empire, Time Square a 10 min a piedi, ristoranti molto carini nella via dell'Hotel per cenare); le camere sono pulite, spaziose e tutto il personale della reception molto disponibile e gentile.

title: Highly recommend!
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Le Soleil hotel. This beautiful boutique hotel is centrally located and really close to all.  I was able to easily
get to Broadway for a show, go shopping and also have dinner without much difficultly. The hotel itself and rooms are very clean. But the most amazing thing about this hotel is the warm, welcoming and helpful staff. All of the staff is pleasant and attentive but one stand out is Andre.  The first day of my stay I had arrived late to the hotel after a long day of traveling I was welcomed with a warm smile and quick efficient check in.  He answered all of my questions and even offered me local restaurants still open where I could grab a bite.  He also took the time to answer all of my questions about traveling around the city.  He was a joy to speak with and a real treasure of the hotel.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a small friendly feeling hotel that still provides all the bells and whistles one would expect while staying in NYC.

title: Buona soluzione, consigliato!
text:
Albergo a Midtown, tra la quinta e la sesta, a ridosso dell'Empire State Building, vicinissimo a una fermata metro molto ben collegata (con Times Square raggiungibile comunque a piedi).
Nostra camera molto ampia, con letto della bimba (in realtà divano letto matrimoniale) in un ambiente un po' separato (con entrambi gli ambienti dotati di grande TV).
Camere silenziosissime, con discreta qualità del sonno (anche se materasso non ottimale e cuscini pessimi). Nonostante il soggiorno durante le vacanze di Natale e di Capodanno, con strade affollatissime, non si percepiva nessun rumore, almeno dal nostro piano (ottavo di venti)
Bagnoschiuma, sapone mani e shampoo portati in camera solo il penultimo giorno (pensavamo non fossero inclusi e ci siamo adattati di conseguenza).
Pulizia buona, anche per gli standard italiani, ma camere riassettate a giorni alterni (abbiamo dovuto chiedere integrazione più di una volta, quantomeno per le asciugamani).
La colazione (per noi inclusa, pagata un prezzo esorbitante) viene servita in un locale collegato all'Hotel (accessibile sia dalla strada che dall'Hall dell'Hotel): non è una colazione continentale, ma alla carta, con piatti tipici della colazione americana. A me personalmente non è dispiaciuta (ottimi i Bagel con salmone affumicato), ma capisco che non è per tutti i palati (ridottissima l'offerta del dolce); inoltre su 9 giorni solo 3 giorni è stato possibile avere cappuccino o latte in schiuma (adorato da mia figlia), perché gli altri giorni la macchina era rotta. Alla fine è sicuramente più conveniente scegliere uno dei mille locali sulla quinta o sulla sesta.
Come in tutti gli hotel americani bloccano una caparra su carta di credito di circa 100 dollari al giorno, come garanzia. Bene saperlo e organizzarsi (può essere usata anche una prepagata).

title: Very good location and facilities
text: Excellent option for a hotel with good location and outstanding facilities. Lobby is very nice and, although I did'nt use the restaurant and gym, I could see they were good. Bathroom was excellent as well. Only downside is that the room was small, but it didn't affect the experience.

title: Very convenient location
text: Great spot to stay and do touristy things in Midtown. We appreciated how quiet it was at night and how close we were to fun things to do! The hotel was clean and service was excellent. They were able to take our bags for the day so we could squeeze in some more sightseeing after we checked out.

title: Best Staff Ever!
text:
Most hotel stays these days are very transactional. You book online, check-in online, and sometimes go to your room without even getting a key. While that can be convenient, having zero human interaction while staying at a property for 3+ days is, in my mind, not how I want to live my life.

Luckily for my family, the staff at Executive Hotel Le Soleil is the most friendly and helpful hotel staff I have encountered in many years. No matter what we needed, which luckily wasn't very much, the staff was excited to oblige and did so with a huge smile on their faces. It was a welcome change and one that I hope to repeat in the future.

title: Voyage avec nos petits-enfants
text:
Très bel accueil, sourire et réponse rapide à nos demandes. Avons apprécié le calme et la propreté de la chambre. Bien située, à pied des principales attractions et le métro est tout près. 
Ce fût 2 nuits magiques pour nos petites-filles de 18 et 17 ans!
Merci à vous tous!

title: Great hotel
text: Super clean room, lovely staff at the front desk. The room is tiny but every hotel in Midtown is like that. They take great care of the room, apparently. The bathroom is super super clean. Very comfortable. The location is great too.

title: Christmas Eve Stay
text: Our stay was perfect! As a family we had three rooms and were satisfied with all of the rooms. We had the easiest check-in process with Shelley at the front desk. She was absolutely amazing and patient! We will be back!

title: Enjoyed every moment
text: The staff were so helpful and friendly.  The rooms were comfortable and the location was mid town and close to everything.  Would certainly stay again. I stayed for 7 days over Christmas with my family.  It was all we expected and more.

title: Perfetto !
text:
Tutto perfetto ! Staff cordiale e molto disponibile , colazione buonissima e sostanziosa , camere pulite e sistemate ogni giorno . posizione eccezionale in pieno centro a Manhattan, metro vicinissima.
Consigliatissimo

title: A true gem
text:
WOW!  What a wonderful surprise staying at Executive Hotel Le Soleil.  During my search for a location away (but yet close to everything), I looked and read many reviews and this hotel stood out above all others. Now I know why and wished our stay was longer. 
This was such a wonderful surprise. We were upgraded to a larger queen suite. We found the space comfortable, with plush beds that ensured a restful night's sleep, and perfect for my niece's first visit to NYC.
The room was perfect, quiet, clean, cozy, safe and comfortable. 
Most of the staff that we encounter were kind and helpful.  Thank you to James, Latch, and Nikko for your kindness. 
A special thank you to the AMAZING, Phenomenal
 Shelley who made the difference in our overall enjoyment and was very sweet and helpful; she is a true gem who made our stay extra special and make sure we had everything we needed. 
I will never stay anywhere else when visiting the city. The Hotel Le Soleil is perfection!  I can't wait to return. HIGHLY recommend!

title: Luxurious accommodations at a discount
text: We were upgraded to the penthouse on the 20th floor for no extra cost. The view was great - especially with the Christmas lights decorating several building steeples. The hotel was easily walkable to all the attractions we wanted, and all four of us slept comfortably when our excursions were complete. Thanks for a great weekend!

title: Made Christmas in Midtown Magnificent
text: You won’t find a better location in midtown Manhattan. Rooms were clean and quiet. Housekeeping showed up each day (including Christmas!) and was always patient when we were dragging our feet. Concierge helpful, doormen kept an eye on our bags and front desk never said a word when our teenagers would get their fourth complimentary hot chocolate of the day. I don’t go around recommending hotels to my friends, but would suggest this one without hesitation. Only demerit would go to the uncomfortable hide-a-bed, but it’s hard to fault Le Soleil for this since comfortable hide-a-beds don’t exist. (The regular bed was fine.)

title: 5-star experience
text: Best hotel experience ever. Went for my father’s birthday and the staff upgraded us to a penthouse suite for free! The hospitality here is unmatched and the whole staff made our vacation special and memorable. I would highly recommend for any family looking to be close to all major attractions for a reasonable price with 5-star level hospitality. A truly amazing experience.

title: Excellent family stay
text:
We were here with two families and had a wonderful Christmas! Shelley at the desk made our stay so super pleasant! 
The hotel is very well located and the rooms are very clean. The staff is very friendly and very accommodating even for louder children:)
Highly recommend!

title: Best Stay for Christmas
text: Shelly and Nikki made our Christmas trip unforgettable can’t thank them enough for the hospitality and care they gave us. Next time we’re in New York City we will be coming here again! Everything we asked for was accommodated for from towels to water and even a microwave!

title: Christmas dream stay
text: Great location with an upscale feel.  This location was very clean and presentable. The hospitality is second to none.  Thank you for an amazing stay. Shelly was very helpful and made us feel comfortable and at home.

title: Wonderful Experience
text:
I stayed on the Executive Hotel Le Soleil some days ago and our experience was absolutely wonderful. 
The room was clean and tidy and had every amenity we could expect. Despite the coffee machine did not work, it was soon fixed and we were compensated for the trouble. Also, as we wanted to boil water to drink some hot beverages, they gave us an electric keetle without any additional costs.
I would also like to highlight Shelley from the front desk, who always had predisposition to solve any kind of issue we could have.
100% recommended

title: Great hotel
text:
Thank you Shelley for the great service. 
Wir waren über Weihnachten hier und haben ein tolle Zimmer mit viel Platz bekommen. 
Das personal war sehr nett und zuvorkommend. Besonders schön ist die zentrale Lage.

title: Top Tier Service
text: I had a wonderful stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York in December, soaking in the festive Christmas vibes. The standout was the exceptional service from Nikko, Shelley, and Nicole at the front desk. Their hospitality truly made my experience fantastic, adding a warm touch to the holiday season. The hotel's atmosphere and their commitment to guest satisfaction made it a memorable stay.

title: Wonderful weekend!
text:
My family and I stated in the suite and it was absolutely perfect! Spacious (esp for NYC standards) with great amenities! Room was very clean and comfortable.

A special shout out to the front desk - both Nikko and Shelly were so warm and friendly! Provided us with waters and chocolate and candy canes of course! They are awesome!

title: Excellent Stay; They set the bar!
text:
What can I say?! I came because of the reviews and great pics and neither disappointed. Customer service is second to none! From the time I walked in, Shelley, Meredith, and Nikko made sure I was well taken care of. They were patient, kind, funny and personable. Check-in was quick. I booked for a family vacation for the weekend so I booked several rooms and they were kind enough to upgrade me to their penthouse for no additional charge! Every day they made sure I was well taken care of. For example, I called the front desk to inquire which floor the ice was on and they told me, but also asked, if I wanted ice to be delivered to my room. I said, “sure”, and they were at my door in minutes. The establishment was beautiful and as an interior designer, I appreciate that. I will never stay in another hotel as long as I come to the city and I’ve visited Manhattan at least three times prior. Great hob, Executive Le Soliel! I’ll be back!  -C. Brown

P.s. Drinks in their bar was the best out of two bars/restaurants we visited near by.

title: Best hotel!
text: Nikku, Shelly, and Nicole for their exceptional service. Wishing them a Merry Christmas, and acknowledging their outstanding dedication to providing exemplary assistance. They are truly commendable professionals.

title: Highly recommended!
text: This was my second time in NYC and had a great experience at Le Soleil hotel. Great location, friendly staff and modern ambience. The Xmas decorations are just like you see in the movies! Shelley and Miko made sure we had everything we needed. Will definitely come back in the future!

title: Great Hotel. Awesome staff!
text:
This is my wife’s go to hotel when in NYC on business. Joined her for a weeklong holiday. She has always raved about the hotel and the wonderful staff. Meeting them in person hammered the point home - a really great group of folks highlighted by Shelley at registration who simply personifies good service and hospitality. 

Looking forward to my next visit.

title: Simply the best. Look no further
text: I have been staying at this property for every business and personal trip to NYC since I discovered them last year. The concierge- most especially Shelly- are the most customer obsessed and wonderful to work with in my experience of traveling domestically and internationally.  They remember folks, always are warm and kind and fun to work with. The rooms are spotless, and well looked after. Fresh sheets and towels daily. Slippers and a robe.  Plus welcome chocolates too.  For my birthday there was a complimentary Prosecco.  The team will do everything from make stellar recommendations to book transportation to ensure all your needs are met.  I highly recommend this hotel- again have stayed for both business and personal travel and they are my first choice in NYC. If you are after high touch service and great folks who make you feel welcome stay here.

title: Love this place
text:
We appreciate the kindness and well treatment by the staff we have a wonderful time 
I like the food especially burguers and martini coffe 
Is beautiful and comfortable place, perfect for family or friends.

title: Nice, clean, great staff
text: This is a nice, smallish, hotel in a central location at a good price for what you get. The staff was extremely helpful, warm, competent and professional. We are glad we stayed there, and would recommend it to others.

title: Wow!!
text: checked in last night, after a long drive they upgraded my room to a penthouse.  Service is excellent, love the atmosphere. Checked in with two adult children and slept comfortably.  Highly recommend for a family getaway for sure.

title: Business trip
text: Shelly and Nikki are the best.  Friendly and welcoming.   Because of them, and the management of this hotel, I will be back!!! . Add in location to transportation, restaurants and entertainment, you can’t go wrong.

title: Wonderful hote and staff
text: The loveliest hotel I’ve ever been to. The manager Steve was so wonderful, warm and welcoming. He was such a pleasure to deal with and had answers and help with all our questions!  We can’t wait to return.

title: 5 star!
text: Love this hotel, will definitely be staying here again! Great location! What topped it off was the hotel had a car service to bring you to and from the airport for $85 dollars! Much cheaper than Uber, Lyft and private car services. Me and my friends originally booked a car service and they no showed up us to bring us to our airport. Luckily Jamie helped us out and hooked us up with a limo!!! He was amazing!! I will definitely recommend this hotel to everyone traveling to NYC. It was walking to distance to so many things.

title: Good clean rooms with a central location. Pricey for what you get.
text:
Good clean hotel with a great location. We had a basic small two bedroom room and a bathroom. For what you’re paying, you’d hope for more but this seems to be the norm for nyc. Thankfully it’s clean and everything in the room works. 
Small issues did arise such as the elevators not working and one of our bags left with the bell hop was misplaced, but thankfully found.

title: Convenient and comfortable hotel
text: I was in NYC for a 2 night stay and chose the Executive Hotel LeSoleil based on its convenient location and good reviews on Trip Advisor. I found Nicole and Andre to be very courteous and helpful in checking me in to my room. The queen size room had a view of the Empire State Building and was comfortable. It also had a little kitchenette which was nice. The hotel lobby was decorated beautifully for Christmas and was very cheerful. I found it to be a pleasant experience. Thank you.

title: Great location and friendly staff
text: The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  The location was very convenient and perfect for walking to Times square or Rockefeller center and many other spots.  We had a great stay.

title: Excellent Stay!
text:
We had a wonderful experience at the LeSoleil this weekend. We were celebrating our anniversary and they were so accommodating. Not only did we get an upgrade, but they were so kind to even offer a bottle of wine. We had an incredible view of the Empire State Building and the room was excellent. 
This was our second stay at this Hotel and both experiences were excellent. Location is so convenient, we are already planning our next stay.
Also, you can request to book transfers to the airport with them, the rates are competitive, so you are not overpaying and it’s a higher service than an Uber. Overall, highly recommend!

title: Great stay
text: Was very surprised by this hotel.  Staff were excellent- so friendly and accommodating.  Great location, we walked both uptown and downtown from this location.  Loved the extra details of cold fruit water and hot chocolate in the lobby every day.  Rooms were a good size and beds were very comfortable ( sofa bed was ok).  Would not hesitate to stay here again in future.

title: Modernes Hotel mit Familiäre Atmosphäre .
text: Ein schönes geschmackvolles Hotel mitten in Manhattan. Wir mochten die Lage und die modernen Zimmer. Diese waren hübsch und gut isoliert. Man hat nicht gehört und die Fenster modern. Das Personal ist sehr nett und aufmerksam. Das Hotel liegt direkt um die Ecke vom Time Square.

title: Amazing hotel in the heart of NYC
text: Great experience again! This time it was an anniversary trip (sans kids) and they made us feel so special. They gave us an amazing room, a bottle of wine, chocolates and checked in on us throughout our stay. Steve the manager is very friendly and thoughtful. The staff answer all your questions and give great advice about NYC. The location is perfect. Hotel is clean.

title: Great Place
text: This is a gem of  a Hotel in New York. Centr location. The rooms are lovely and comfortable.  The staff is absolutely fantastic.   Very friendly and helpful.  The Trademark restaurant is very good. The Hotel was beautifully decorated for Christmas 🎄.

title: charming small hotel
text: I found the hotel very clean and welcoming. The room was small but the bathroom large and shower excellent. The public spaces were welcoming. I thought the hotel gave goad value.. The location was convenient to shopping and transformation,

title: beautiful experience
text: On the occasion of our 25th wedding anniversary, my wife and I recently stayed at the Executive le Soleil, and our experience was fantastic, starting from the very warm and friendly welcome. To celebrate our anniversary, the staff gifted us a bottle of prosecco, placed in an ice bucket, directly in our room. The environment is warm and welcoming, with two sofas near the lobby welcoming guests in front of a fireplace. Throughout the day, complimentary American coffee is offered in front of the reception, and in the afternoon, a refreshing cold drink is provided. The room, not overly large but cozy, is regularly cleaned and left in perfect order every day, and the bed is particularly comfortable with a soft duvet and pillow, great for those with cervical issues like myself. The external view is fantastic, and upon request, if available, some rooms offer a direct view of the Empire State Building. The hotel is located in the heart of Manhattan in an optimal position to easily walk to the main points of interest, with a subway station five minutes away. Highly recommended for those who love tranquility and relaxation.

title: Excellent hotel in the heart of Manhattan
text: I highly recommend Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York to anyone looking for a luxurious and memorable stay in the heart of Manhattan. Friendly and professional staff. It is a truly special place. With its stunning location, beautiful rooms and exceptional service, this hotel is sure to exceed your expectations. Thanks!

title: Definitely would come stay here again when I come back to NY!
text: Great experience! The bed was very comfy. The employees were very kind!! Pillows are very fluffy! The Christmas decorations are really pretty that they decorate the hotel with! Got nice chocolate and wine just for staying!!

title: Super stay
text: The staff of the hotel were super friendly and always very helpful. You could ask them anything at any time of day. It is a nice and clean hotel with a good central location. The breakfast is highly recommended.

title: Cozy Christmas themed and walking distance to almost everything.
text: Best staff and experience. Super friendly and always helpful. Its my first visit to NYC and this is the perfect place to stay when your trying to see all the tourist spots. Can’t wait to come back!  You’ll love it.

title: Best experience in NYC
text: We had 3 rooms for our annual girls NY Holiday trip of 9 people.  From the beginning it was the best experience .  The service, friendliness, and cleanliness of the hotel were top notch.  We couldn’t have asked to feel more at home and welcomed than we could with Niko and Meredith.  They couldn’t do enough. Will definitely be back and more than highly recommend .

title: Home away from home
text: What a great hotel! Trip advisor reviews definitely helped me book this hotel and I was not disappointed. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The daily complimentary water bottles came in handy after a long day of sight seeing. I loved the fireplace in the lobby as well as the decor. So festive! They also had complimentary hot chocolate and cucumber water in the lobby. This location was definitely walkable to a lot of new York’s sightseeing landmarks and a lot of good restaurants around.

title: Absolute Top Lage / super freundliches Personal
text: Absolute Toplage, sehr nettes Personal aber leider etwas abgenutztes Möbiliar. Ansonsten super / Liegt direkt zwischen 5 Ave. & Broadway am Empire State Building. Wir hatten ein Zimmer im 18 Stock mit Blick auf eben solches. Bisschen größere Zimmer wäre toll gewesen, aber das ist meckern auf höchstem Niveau. Wir würden das Hotel auf jeden Fall wieder buchen.

title: An excellent stay at Le Soleil in a great location that is walkable to everything!
text: We had a wonderful stay at Hotel Le Soleil in NYC. The staff was helpful and friendly, the room was great (we had an upgraded suite) and the bed very comfortable. On arrival the lobby was warm and festive with a fire, lovely tree and hot chocolate! We had on small issue...a plugged sink, and they fixed it within 15 minutes! There is also a great little restaurant that serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The location is perfect for walking to most things or a quick subway ride. I highly recommend this hotel and will be returning the next time we are in the city!

title: Needs major updates
text:
We chose to stay here due to location and the fact that we love the Vancouver Le Soleil hotel. How disappointing that the place was so dated. I was with my Mom who is in her 70s so got the queen suite and I slept on the sofa bed which was stained. I had to ask twice for a duvet as they only provide a thin blanket. Our coffee maker was broken too so had to ask twice for that. 

It was very very clean and the staff was pleasant. The Trademark restaurant was really nice as well. 

With some updates the place would be great.

title: Best front desk team
text: Best front desk team I have experienced in NYC ( and globally) in a long time or perhaps ever. Shelly , Erani, Yadira were awesome as was the rest of the team whose names I did not catch. They also created a very festive holiday atmosphere and the rooms were kept clean with nice beds and crisp bedding

title: First timers in NYC
text: This was our first trip to New York. It was an early 60th Birthday celebration for my wife. The hotel was perfectly located and walking distance to so many sights. Our room had an excellent view of the Empire State Building and the hotel reception staff made our stay even more enjoyable. Special thanks to Meredith, Eranny, Yadira and Andre (the chocolate connoisseur) who made us feel so welcome and special. P.S. just sorry we couldn’t find any Galaxy chocolate for you all to try. Happy Christmas to you all.

title: Delightful boutique hotel with all the amenties of a large property and a staff that is amazing!
text:
The hotel is so gracious and so warming and so hospitable.   The staff made me feel so welcomed and the staff was totally accomodating!   Truly going out of thier way to provide the best service possible.  
I love this hotel and would never stay anywhere else around this area.   
Steve, the manager was most kind and made me feel as if this was a home away from home with many amenities.
In addition to the wonderful service and the delightful people at the front desk the room was very spacious and extremely well lit. 
I highly recommend this hotel!

title: A pleasant experience.
text:
We were greeted, by friendly, efficient check in staff and we were given our room keys. Unfortunately, there was no bell boy to assist us with our bags this would have been helpful as we had a wheelchair plus luggage. 

Our room, was well proportioned for New York consisting of a double bed, a separate lounge area with a sofa bed. In the room there is a desk which is in a poor position. When sat at the desk access to the bathroom and bedroom are limited. 

Water pressure in the bathroom shower could be better. And the mattress for the sofas was only suitable for small children due to it being wafer thin. However, bedding and pillows were comfortable. 

We liked the free (pre payed) beverages in reception. Beverages included: coffee, hot chocolate, fruit infused water. Although, the addition of cucumber to the water rendered the other fruit pointless. Something we had noticed in America is that the rest of the world recycling efforts are pointless due to there overuse of plastic. An example of this, plastic cups wrapped in plastic bags. 

The location of this hotel is excellent. The majority of New York sites are available within walking distance.

Overall, a good solid choice for a New York hotel.

title: Great hotel in NY
text: Great hotel, very attentive and helpful staff, well located, a great option for those who come to enjoy New York, when I return to NY I will definitely stay at the Lesoil Hotel due to the excellence of the days I stayed there

title: The Worst Experience I Have Ever Had at a Hotel, Ruined Our Trip to NYC
text:
On the last night of our stay (Saturday, 12/2--which coincidentally was my birthday) at around 8pm, a member of housekeeping burst into our room during the most private time a couple can share. It was absolutely humiliating. There was music playing and it had to have been obvious from outside that the room was occupied. When I put on a robe and went out into the hall to find out what was so important that she had to enter the room without permission she didn't even apologize. 

The problems with The Executive started when we got to the original room on Thursday 11/30. First and foremost, the room was insulting for the price point, but more importantly, looking around there were small holes in the ceiling and it just did not have the feel being worth anywhere near what we were spending. Within minutes I also found a hole in the frame of the window and cold air from the street was pouring into the room. I called down to the front desk and they were accommodating and moved us to a suite on a low floor for no additional charge. 

On Saturday we tried the restaurant Trademark that's part of the hotel for brunch. It was one of the worst experiences I've had at a restaurant. Our server was completely overwhelmed and verging on hostile to us, other guests and the staff. I ordered the 'Eggs in Hell' and it was one of the worst dishes I've ever been served at a restaurant. I sent it back for the bacon egg and cheese croissant. The only saving grace of the meal was the manager that came in around 1pm who tried her best to turn things around for us. We didn't have to see the original server again and to her credit she really made the remainder of the meal excellent for us. Unfortunately, it was too late to salvage the visit and I wouldn't ever come back to the restaurant.

But all pales in comparison to what I described above. Housekeeping just bursting into the room after 8pm on a Saturday night at the absolute worst possible moment and then not even apologizing. If anything she seemed put out by the experience, herself. 

I worked with Nico at the front desk who, to his credit, did his best in a terrible situation. We were somewhat compensated for what happened but it was ugly enough that compounded with everything else made me just want to go home. It ruined the rest of the night and the trip. Absolutely do not recommend.

title: Outstanding Hotel
text:
This hotel was SPOTLESS and the staff was at the desk 24/7 ready to meet every need.  They gave us umbrellas, ordered a car for the airport and helped me with a personal emergency with discretion.  
This hotel is in the top two of my all-time favorites and I will certainly stay with them again and have already told people about our stay in NYC and how this hotel made the difference between and great trip instead of a muddy rainy weekend in New York.

title: Great location
text:
Every thing was just perfect! Definitely I would stay again.
It was well decorated. I loved the chimney, We took beautiful pictures in the hotel. We were picked up in the airport by the council, excellent on time!

title: Excelente Servicio
text: El hotel esta ubicado en una muy buena zona de NY, su personal presta una excelente atención y sus instalaciones tienen todo lo que uno necesita para visitar la ciudad por trabajo o por turismo, es ideal para conocer la ciudad e ir de compras.

title: Very good
text: Fantastic hotel, with which the staff knows how to lull any customer.  Friendly staff, very knowledgeable and helpful. Positioned to visit many famous and important places in New York City .  A must try because it provides a great service.

title: Fantastic
text: After booking several different hotels in the past, we have found our NYC home! We have stayed here multiple times and love the central location, the warm accommodating staff, the comfortable rooms. Consistently wonderful.

title: First time at Le Soleil
text: It was our first time staying at Hotel Le Soleil and we had a very nice experience.  Our son was recovering from knee surgery and the staff was very helpful in offering us a shower chair and a room with a larger ADA bathroom.  The hotel is very nice, and the entire staff is helpful and friendly.  We really liked having 2 Queen beds as opposed to full.  The location is close to Bryant Part, 5th Ave and 6th Ave shopping.  I highly recommend this place.

title: Thanksgiving week
text: I have booked this hotel again and persuaded my husband because of the location and nice room.  We stayed a couple of nights last year.  Although we have had several options, he agreed because I liked the hotel.  From the moment of coming back and being greeted so kindly until we got to the room and were surprised!  Probably because of the comeback, we got an update to the room: an extra room with a coffee machine and microwave.  Staffed reception and very nice.  Would like to thank Louis and specifically Eranny who was very understanding, helpful and very professional!  ❤️ Close to Herald squire subway station, slightly further to Time squire and Penn station.  Sights and fine restaurants, cafes around.  Clean every day and very nice!  Chocolate in the evening on one occasion.  And on the last day, we were offered a taxi to the airport at an attractive price by the concierge when we left our luggage after check-out, so we didn't have to think about it!  We will definitely book only this hotel in the future! 😁👏

title: Excellent stay!
text: We loved our stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil!!!! From the moment we were greeted at the door, to when we left using the wonderful car service, we had an amazing time. The lobby’s so cozy with its big fire place. Coffee and hot chocolate we delish! Rooms were nice and clean. Quick walk to subway. Would definitely stay there again.

title: The BEST customer service of any hotel
text: I discovered this hotel through my mom. She stayed the weekend before me and had an equally great experience. The staff absolutely went above and beyond for both of us. I was visiting NYC for a bootcamp that was subsequently cancelled. I had made arrangements in Brooklyn but had a horrible experience and could not sleep with heavy traffic noise and no security or locks on the doors of the accommodation and no wifi (Outsite). I had shared a room with my mom at Le Soleil the weekend before and slept great so I trudged back to Manhattan with all of my stuff to see if they had any rooms available to fit me in that night for a week stay. Despite being completely full, they were able to find me a room that fit my budget (that even included a view of the empire states building!) and took incredible care of me throughout the stay. The staff are so warm and personable and I just loved chatting with them. Everyone who works there deserves the highest praise. Le Soleil truly prioritizes guests experience and only hires the best of the best. Also, the location is AMAZING. This is a hidden gem that I secretly hope too many people don't discover so their prices remain extremely reasonable! Thank you so much! I truly cannot say enough nice things about this hotel.

title: Great Experience - Thanksgiving Week
text: We had an excellent time in NYC. Hotel experience was wonderful and I would recommend to anyone. So close to most of what we wanted to see that we could walk and great food options nearby including restaurant in the hotel.

title: Superlativo
text: Come immagini un hotel a New York?va oltre le più rosee aspettative. Dalla prima volta in cui ci siamo entrati ci siamo sentiti a casa, lo staff è gentilissimo, camere impeccabili e pulite tutti i giorni, la posizione è centrale e comoda per visitare la città, metro vicina e molti bei locali dove passare la serata, la hole è magnifica, calda e accogliente con il camino, un ringraziamento particolare alla signora della reception con i capelli rossi

title: Warm welcome and friendly team
text: This is the second year we stayed at this hotel, so pleased we came back. The hotel is cozy and rooms comfy. But most of all the staff are fantastic, from the ladies who cleaned our room, the two front door porters and reception team, Yadira & Eranny, and Steve the Ops Manager - you make it special, thank you. ❤️

title: Best staff in any NY hotel
text: The rooms are pretty much the same in most mid range hotels in Manhattan, but in the 26 years I’ve been visiting, I have never stayed anywhere where the staff are so lovely - every one of them. It’s like a family and I feel like I’ve come home when I stay here. Special thanks to Stephen, Nicole, Yadira and Eranny. See you all next year.

title: Definitely Stay Here
text: We stayed here for 6 nights during Thanksgiving for our son to march in the Macy's Great American Marching Band. It was a wonderful experience. The staff were friendly, an anomaly in the city, and always accommodating. The rooms were clean and had enough room for the three of us. One of my favorite things to do was drink the complimentary coffee by the fireplace in the morning. They had complimentary hot chocolate for the guests in the afternoon. Christmas music was playing in the lobby, and it was such a festive atmosphere. The location is unbelievable. We were right around the corner from Macy's. The only thing I can think of as an improvement would be the fitness center. It had a strong odor. But that is the only thing that needs improving. I really hope that this hotel serves as the band's "Parent Hotel" next year!

title: Great hotel in Manhattan!
text: I love this hotel! Been coming here several times and I love it. Great staff, very friendly, always ready to help. Clean and beautiful rooms. Shelley Nikki and Louis are the BEST, they deserve a raise!

title: Highly recommend!!
text: We stayed at this property for the week of Thanksgiving for our son to march in the parade. Hotel location is convenient to restaurants, shopping, and the subway. Hotel staff was super friendly and helpful and accommodating. Beds were comfortable and extra pillows, coffee pods, and complimentary bottled water were delivered upon request. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Thanksgiving in the city.
text: Loved the location and amenities. Close to great food, Broadway, Times Square, and easy subway access to the rest of the city. The staff was friendly and the daily happy hour was great after a long day wondering the city.

title: One of the best hotel experiences I've ever had
text: I couldn't be any happier with the stay I had in this hotel. The service is top notch and I suggest anyone who wants a great place to stay pick this one. Everyone was so nice and approachable and was very accommodating to my family and I. The hotel is very clean and the beds are so comfortable. I really can't wait to go back. Some of the names I want to give a special thanks be to are Nikko, Keron, Shelly, Nicole, Jaime Meredith, Will and whoever else I missed. I thank you all and I greatly appreciate the job you guys do to make people feel like they're at home.

title: A lovely evening with great accommodations.
text: Warm welcome, beautiful ambience, upgrade for a special celebration , lovely decor. I. The center of it all, yet a place where you can find peace & quiet. We plan to be back soon. We really enjoyed it

title: Great Hotel!
text: Loved our stay! Clean, beautiful, with a friendly staff. It felt very elegant for a very reasonable price. We will stay here again! It's right in the heart of Manhattan, an easy walk to Empire State Building, Grand Central Station, Broadway, Times Square, Central Park, and more. Bonus: there's a wonderfully delicious bagel shop right outside, Pio Bakery, that we fell in love with and went every morning for breakfast.

title: Amazing stay
text: One of the best hotels I’ve stayed at! Truly a pleasant experience, yadira at the front desk helped us check in and nikko, jimmy, and Jaun helped make our stay amazing! The location is great too. we stayed in a queen suite which had a nice sized room and didn’t feel cramped at all. The beds were comfortable and overall the staff was very pleasant, the hotel was cute and well decorated it also had a great restaurant! I will definitely be coming back on my next trip to New York City!

title: Super location… great staff
text: This is a perfect location to base yourself to see the sights of New York. The rooms were great value, very spacious and clean. Best of all was the staff. They were so kind, friendly and helpful. Especially Shelly behind the front desk. Would definitely book again.

title: Amazing Hotel and location! A must stay!
text:
LOVED absolutely EVERYTHING about our three day stay! A friend and I went to New York as our first mom’s getaway ever!    For business or pleasure this is the perfect Hotel! The rooms are  spacious and very clean. The beds are comfortable and there was in room coffee.  It was difficult to leave! The hotel is beautiful and clean with so many special unique touches.
 I cannot say enough great things about the staff too! 
Jimmy, Yaya, Steve, Andre, Eranny, thank you for everything. You all went above and beyond! From our early check-in., keeping our bag safe while we explored the city, helping me find shoes for my sore feet, advice on things to do, writing, down directions, helping organize our delicious breakfast at Trademark restaurant in the hotel, and help no matter what time of the day or night!  The staff remembered what we were doing the night before, and asked about it the next day! There was  fresh water and coffee in the lobby, a cozy fireplace area , complimentary red  and white in the evening.  We will be back thank you guys for an amazing stay!

title: Cosy, welcoming and charming stay
