text: Beautiful hotel in a great location. Staff are fantastic - very kind and friendly. Clean rooms with good soundproofing. Nice lobby that's very welcoming and good restaurant downstairs. Short walk to subway and good value.

title: Cosy and friendly hotel in a great location
text:
Rooms were very clean, staff were friendly and the hotel is a comfortable and cosy place to stay. Great value for money, especially with the complimentary food and drink.

The adjacent restaurant/bar was also a good place to have a drink either before or after evening activities

title: Fantastic stay.
text: We had a FABULOUS stay. Honestly it was amazing. Best hotel I’ve ever stayed at and friendliest staff ever. Jimmy, Steve, Eranny, Yaya, and Andre were INCREDIBLE. I can’t say enough about them. It was fabulous. Thank you for making us feel like family.

title: Thank You for an amazing stay
text: Exceptional service! I have stayed in plenty of hotels in midtown manhattan for business. They are all good, but not the customer service you get at Le Soleil!!!! Thank you to the entirr team and thank you to Yadira who has been been greeting me and making my reservations dor the past 5 years. The rooms are always cleaned and they welcome you. Thank you also to Steve and Jamie for all information on food. Thanks Le Soleil

title: Perfect Hotel with nothing to complain about.
text: Phenomenal service, great location, friendly staff, alongside more reasons to book here.  My friends and I came to Executive Hotel Le Soleil for a convention and wanted a closer spot and its unbelievable how perfect it was here. We will definitely be coming back!

title: Fab hotel
text: Great hotel, friendly staff, wonderful stay, I loved the room, view was amazing and it was super comfortable.  The staff went above and beyond to help out, they were super accommodating and it was a really clean and beautiful hotel. I’d definitely come back for my next stay

title: NYC Trip
text: This is an excellent hotel in a great location, highly recommend and would stay there again which would be a first for me in New York. Staff are very friendly and professional at all times and nothing is too much trouble for them

title: Appreciated/welcome
text: My stay at the hotel was awesome 👌🏾  upon our early arrival at the hotel we was greeted by an employee name Steve who made us feel welcome and really comfortable he also checked in on us throughout our stay. I really appreciated that.

title: Come visit le soleil
text: I have to leave a review and thank Yadira, Eranny for always assisting me when I come to the Hotel. This is my third time here and they know my name immediately. The rooms are always up to par and I am immediately happy.  The restaurant Trademark definitely give them a try and speak with the doorman Jamie for any assistance with taxi. Overall I just want to thank everyone for making me always feel a home away from home.

title: NEW YORK FOR BUSINESS
text:
Hotel in excelent position, even if for the traffic uber has some trouble to come in
nice atmosphere
room are clean and people at desk very nice
the neighborough are safe  and for me it is very important

title: Wonderful hotel
text: Beautiful hotel with wonderful staff  Steve was so warm and welcoming and helped with anything we wanted at any time  restaurant was good too but nothing beats the welcome and warmth of Steve and his staff   Definitely highly recommend

title: Great hotel
text: This hotel is beautiful! And the people at the front desk were super sweet and helpful! From the moment we walked in everyone was smiling and friendly! Luis was very helpful as well even before I got into the doors! Would stay here again

title: Excellent Hotel
text: We decided to try a boutique hotel and not stay at another Hyatt, it was the best decision.  From the warm welcome we received from Shelley at the front desk to the accommodations provided.  The hotel is beautifully decorated for xmas and it was the perfect setting for our family weekend in NYC to see the Rockettes.  The location is perfect if you are a foodie! Will come back for the friendly and professional treatment from the staff! Than you Shelley and Nicole for making our stay a memorable one!

title: Perfect for a last-minute short stay
text: I could have been content here another one or two nights, as the place was very well kept, well-serviced and the rooms were comfy. The bed area is very compact, but it’s New York. The bathroom was very spacious, well-lit and clean. The fitness center was totally adequate for a simple workout, and that was important for me, too. It was so easy to get here from JFK. Just a few stops on the LIRR to Penn Station and then an easy walk to the hotel. Would stay here again.

title: Family of 4 great place to stay!
text: This was a great Hotel with an excellent location. The staff go above and beyond to welcome guests and provide anything you may need. We stayed with our two teenage daughters so we really appreciated the separation between the bedroom area and the sofa area. Many great restaurants and bars nearby. It was so quiet we slept in more than we planned to! Would definitely recommend for the price and the positive experience.

title: Amazing stay
text: Staff was AMAZING this is my second time here and Shelley Nicole and nikko were so GREAT and was able to upgrade my room with no problem. Hotel was super clean and everyone is super friendly. Will definitely come back again

title: Book it! Worthy of the hype. A great nyc hotel.
text: Book it! I did a lot of research before booking a nyc hotel. This hotel lives up to the reputation. Amazing location, close to so much. Lots of amazing food within walking distance. The rooms are spacious. They aim to please with the service. The complimentary coffee in the morning, hot chocolate in the afternoon, and fruit infused water is a treat. They are consistent about keeping your room stocked with coffee pods, water bottles and toiletries. All staff we encountered were nice and keen to help. The beds were comfy and the room was very surprisingly quiet! I never heard an outdoor noise-so shocking! I am very happy with this choice

title: Fantastic Hotel and Staff, Highly Recommend
text: I highly recommend this hotel. I have stayed here twice so far, both times for a week and I will be back. Each time I was met with the most friendly and helpful hotel staff across each department. They are very accommodating, helpful and friendly at all times of the day. In particular, Sunil is someone I would like to mention for his superb hospitality in making guests feel very welcomed and comfortable. I stay in NYC routinely for business travel and this is the nicest hotel staff I have had the pleasure to interact with. Additionally the hotel is very clean, the rooms are spacious and the windows are highly sound proof. They also provide free: hot chocolate, fruit infused water, bottled water, soaps/lotions, and wifi. The rooms have fridges, comfortable beds, and great showers. The location is also great and easily accessible to restaurants, the subway, and more. They have a rewards program and you can usually get better rates booking through their website because they offer a discounted rate that way. They also offer transportation to and from all three airports. The chauffeur rates are very reasonable and the drivers and SUVs they drive you in are much nicer than Ubers or taxis. The front desk can help set up transit. Overall, I really like this hotel a lot.

title: Stay in NYC
text: Highly recommend this hotel. Excellent friendly staff for whom nothing was too much trouble and room spotless every day. One the best by far in NYC! Very good sized room especially by New York standards

title: Awesome
text: Shelly and Nikko  are amazing they had great customer service and made me feel welcome and like family thank you guys  I will come back here again  I felt so blessed to come here because the price was even better than I thought thanks

title: Una settimana a NY, novembre 2023.
text:
Location molto carina, 5 minuti a piedi da Times Square con fermata metro nelle vicinanze.

Stanza al 18esimo piano con vista sull’Empire e di giusta metratura per essere a New York. Pulizia ogni giorno!! (moolto importante)
Personale sempre gentile e disponibile!!
Acqua sempre disponibile sia in camera (ogni giorno ci venivano lasciate delle bottigliette) sia alla reception. 

Hotel da tener sempre di riferimento se si vuol alloggiare al centro della città e riuscire a muoversi tranquillamente a piedi o con i mezzi pubblici.

title: Prefect hotel
text: Steve is FABULOUS ! Lovely quaint hotel. 5 stars all day!! Love the room and the staff. Beautiful lobby and the restaurant is very delicious with very nice staff. We can't wait to return again in a few minths

title: Unexceptional
text: The location of the hotel is great, the appearance of the hotel is nice, but the substance is poor. Especially the experience at breakfast! It's the only hotel I know which has no buffet for breakfast, but just an a la carte service. The choice is not rich and the service very slow.

title: Great place for a work conference
text: I've been holding a work conference at Hotel Le Soleil for the past three years and we always have a fabulous stay. The rooms are luxurious and comfortable. The staff is friendly and accommodating, and the location is amazing. The conference room facilities are first rate. I highly recommend Hotel Le Soleil!

title: Friendly staff, great location, small comfy rooms
text: A very nice hotel in a great location. Walking distance to Penn station and the theatre district. I was here to meet with my MFA writing group, so we had the basement meeting room for several days. The room is a bit stuffy and badly needs one or more quiet air purifiers, but it was suitable for our needs. The elevators are slow, and because each floor is small (the hotel has many small floors) the elevator wait can be long. Also, no room is entirely out of earshot of the elevator bell. Avoid the second floor, where the ice machine is right in the hall. Staff is very friendly and helpful and the lobby comfortable. Bellmen quite helpful, too.  Overall, I'd stay here again.

title: Sunshine in NYC: Executive Hotel Le Soleil
text:
We were delighted with our find of this lovely 4 diamond boutique hotel conveniently located on 36th Street between 5th and 6th avenue. In an area packed with large chain hotels this executive hotel is a true gem. It is an easy walk to theater, restaurants, Macy's, the fashion district, and all that New York has to offer.

Rooms are clean and comfortable and the small lobby seating area with a gas fireplace, and comfortable seating was a terrific place to talk with friends and enjoy a glass of complementary wine in the afternoon. The adjacent Trademark Bar & Restaurant was also quite good.

I've stayed in many 4 star hotels around the world, but what makes this property exceptional is the warmth and attentiveness of the staff. All of the Guest Service Agents were great, even those on the desk at 6:30 AM when we checked out for an early flight. I want to mention Yadira, Eranny, and Meredith who were extra special. But in naming them, I also want to stress that all the staff we interacted with from the bellman to the concierge were excellent. This includes Steven the operations manager, who wanted to ensure our stay was comfortable. Every time we returned to the hotel we were greeted warmly, and felt that they were truly welcoming us home. 

We will definitely stay here again.

title: Great hotel!
text:
Really enjoyed my stay at this fabulous hotel. The staff is really friendly and will help you with every request whether its an umbrella or ordering transport to the airport.  
The rooms are great and with spacious bathrooms. I really recommend this due to the great location, you can easily walk to Time Square or take the metro.

title: A true home away from home
text: The Executive Hotel was a breath of fresh air in the middle of NYC. I was thrilled to have an amazing night's sleep with quality blankets and pillows while on a business trip, and still be a few blocks from the office. The staff are extremely friendly and went out of their way to make me feel at home. 11/10 service, and I will be returning!

title: An elegant and warm Hotel experience!
text: From the moment I arrived this past week for a vacation , to my departure I felt so welcomed by their kind staff especially Steve and Sunil ! The rooms are amazing , views spectacular, the lobby is elegant , the restaurant is so delicious. And, again, each staff member would do whatever you needed and make great recommendations for enjoying NYC. An example is that ever morning the lobby served fresh coffee and special treats and at end of day they would serve wine or cold beverage:)

title: Amazing experience
text: I would stay again. The location is amazingly close to Macy's, H and M and so much shopping and dinning. It's so much walking that you can do to experience so much. Please stay there so that you can enjoy what i have experienced.

title: Great location
text: We stayed here as a family of 4.  The hotel experience was a good one.  We felt very welcome as soon as we walked in - friendly staff and flavoured cold water to refresh yourself.  Check-in/out and all in between was easy and quick.  The room was big enough for the 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 teens.  The temperature was easy to control. The facilities were as described. The staff were very helpful with whatever we needed.  We enjoyed the bar and restaurant although was a little pricey for breakfast/brunch. The location is great, just minutes on foot away from The Empire State Building and Times Square and Fifth Avenue. We walked all the way to Rockefeller Centre and beyond.

title: Comfy beds, quiet stay
text: This place is great. The staff is awesome and always helpful. The beds are comfy and the sheets are quiet…not starchy like some places. The pillows aren’t those crappy little squares some hotels give you. Two pillows cover the entire bed, as was intended. There’s an extra blanket which is nice and soft, not the cord woven kind that leave indents in your skin. Would definitely recommend a stay here. Also, the Keg Room bar across the street is a perfect accompaniment. Great location, too.

title: Best place to stay in NYC!!!!!!!!!
text:
The best hotel experience you can have in New York City!
So many things make this hotel amazing.
1. Great location
2. Great rooms
3. The best staff of any hotel in New York City!
4. The best group of guys at the front door and Concierge to help you out!!
5. Everything about your hotel room is immaculate and perfect!
6. Best shower I've ever had in New York City!
7. And did I say the best staff ever? Ever ever?
8. Forget the rest.... Executive Hotel Le Soleil is number one!!!!!

title: Personal feel to a midtown hotel.
text:
Very comfortable bed and room great view of Empire State building...New York City.
Sunil Vaswani Assistant front office manager very helpful on our first evening advising where to visit and good reasonable restaurant infact gave lots of information. And made us feel very welcome. Nikko Wong, also a front office assistant manager  gave helpful info. Spent 3 nights at the hotel and all staff made the experience great.

title: No name but great clean classy little hotel
text:
Clean classy no name little hotel
Great location 
In-house restaurant 
Good restaurants close by
Close to everything 
Safe
Free wine in the evening free coffee in the morning 
Great lobby with seats 
Great decor 
Comfy beds 
The only negative is the elevators get busy at peak hours 
I give it an A

title: HORRIBLE PLACE
text:
I stayed here for a conference I was attending in NYC. I hated it. The front desk lady (can't remember her name) was the worst. She was loud and couldn't be if any assistance when I needed to cxl my booking because it was unfortunate that right after I landed in NYC at Midnight but needed to fly back home the next morning as my father had been admitted for surgery. I had booked the hotel through Priceline and spoke to agent at Priceline and was at the lobby while Priceline had to contact the hotel to do the cancellation. So, I could hear the front desk lady talking to the Priceline agent and was super rude. So, I asked to talk to her myself and she just wouldn't even try to understand the situation I was in but just being loud and saying no, there is nothing she could do. Not even politely saying what she needed to say. 

Anyway, the bedsheets were smelly as if they had not been changed from the past guest. The shower is built cheap as water just leaks on the floor. The rooms are super tiny, if you are claustrophobic I would say not to stay here coz you gotta remember the windows don't open either. The toilet clogged and they had to come fix it. 

Overall, it was UNPLEASANT stay.

title: Excelente Hotel, buena ubicación y lo mejor de todo su personal
text: Viaje con mi pareja, y a parte de la excelente ubicación, el buenísimo desayuno y las amplias habitaciones, el trato de todo el personal fue inmejorable, sobre todo hago especial mención a Yadira y a Eranny, que en recepción nos ayudaron  en todo lo que necesitamos siempre con una sonrisa y amabilidad total.

title: "Exceptional Stay with Outstanding Service at Executive Hotel Le Soleil, New York
text: I recently stayed at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil in New York and had an excellent experience. The staff, especially Jamie, Nikko, and Sunil, provided top-notch service and made my stay truly enjoyable. The hotel's ambiance was inviting, and the rooms were comfortable and clean. I highly recommend this hotel for a great New York City stay.

title: Absolute recommendation for both private and business stays.
text:
The team at Executive Hotel Le Soleil is, to sum it up in one word, fantastic! Nikko, Sunil, Jamie and the entire front desk team are the epitome of what being hospitable means.

The hotel's location is perfect, the rooms are more than satisfactory and quite spacious by New York standards. The gym provides everything you need. The price-quality ratio is excellent.

This hotel is unquestionably in the top 3 of my favorite hotels in New York City. Even during my 8th visit, the entire Le Soleil staff managed to exceed my expectations (and those of my team) once again.

It's an absolute recommendation for both private and business stays in The City that Never Sleeps.

title: Safe, Clean, Upscale.
text: There were 3 of us in one room and the hotel was extreme to accommodating to our many requests for extra towels or trash pick ups. The staff was very friendly and had many recommendations for things to do. I would stay there again. Safe clean upscale.

title: AMAZING!!
text: We have been in NY several times but this is the first time that we stayed in LE SOLEIL Hotel. The hotel is in the heart of NY, one step from Herald Square and Macy's, next to the TIMES SQUARE, the National Library and in a short distance from MOMA, METROPOLITAN Museum etc. Our  rooms (Executive Queen Suites) were very comfortable and very clean-linen and towels changed every day. The hotel offers bottles of water daily in the rooms - another plus is the coffee machine in every room. When we arrived at the hotel we found a box of chocolates for welcome in our rooms. In the hotel reception area there is always fruti flavores cold water for the visitors as well as coffee or hot chocolate. In the afternoon the staff in the front office offers wine. The staff is very helpful and very kind (all of them)> Many many thanks to Mr Sunil Vaswani, Assistant Front Office Manager, as he was always willing to help us and he did the best he could for us in order to feel great. Many thanks also to Mr Nikko Wong, Assistant Front Officer Manager, for his kindness and willingness to assist. In conclusion our stay in the hotel  was extremely comfortable and it is highly recommended to the visitors.

title: A family friendly stay.
text: The hotel was new and modern and the room was well appointed for my family of 4. The location is perfect, it's right in the heart of midtown, yet the rooms are quiet and tranquil. What really sets this hotel apart is the staff! Everyone I encountered was extremely helpful and eager to help! Special shout out to Luis and Will! Thanks again and we'll be back soon!

title: Perfect place in nyc
text:
Perfect place to stay in nyc 
Very clean quiet and the staff is Amazing . A perfect location . Rooms are confortable very clean . Hôtel closed to main attractions but very quiet . 
We will Côme back very soon

title: Give the staff a raise—-they make this hotel such a pleasant experience!
text: This is not only a clean, beautiful hotel, but the staff are kind and so helpful!  In particular, I want to thank Yadira, Eramy and Jimmy for helping us on a very stressful morning. We had to get an emergency passport for my husband and they so helpful!  The evening staff was also kind and helpful. Soft beds, good towels, and a great staff. You cannot go wrong here!

title: Love It Here!
text: I've stayed here several times over the past few years.  The front desk staff is always welcoming and helpful.  Rooms are very well appointed and quiet! I like that they have their own car service to the airport-makes everything very convenient. I'll definitely stay there again!

title: Great location, great value.
text: Great location within walking distance to times square.and many restaurants and other attractions. Very nice Accommodatit's would definitely stay here again. We felt that the value was good. We booked the room with the pull out sofa bed and did not get a good view of the city and I believe the guest services host told us that all of those rooms are lower level and usually not a good view.

title: A+ Staff
text:
One of the best Hotels I have ever stayed in. I was greeted by a friendly front Desk Agent By the name Luis; who gave me great directions. He was always in a Good mood and a bright smile at every encounter. Also had nice conversation with nikko that gave me his business card when checking in. Nice room friendly staff. Housekeeping missed my room 2 times during my stay but Luis quickly made up for it by getting me some toiletries and having them clean my room while I was at dinner. 

Would stay again

title: Fantastic boutique hotel in a great location
text: My 11 year old son and I loved our stay at Le Soleil.  We were on the 9th floor, and our room was well appointed and very quiet.  All staff were incredibly friendly and helpful.  The attached Trademark Restaurant was a great spot for happy hour and dinner.  Location is ideal!  2 blocks from nearest subway station and about 6 blocks from Penn Station.  We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

title: Great location and hotel
text:
I liked very much the location of the hotel
The room was good conditions
Hotel staff was perfect welcoming especially the front desk manager was very helpful and warm guy who helped us a lot with suggestion for the city

title: Errany above and beyond experience
text: This review is a special thank you to Errany who should be recognized for her top tier customer service. The hotels location was perfect for me and it had enough but what really set the experience apart was the handwritten card Errany had sent to me room, she remembered my name when I entered and exited the hotel making an effort to have a natural and pleasant exchange. She made it feel like family was there. Thank you

title: Beautiful hotel, 10/10 customer service
text: Overall great experience. The hotel is in a great location, big spacious rooms and an even friendlier staff. Every single employee I encountered went out of their way to assist my wife and I. Yadira was wonderful when we arrived and William the manager went out of his way to assist us with an issue we had with citibike. I can't wait to return. Thanks again for the hospitality!

title: Comfortable Stay Near Midtown
text: I had a great week long stay here. Super well located hotel easy to get everywhere in NYC. The room was spacious and clean! Will and Nikko of the staff made sure my stay was very comfortable! I will be coming back!

title: Lovely hotel
text:
Perfect location and lovely staff especially Sunil Vaswani was  great  guy who made our trip better with lovely advice and hospitality.
Hotel location is very centered where you reach many populat location and also block away subway stations

title: Hotel rapport qualité -prix trés bien
text:
we stayed at this hotel from September 29 to October 4.
We were welcomed very pleasantly by the staff, both the concierge and the reception team.
Our stay was very pleasant in this hotel, which is not noisy at all and which is in the heart of Broadway, not very far from Time Square.
The room was very nice, the mattress was very comfortable. We will return to this hotel next year.
Thank you to all the staff for making us feel welcome.
Sincerely. Denis Parenti Envoyé de mon iPhone

title: Mistake on charging and no return
text: At check-in I gave my credit card number. At check out my friend paid the accomodation with her credit card.  Later, the hotel sent me a message excusing for mistake of charging the accidental fee of USD 100/day on my name and the money would be turned back untill Oct, 9th. Now, they don't answer my messages. Will I get my money back? I really don't know.

title: Hidden Gem, Best place to stay!
text:
Great room, very comfortable beds, very clean, great rate for Midtown Manhattan!  Breakfast was excellent.   Staff is beyond great, friendly and so helpful.  
Call the hotel direct and speak with Yadira for the best rates!  Shelly and Steven will answer your questions and Jamie will help you arrange transportation.
You can't go wrong staying here!!

title: Great hotel
text: Awesome location we were able to walk to everything.  Lots of great shopping close by! All staff were very helpful and friendly, especially Nikko!  Parking super easy and right down the street.  Hotel was very clean with fast elevators. Beds and pillows were extremely comfortable with no street noise. we will be staying here again soon.

title: Great location
text:
Overall good experience, location is good, staff was generally very friendly and helpful, room is clean only down side is the bed and sofa bed we had were not very comfortable.
Also having the sofa bed by the door made it impossible to get around the room without closing it. It was a struggle to even use the rest room once it was open.

title: Amazing Stay
text: The location is great, the staff is so friendly and helpful, the hotel is very clean and cozy, warm reception great size of bedroom and perfect view of Empire State Building, we loved everything and the food at the restaurant is very good as well

title: Great value and experience in midtown
text: Super friendly and hospitable staff - always very welcoming and I have come back regularly! Always clean room and (included) water in the room which is not true of so many NY hotels - but main thing is clean, friendly (especially Shelley and Meredith!) and reasonably priced in a great location.

title: Great hotel!
text:
My husband & I had a wonderful stay on our trip to
NYC. Clean, Comfortable & Classy NYC hotel! We were given a room with the most perfect view of The Empire State Building! Definitely would stay again and highly recommend! Thanks Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

title: Customer Service, comfort ✅
text: This was such a lovely, unexpected stay for us. Travel hazards left us stranded in New York City, when we had barely any mental capacity left to make a decision about where to stay. We found a great deal on Hopper.com for the Executive Hotel LeSoleil, and were greeted by the manager, Sunil Vaswani, who made sure everything from that point on went according to plan. We were checked in on frequently, offered a glass of wine upon arrival and provided lots of reassurance and comfort during our stay. We were so grateful to end up here. Thank you again for everything, Sunil!

title: Fantastic
text: I can assure, without being mistaken, our stay at the hotel was great. The attention of the staff, the comfort and its strategic location are unbeatable. It was definitely the best choice. We will return, without a doubt.

title: Best experience at NYC
text:
It was great due to shelley’s support during my support. Always taking care of our family with kindness.
We’re also first time in NYC and She was introducing best place to visit even though She was so busy for her work at hotel. She always takes care of customers!

title: My 2-day stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York
text: Excellent service and amazing flexibility on special request.  Keron - the concierge was extremely kind and helpful. Also Sunil and Shelly at the front desk were incredible and their customer service was beyond my expectations.  Thank you so much and I will definitely return during my next business trip to Manhattan.

title: Très bel hotel 4 étoiles très bien situé !!
text:
Très bel hôtel 4 étoiles très bien situé dans Manhattan.
Nous avions une petite suite avec kitchenette et une vue à couper le souffle sur l'Empire State Building !!! Des baies vitrées jusqu'en bas nous permettait une vue magique !!!
L'Operations Manager, Mrs Steven Kyriakides a été très attentionné avec nous et au fait que notre séjour soit parfait !!!
L'ensemble du personnel de cet hôtel est est très attentif à vos demandes !!
Autrement dit, si nous avons la chance de retourner à NYC, 'est aucun doute que nous choisirons ce même hôtel !!!

title: Would stay again, great choice.
text: Excellent location, walkable to so many attractions including Broadway, Times Square, Empire State Building.  Safe area, many food choices nearby too.  Room was spacious for NYC & loved the extra space with couch where husband could sit to read when waking up early which allowed me to sleep in undisturbed.  Staff was friendly & helpful too.  Would stay here again, no question.

title: Heavily used hotel. Not enough light. Didn’t like it.
text:
Furniture looked heavily used. There wasn't enough light in the room and in the bathroom. Weird design of the room. I don’t know where they found such outdated and gaudy furniture.

The stuff should find a way to better manage the luggage storage. Because they just leave all of your bags at the front door for quite a while. It’s unsafe.

Also, one day they just didn’t come to clean our room.

Location is the only good thing about this hotel.

title: Quick New York stay before New England cruise
text: Enjoyed our 2 night stay in Sept 2023.  Room was small but very clean, and a very convenient location for touring.  Staff was great - Shelly at the desk and Assistant Manager Sunil - very welcoming and helpful.  The attached restaurant Tradewinds was very good and convenient.  Would stay again if visiting New York.

title: This might be the best hotel for the price in NYC.
text:
As someone who travels to NYC frequently and has stayed at numerous hotels, the Le Soleil really exceeded my very high expectations. I'm going to address all the things that I look for in reviews of hotels, especially hotels in NYC, so that anyone looking to know the things I like to know, gets clear answers. 

Let's go inside-out. 
The room- I stayed in an Executive Queen Suite. Although this isn't their lowest priced room, the rate was similar to regular rooms in NYC. Based on that comparison, this room provides more space than the average NYC hotel room. What I really liked was the separate sleeping and living room areas. Typically, a larger hotel room in NYC is just 1-room that's larger, so more space to move around, but no separation of the space, excluding the bathroom. But, this room is great to feel some distance from TV watching in the living room to sleeping. Really great for more than one person. But, even someone traveling alone (like business travelers) will appreciate not feeling like you are staying in a closet. The room was very clean with great decor, a real desk and nice size bathroom. The room also had a mini-fridge, which is nice for those NYC leftovers and snacks.

The fitness center- I care a lot and wish reviews were more specific than just saying, "nice fitness room." This hotel had a decent size fitness room with several quality treadmills, a Peloton bike, free weights, and a multi-exercise strength machine.

The hotel staff and lobby- this was the friendliest and most willing to help hotel staff I have met in NYC. Some hotels have staff that say what they are told to say when talking to customers, but they don’t convey warmth and helpfulness. Not the case with this hotel. Everyone from the front door men, concierge guy, to the front desk, had a welcoming smile every time they asked if I needed anything.

Location- if you use Amtrak (Penn Station) or want to be close to the heart of tourism in NYC (Times Square) this hotel’s location is the perfect location to give you easy access to those sites without putting you in the middle of all the noise and traffic (both feet and cars). It’s an easy 10 minute walk to Penn Station or Times Square. Off a single line of traffic, so not the constant honking of cars that you get at some hotels.

title: A 4* on paper, but not in reality.
text:
My wife and I stayed September 2023 for 5 nights incorporating a 30th birthday celebration. Some considerable time was put into researching where to stay and Executive Hotel Le Soleil appeared to tick all of the boxes. 

The positives: 

The location is ideal for many of the attractions in New York and is within walking distance of most of them. There is a subway station close by for those attractions further away with regular services to Downtown Manhattan. 

We were allocated a room on Floor 16 which has a good view of the Empire State Building. 

Unfortunately, this is where the positives start and end. 

The room was in the main, clean and relatively spacious for New York, however the fully stocked mini bar (as described on the hotel’s own website) was found to be empty and switched off. I enquired about this with staff however was simply told that the minibars are no longer stocked. This is an unfortunate example of some misleading advertising. 

Furthermore, we returned at 6pm after a full day exploring to find that our room  had not been serviced. The room was serviced when we made the request, but again, the daily complimentary water was not replenished. 

The bracket to hold the shower in place was also broken. We raised this with 2 separate members of staff who assured us they would have an engineer attend to repair it, but this was not fixed by the time we left. 

The most frustrating part of our stay was on day 3 when (due to extreme weather) we enquired about ordering in room dining. A menu was provided to us and we placed an order at 7pm for 4x items to be delivered. At 9pm these items had not arrived and we were told the restaurant were working on it. In the many 4 and 5 star hotels across the world that my wife and I have stayed in, never has in room dining taken 2 hours and then still, the order not arrive. We cancelled and gave up in the end. 

For the prices charged, I simply cannot recommend staying at this property. Whilst the location is favourable, it is not worthy of the 4* status and you will find better service at other hotels across New York for a lower rate.  

A shame, we will not be returning nor recommending. The small things make the difference but the hotel seem to miss that concept.

title: Super recomiendado
text:
Ideal la ubicación y el servicio
Las instalaciones son muy cómodas, hay buena conexión a los subtes.
El personal muy amable y pendientes para hacer de nuestra estadía la mejor. 
Se puede almorzar y cenar en el hotel.

title: Le Soleil's reception personnel is exceptional!!!!
text:
Shelley @ reception made my stay most memorable - professional, polite, sweet, caring and personalized service.
The rest of the staff was very nice and attentive as well but Shelley really stood out!!!!

title: Great place in a great location….
text:
We were family of 4 and the executive suit was more than suitable for us. Great location close to all the attractions you want to see, close underground lines , and easy walk to either up or down town.
The front desk team was very attentive and responsive. I specifically want to mention Mr. Waswani - the assitant front desk manager - who personally took care of us and was very attentive to our feedback.
Would certainly come back

title: Lovely experience with extremely friendly staff
text: We had an excellent experience at Executive Hotel LeSoleil. We travelled with a young kid - and the hotel staff were welcoming, generous and very helpful. Rooms were cleaned twice a day. Special mention to Juan (who even bought a gift for our child) and Sunil at the front office. I highly recommend this hotel and its professionalism. Family Caruana Scicluna from Malta.

title: Beautiful, welcoming hotel and attentive staff at a great location
text: This is for sure one of my favorite hotels in New York! The rooms are very cozy and most importantly very clean! The service is truly amazing and what convinced me to come back to this hotel for my next New York trip! Niko was super friendly and very attentive! Latch was very friendly too and helped with anything needed right away! The location was amazing as well! Overall I would completely come back and recommend to friends and family.

title: na
text: We were not at all satisfied with the accommodation, we ordered a different room than the one we received - after two days!!! the room was changed to our satisfaction, a large spacious room without a kitchen. lines and everything was fine. It just took a little long and we couldn't unpack our suitcases for 2 days... the rooms were clean, cleaning every day, the staff at the reception was nice... REMINDER: when we went early in the morning for the booked flight at 6.00, we were not entitled to breakfast, although we had it paid in the price of accommodation €50 every day. It might be appropriate to prepare some packages at the same price as in other hotels...

title: Strong recommend!!
text:
Caring staff!!! Great thank you to manager Sunil, our flight got canceled and he went above and beyond to help us with an extended stay.
Location is great, room is clean and quiet. Would visit again if I'm ever in this area!!

title: Pessimo! Recepcionista pessima, quarto pessima
text:
Foi ruim! O quarto estava com o ralo da banheira entupido!
Depois a privada entupiu também, e a recepcionista em chamou no canto e disse se eu havia jogado um “tampão” na privada, pois eles haviam achado 2!!!! OU SEJA, EU SOU HÓSPEDE, PAGO CARO E AINDA TENHO QUE “LEVAR A CULPA” PELA PRIVADA ENTUPIDA!!! Eu não joguei NADA na privada, e achei um absurdo, um inconveniente essa mulher me perguntar isso! Uma falta de respeito! NÃO INDICO E NÃO VOLTO!!!!

title: Excellent experience.
text: Our stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil was wonderful. The hotel has a very attentive and helpful staff, the accommodation is excellent. The room is small but comfortable, well equipped and beautiful. The location couldn't be better, with easy access to all points and close to the metro station. A rarity in downtown NYC, the room amenities and comforts. I will certainly stay again at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil on my next trip.

title: Best hotel in NYC!
text: We had problems with the reservation in booking.com (they changed the date of the reservation before the payment) but the manager was very nice, he even helped us cancel the reservation without any fee and he was very nice all the time. The hotel is so tidy and pretty. I loved my stay!

title: Excellent hotel
text:
Loved our stay here! All the facilities of the room were so luxurious, high-quality, and comfortable. The staff is AMAZING and exceeded our expectations with spectacular service.
Specifically, Meredith and Yodira assisted us with a technical error about our booking with swift efficiency and thoughtfulness.
Overall, the Executive Hotel is a lovely place to stay for friends, couples, business trips, and families. I would recommend this place to anyone who wants to stay in a great location in Manhattan!

title: I will be back
text:
The Hotel is very beautiful!
The room was nice and comfortable!
The bathroom is very good! The hotel is near time square and other great places to visit!  All needs that my family and I had, the staff worked on it!

title: Always a good experience!
text:
This place never disappoints. The street is under construction currently, but nothing you can about that.  That said, the rooms are VERY quiet and clean.  Check in is quick, lots of nice restaurants close by and just a block
Or two away from lots of shopping and sightseeing (Macy’s and Empire State Building, et al).

title: Lovely Hotel with the Best Staff!
text:
The Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York was a lovely hotel and experience! The rooms were clean and well appointed (think a fresh robe, desk, comfy beds/linens, good blow dryer!) but most of all, the staff was SO generous and kind. I was there with my family for the weekend - including a baby and 7 year old, and they made it so easy to stay with kids. The concierge booked us a car back to the airport, taking extra care to show us the comparison in price to Uber and teaching us how to navigate the subway!

10/10 would recommend! Can't wait to go back!

title: Awesome Stay
text: Hotel is very comfortable and intimate. Quiet and easy. And the team is very accommodating and friendly. Restaurant also top notch. Very good team from top to bottom. Can’t wait to stay here again next time I am in NYC.

title: An absolute gem in the heart of Manhattan
text: Our stay at this hotel was amazing, and had the friendliest staff and the most convenient location to travel to and from, including it's close proximity to Penn Station, making it easy to reach from JFK.

title: We recommend 👌
text: Excellent location. Central yet quite. Have lots of option for food and shopping close by. Got great ideas about what to do in newyork from concierge and Steve.  We really recommend the Hotel. We will go again.

title: Unforgettable
text:
This has become our favourite hotel we’ve ever stayed in!!!
Not for the perfect location 
Not for the beautiful room 
But for the most amazingly attentive staff. Every single member of staff we dealt with was polite, friendly and professional. We were quite overwhelmed.

title: Excellent Value with Excellent Service
text:
This hotel isn't the fanciest, but it is a solid choice and excellent value. 
Clean and quiet room, friendly staff, convenient location to Times Square and Penn Station.
I had a small hiccup with a malfunctioning light fixture, and someone came right away and fixed it - which is all that was needed...but they apologized profusely, gave me a coupon for breakfast and went way above and beyond. That kind of customer service attitude is rare and deserves recognition!

title: Amazing location, even better staff.
text:
We booked this hotel for the location, but was very impressed by the size of the room and the top notch house keeping staff. 
This is a Great place to stay if you are going to a show on broadway,  an event at the garden, or amazing nightlife with Koreantown a few blocks away.

title: Perfect
text: I came into town for a birthday celebration. They set the room with flowers and cold champagne as I requested. Staff made all my request very easy and had suggestions on great food options. I will be back!

title: Great hotel, great location
text: We had a great experience here. The rooms were larger than we’re used to in New York hotels, and the location was super convenient. The staff was also fantastic, from the room service to the front desk. We really enjoyed our stay!

title: Great hotel in super convenient area!
text: We chose this hotel as it was very close to many of the sites we wanted to see as well as shopping.  It did not disappoint. We had a large room with a queen bed and a separate area with a sofa sleeper. It was absolutely perfect for my daughter and I. Beds were very comfy and everything was up to date. I can't say enough about the staff. Everyone was so friendly and helpful. I'd like to give a special shoutout to our friend Sunil! He made us feel so welcome.  Also, the head engineer who came to fix an issue in our room was friendly, prompt, and knowledgeable.  We ordered delivery from the attached restaurant and the food came quickly and was delicious. The location is great,  lots to do in walking distance and the subway is just a couple of blocks away.  We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to NYC.

title: Great view! Friendly staff!
text: Jaun was a pleasure to work with! Reception offered us late check out. Room was very nice with an amazing view! Worth the price, would absolutely stay at again! Soft bed with great pillows! Complementary chocolate and water in the room

title: Fabulous hotel
text: Wonderful hotel with a perfect location, near everything (museums, parks, monuments, shops, metro and train stations) but on a quiet street, totally different from the chaos of Times Square. Friendly and efficient staff, from the manager to the helpful bellboys (thank you, Jimmy and Hector), lovely cleaning ladies who leave chocolates on your pillows, nice coffee machine in the room, excellent restaurant service, good gym. All in all, just perfect.

title: Our honemoon trip in USA and NYC
text:
We planned our honeymoon trip in NYC. Therefore we‘ve been looking for a nice and comfortable hotel in the middle of Manhattan close to the ETS and TS. We received a very good offer from the Executive Hotel Le Soleil. We couldn’t find any better hotel. The service was very obliging. The staff fulfilled every wish of us. We met Steve, Operations Manager of the hotel. We enjoyed our daily conversations and Steve gave us some hidden spots to visit. We hope we‘ll stay in contact!
We won’t be the last time in NYC and this beautiful hotel!

title: Esperienza ottima
text: Vi raccontiamo la nostra esperienza: dopo aver perso la coincidenza per NYC arriviamo in albergo con 15 h di ritardo e senza valigie. Veniamo accolti con estrema gentilezza e comprensione tant'è che dopo poche ore ci viene REGALATA la possibilità di spostarci in una stanza più grande (molto più grande!) per compensare (immaginiamo) i numerosi disagi patiti. Già questo può dare un'idea delle persone che ci hanno ospitato. Questo fa la differenza perché il capitale umano é il punto di forza di questa struttura. Il personale (sia alla reception che delle pulizie) è sempre stato disponibile per garantirci una permanenza rilassante. Si tratta di un hotel molto confortevole, ubicato in una posizione strategica, vicino alla metro e alle principali attrazioni di Manhattan. Le stanze sono pulite, silenzione e dotate di ogni confort (per un albergo 4*). Offrono anche la possibilità di transfer per l'aeroporto allo stesso prezzo dei taxi (sperimentato al ritorno). Assolutamente consigliato se volete sentirvi a casa.

title: Great place to stay with an amazingly friendly staff!!!
text: Staff was amazing and so friendly. Rooms were spacious and clean. Will definitely be staying here anytime we come to New York!!! Location is great and easily walkable to a ton of hot spots. Great food and bar options right down the street as well.

title: Great hotel, great location
text: We stayed here for a long weekend and loved it. The rooms were spacious and clean. Check in and checkout were a breeze and the staff was super friendly. Cleaning crew was above and beyond. We had tickets for a broadway play, so location was great for that. We also loved checking out Koreatown

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Amazing people and hotel experience! The staff was extremely warm and helpful. Our hotel room was spacious, comfortable, and luxurious. Great shower, bed, and utilities. Also, it is located in a perfect spot for a great trip!

title: Excellent stay!
text: It was such a great stay! Excellent and spacious room with very comfortable bed. Really nice staff that was so accommodating. The block has several restaurants and bars to walk to. Definitely will be back.

title: Mid town Hotel
text: Excellent location with very helpful professional staff. The hotel is very clean, convenient and well run organized.  The rooms are beautiful and stocked. The turn down service is a treat that included chocolate , bottled water and slippers.

title: This is a lovely hotel
text: Stayed for four nights. This is a lovely hotel, very convenient to the subway and Penn Station. Check in was handled very efficiently, staff welcoming & courteous.Room was on one of the higher floors…very comfortable bed, slept well during my stay. Nice to have complimentary coffee, water & welcome chocolates were a nice touch. Loved the bathroom, very spacious. Felt very safe here & I would definitely recommend the hotel & will stay here again.

title: Nice hotel
text:
POSITIVES… was the great location, friendly staff, very smart & clean place.
NEGATIVE… room was pretty small for the money we paid, could have been more coffee/milk for the room.
Overall really happy with our stay.

title: Perfect except for the strong air freshener smell
text: This hotel is in a great location.  The staff is friendly and efficient.  The room size is average for a Manhattan hotel.  The bed was comfortable and the room was clean.  The only problem was the smell of air freshener.  It was so strong, like someone spraying a can of it directly in your face.  There is no exhaust fan in the room and you cannot open the window so you are stuck with it.  My clothes still reeked of it when I got back home.  You do get a little nose blind to it after a while and that made it a little more tolerable.  If not for the smell I would have rated this place a perfect 5.

title: Amazing
text: My experience there was wonderful, the manager from the hotel Sunil is amazing, always friendly and helpful. Love this place. Definitely I’ll comeback and recommend to all. And it’s close to the Empire State.

title: Good hotel and location, clean, friendly staff and good restaurant nextdoor
text:
So glad we chose here.  Quiet street in good location.  We booked a suite with a pullout bed.  Comfortable and clean, very comfy bed.  We had no view but most NY hotels don't.  However we were not disurbed by noise and I am a light sleeper.  We needed a few additional things (kettle, teabags, blanket and also to fix the safe) and the hotel assisted promptly.  Staff friendly and helpful and Mr Sunil had a chocolate for my daughter when he saw her.  I would stay again.

Try the food at Trademark restaurant nextdoor.   Fresh, tasty, good service and a bit of craick from the Irish manager.  Great pot of tea and hearty breakfast!

title: Gem in the heart of NYC
text: Such a spectacular stay as always!! Cannot wait to come back again soon. The manager and all the staff are lovely. The rooms are clean clean clean and happy to help with anything we needed. Thank you for a brilliant stay again.

title: Fantastic hotel and awesome staff
text: I cannot recommend this hotel enough! Sunil, Shelley and Louis were welcoming, efficient and couldn't have been more helpful - we cannot thank them enough for all that they did. (So was the porter who looked after our bags and sorted a taxi to the airport for us but I didn't get his name). The hotel is beautifully decorated, spotless, quiet and conveniently located for Times Square and the subway. Our room was gorgeous and anything we asked for was provided. We will definitely stay here again and can't wait for our next visit.

title: Husband's Birthday weekend
text: When a guest booked a room, hotels should not overbooked and ending up giving away a guest room. The message you sent is that one guest is favored over the next.  I do not think the room was worth $301.00 for a night

title: Decline in service and facility quality
text: This was the second visit to the hotel.  We found a decline in service quality due to untrained staff, accessories missing in the room, and an overall inability to satisfy clients needs.  The services that are provided do not compare to a four-star hotel.

title: Great Location and Outstanding Service
text: Our stay an Executive Suites Le Soleil made our New York stay an experience of a lifetime. The location was the perfect launch to all the places we wanted to visit. The property feels luxurious and peaceful, a great respite from the busyness of the city. The greatest asset is the phenomenal staff who made us feel welcome, valued, and helped us with everything we needed with a smile. We enjoyed the breakfast option very much, delicious, filling and friendly service. Conald won’t be forgotten. The only disappointment was that the in-room fridge wasn’t cold enough to safely store our leftovers and we had to toss them. We hope to return to this wonderful place again someday.

title: Summer in NYC
text:
We had a delightful stay! The room was lovely, the location was ideal, and the service exceeded our expectations. The entire staff was incredibly friendly, with a special shoutout to Sunil, the assistant front office manager, who consistently went above and beyond to assist us. 
PS: we are from Thailand,  😉3 mommies ;)

title: Awesome hotel and experience! I’m
text: The hotel was beautiful, with the comfiest bedding and coziest feel! Gym was great;  and staff was courteous and helpful!  Location was also good…near restaurants and shopping. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a great hotel experience at a value price!

title: We've found our new go-to hotel for NYC!
text:
This hotel has the FRIENDLIEST employees, great rates and a very nice sized suite. The whole place has a European feel to it (definitely a lot nicer than the typical chain hotels just down the street). Love the flavored water in the lobby, and the fact that it is so close to everything (and far enough away from Times Square...lol!). 
I didn't take photos of our suite, but we had a nice king sized bed and our teen granddaughter enjoyed having her own little space with the pull-out sofa, which she said was comfortable. The door to the bathroom is way too heavy, but the toiletries they offer are very good quality, and the room itself was modern (shower could use some grab bars and a mat for safety). 
Nice to have a safe and small refrigerator. I used a white noise app at night for street noise, and our granddaughter said she didn't hear hallway noise at night.
Staff goes out of their way to please. We will definitely stay here again next time in NYC!

title: Great location, but the hotel room phones don't work
text:
Executive Hotel Le Soleil has some great reviews, and I walked in with high expectations. My room was clean and well-appointed, if dark. I could not see my clothes in the closet, because there is no closet light and no overhead room light. I was puzzled why my hotel phone did not work, and the hotel manager explained that the hotel is in the process of switching to another phone system, so I was expected to use my cell phone to call the front desk. 

I heard an insistent chirping sound down the hall, the kind of sound that comes from a smoke alarm that needs a battery replacement. I reported this sound to the front desk, but no action was taken on it during the next two days of my stay. While I stayed at the hotel, a horrific car crash happened at the corner of 36th and 6th - a driver injured seven pedestrians who were crossing the street, one of whom is in critical condition. Beware!

title: Felt like home
text: Excellent customer service & treated like family. Convenient location to sight see, shop, eat. Very respectful & professional staff. I love that there's always water in the lobby any time of day. There's coffee & random juice/tea/lemonade during the mornings until it runs out

title: Hidden Gem For Hotels
text: We've been to NYC many times and this was by far the best experience we've had. From the moment we walked in we could feel the positive reception from all of the staff. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone anyone coming to New York. Special shout out to Steve for making us feel right at home!

title: 大概是纽约性价比很高的酒店
text: 什么都很好，除了电梯很老很慢。位置离帝国大厦特别近。基本在曼哈顿中心，房间不大但是特别精致，设施也很齐全。二百多一天的价格也很有竞争力，如果是备选项之一可以直接确定是这家

title: Best hotel experience ever!
text:
I can not possibly say enough good things about this place. The staff (especially Brittany in this case) goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and welcomed. My husband and I arrived at 10am from a red eye, our room wasn't ready yet, but I was sick and desperate to just lay down. Brittany rushed our room and got us in there within an hour! I couldn't thank her enough. Our entire four night stay, she and the rest of the very service oriented staff, checked in on me, provided waters, chocolates and even a microwave (without me asking) just because I had inquired about the ability to heat up food.  
This hotel, staff and location, can not be beat. When we visit the city again, we will definitely return here.

title: Satisfied
text: Hotel location is perfect. Room was clean and quite. People are helpful. We were three and all of us were happy. Times square is at walking distance and subway is very near. I will definitely go back if i have a chance to be in NY

title: Great NYC Hotel
text:
We stayed for three days in a Queen Suite with a Sofa Bed, which was perfect for me, my husband, and our 12-year old son.  While not enormous, it was exactly as pictured, and smartly configured to give my son a small separate space to himself.  It was also surprisingly quiet in our room, which was wonderful after the hustle and bustle of day.  The hotel and rooms were clean and well maintained and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  We felt welcomed from the moment we walked in until our check-out. The room had a small mini-fridge which was nice to be able to stash a few bottles of water.   Bagel shops, restaurants and the subway are all with a few blocks, making it easy to find what you need and get around. 

Everything about our stay met or exceeded our expectations.  We've found a new place to stay next time we visit Manhattan!

title: A great hotel in a great location!
text: Great hotel at a perfect location. The staff is very kind and helpful. They really want to satisfy and improve your stay if something goes wrong. The restaurant of the hotel, “Trademark” is excellent. This is my 4th time there and I will definitely come back.

title: Le Soleil truly shines: welcoming, service-oriented and beautiful
text:
I and my husband and our 2 young'ish, adult daughters had a wonderful 3 night stay at Executive Le Soleil. We've been to NY many times and went for 8 nights this time. We chose to start our stay with 5 nights in an East Village hotel, before switching to Le Soleil.  We live in Vancouver, Canada, where we have the flagship Le Soleil, at which we have never stayed, but which looks lovely.

We arrived and immediately felt the more luxurious feel of the hotel with a dedicated doorman, and then being warmly welcomed by Louis at the front desk. We all first enjoyed the cold fruit-flavoured water in the lobby. There was a line-up at registration, and while we waited for our room to be readied (we were a bit early), we sat on the lovely lobby sofas and chairs.

We had challenges with entering our room digitally, and every staff member who saw us having difficulty in the elevator, at our room door...jumped in to help, including the cleaning staff! Louis was there every day of our staff and it was lovely to be welcomed by him. At our arrival on July 12th early afternoon, there was a young woman with glasses who was also helpful and so perky and welcoming--I wish I had taken note of her name. 

We booked the executive suite of 1 queen bed and 1 sofa bed. We loved having the good-sized washroom (with a large shower) between our queen bed area, and the queen sofa bed where our 2 daughters slept. There are only 2 small negatives about this hotel, and one of them was that the girls said the sofa bed was just ok for sleeping. In contrast, our bed was very comfortable, and our room very quiet.

Andrew at front desk was also very friendly and helpful. ALL staff were such! We'd also asked the help of the concierge regarding a visit to a park to which we had intended to take the subway, but he encouraged us to literally spend maybe $1 more per person and take the ferry. What a terrific suggestion that was--such an enjoyable, cheap and wonderful way to travel and enjoy the view.

Le Soleil is so centrally located in Midtown. You walk out the door and it's close to restaurants, all the best shopping, and within walking distance to Broadway shows. We felt so fortunate to stay in such a safe and convenient area.
 
My hubby and I enjoyed happy hour at the hotel's restaurant, and were told we had to sit at the bar, which was just fine. We enjoyed the wings (delish!) and something else, but I've forgotten what it was, but it was yummy. The bartender and server were both great. Which leads me to the small 2nd (and only other) negative: the "public" washroom for the hotel is in the basement, so restaurant and hotel patrons go downstairs for the restroom.

We loved our stay at Executive Le Soleil, being welcomed every time we returned to the hotel, and feeling like valued patrons. We will stay there again the next time we return to NY!

Thank you kindly for the wonderful staff and for contributing to our great stay in NY.

Warmly,
Michael, Christina, Justine and Andrea
Vancouver, BC Canada

title: EXCELLENT IN EVERY WAY
text:
This was our first stay and we will definitely go back again. 
We HIGHLY RECOMMEND the hotel to one and all.
Everyone on the staff is sincerely attentive!!!!
The peaceful atmosphere, the quiet room and the quality of everything is appreciated

title: Excellent hotel
text:
The best hotel in New York ! It was  our first time there , the staff was very kind and the room was very clean . Moreover , the WiFi access was very good and the view was incredible. The hotel is at the center of New York and near to Empire State of building and Times Square .Special thanks to mr Steve for his warm welcome! Greetings from
Greeece !

title: Birthday Celebration in  The Big Apple
text: I stayed at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York for three nights.  The operations manager found out that it was my birthday and he sent up a bottle of Prosecco and two small boxes of chocolates.  And he wrote a personal message regarding my birthday.  It was so very nice of him.  He was down to earth as well as professional.  Housekeeping was very on top of my two different requests (extra blanket and a wine bottle opener).  The gentleman who took care of our luggage upon check out made sure to have a cab waiting for our trip to the airport.   I highly recommend staying at this wonderful establishment.

title: Excellent value package - top notch customer service
text:
The hotel is an excellent combination of great location, quality accomodation, convenient location and exceptional customer service. Very friendly and helpful staff at the hotel, from the front desk staff to the cleaners. A very special mention to Shelley at the Front Desk, who went several extra miles to ensure that the customers at the hotel were comfortable and all their enquires and issues were addressed in a highly timely manner. She is a really great Brand Ambassador for Executive Hotel LeSoleil New York.

The price was also very reasonable for the quality and Manhattan location. Very convenient walk to the Fashion District, Times Square, Empire State Building, etc.

The food at the Trademark bar & restaurant  right at the hotel's ground floor was simply amazing. The customer service there was also top notch - a special mention here for Leyde and Antoinette.

I would recommend this boutique hotel for anyone looking for good value for their money in getting accomodation in Manhattan.

title: Best  midtown hotel experience ever!
text:
Two fellow Los Angelinos both referred me to Executive Le Soleil in midtown. This hotel is their first choice. So I had to check it out. Hands down this has been an absolute first class experience.

The hotel is all about customer service, and hospitality. It’s boutique profile gives it a certain European charm.

I booked early and was offered a surprising upgrade to a two bedroom suite which was heaven for two privacy obsessed travelers. 

The staff was outstanding: Luis, Yassidra (spelling?), Meredith, Sunil, Jimmy, Milagro…. Every single one of them absolutely top notch. 

One fun feature. While there are only two elevators, they are always on time and surprisingly fast. T

he rooms are well appointed. Comfortable beds, coffee, maker, safe, very clean!

I particularly loved the reception area. It was like a very cozy library, and,  in the mornings there was free fresh coffee and ice water or lemonade or iced tea… refreshments I desperately need all the time.

Being right in the heart of Midtown allows for the best restaurants, shopping, theater, people watching. There are a number of subway stations nearby so day tripping is a breeze.

I am literally planning my next stay at Executive Le Soleil. Thank you to the entire staff for a wonderful stay

title: Midtown Moderate
text:
It's not the Savoy, but not trying to be. It has what you need, Friendly, quiet, clean, short walk to train station and all subways; excellent home-base for the busy. 

Though I just said what I have to say, here are the rest of the characters I need to achieve the 200 minimum.

title: Clean Property, Very Big Rooms - EXCEPTIONAL Service from Sunil
text: The property was well-maintained. We selected the property as we found for the price, most of the properties in the area had extremely small rooms. After alot of research, this property had a suite and offered the largest room space for its value. Centrally located, Times Square and Empire State is a block away.  What really made a difference in our stay was the thoughtful gestures and attention to detail that Sunil and his team did that truly made it exceptional. The genuine care and extra effort he made upon check in (helping us get our phones charged, making sure we were well situated with all the items we needed with extra guests) and upon check out (helping with parking, insuring we had water for the road) made it an unforgettable experience. Sunil really cared about guests and he was the highlight of the stay. Room was very clean and crisp - Highly recommend!

title: Great Location and staff (special thanks to Shelley)
text:
Excellent location, friendly staff, quick walk to Times Square metro and also comfortably walkable to Broadway.
Special thanks to Shelley who has the perfect balance of friendly, helpful and businesslike at all times! She’s a terrific asset at the front desk reception!
We loved our stay.

title: Excellent hotel.. Great location & very friendly service
text: Great stay at this hotel & would recommend. Room was a bit smaller than expected but then most NYC hotel rooms are. Room was very clean, well stocked and comfortable. Very friendly & efficient staff. Hotel is in a great location & overall very good value.

title: nicest hotel experience in Manhattan
text:
one of my nicest experiences at a Manhattan hotel, the ladies at the reception were super helpful, they upgraded our room and were more than helpful about all our requests and needs.
would definitely go back and stay with them on future trips.
size of room, quality of bed linen, bathroom supplies, cleanliness were all spot on

title: Just perfect !
text: Great location, amazing helpful and friendly staff. Comfortable and clean  room. Beautiful bathroom. We had a great view of the Empire State Building. Perfect value for money. Absolutely recommend this hotel

title: great staff, comfortable, quiet
text: Excellent staff. Great accommodations and location. Hotel is clean and comfortable. I would stay here again in a heartbeat. I liked the staff so much I actually went to the front desk and told them how much I appreciated them. I've never done that before. Got two nights of great sleep as we had a room away from the street. Parking? It's New York man...there's a garage next door, but there are also other garages via SpotHero that might be cheaper. Again, great find...highly recommend this little place.

title: Would def recommend and stay again
text: Great hotel and value. Clean, quiet, and nice bathroom. Great location for midtown and a friendly helpful staff. Small closet rack but def big enough for a short stay. Bed is comfortable and sheets were clean. Towels were replaced at a great rate.

title: Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York, a Big Hit!
text: Took my Family to NY for a vacation, stayed at Executive Hotel Le Soleil, the experience was outstanding! The hotel was great, location was perfect. The staff were all very friendly and helpful! Shout out to Shelley, Nicole, Andre, Andrew, amazing front desk staff! Jaime, the best doorman in NYC! And Latch, the head engineer, always ready to help, and had some great tips on things to do! Sorry for posting this late guys. Would definitely stay there again! Highly recommended!

title: Memorable stay with family
text:
Our experience at Executive Hotel Le Soleil exceeded our expectations in several ways. The exceptional service provided by Sunil and Shelley made our stay even more enjoyable, starting with the seamless early check-in they arranged for us due to our early flight. We stayed in 17th floor with city view and it was fabulous at night 

Some additional aspects that stood out to us:

The attention to detail from the staff was remarkable; their willingness to assist us at any hour, including 11 PM, was truly appreciated.
The spacious and immaculately clean rooms in the heart of NYC's bustling midtown provided a peaceful and comfortable retreat after a day of exploring the city.
The inclusion of complimentary water bottles, coffee, and juice was a thoughtful touch that set Executive Hotel Le Soleil apart – a true rarity among midtown NYC accommodations.

our stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil was marked by exceptional service, comfortable and clean rooms, and thoughtful amenities, making it a standout choice for anyone seeking a memorable stay in midtown NYC.

title: Friendly and Great first NYC experience
text: Very good service, friendly, and good options for getting to and from airport. They gave us lots of free chocolate and always had stuff ready for us. When we had our check out time we were late to get back and they gave us as much time as we needed so we weren’t rushed.

title: Séjour à NY au executive hotel le soleil, NYC
text:
Superbe hotel et tres tres bel acceuil de Eranny et Yadira qui nous ont tres bien accueillies. Elles ont toujours étaient disponibles et toujours avec le sourire !
Hotel tout proche de Time Square.
Proche des grands sites, a proximité a pieds Nous conseillons fortement

title: Un hôtel idéal pour visiter New York sans passer trop de temps dans les transports
text:
Chambre confortable. Personnel accueillant, serviable et toujours prêt pour donner de bons conseils.
L’hôtel est très très bien situé pour accéder facilement à la majorité des sites à visiter que ce soit à pied , en métro ou en bus. 
Exemple : l’Empire States Building est à moins de 10 mn de marche et le quai d’embarquement pour aller voir la Statue de la Liberté à moins de 3/4 h en métro + marche.
Nous recommandons sincèrement l’Executive Hôtel Le Soleil 
Laurent

title: Exceptionnel
text: L’hôtel est bien situé , près de tout ! Service exceptionnel , les employés sont sympathiques et aidants. Plusieurs petites attentions qui font la différence . Les chambres sont comfortables, propres et bien équipées ( même un petit réfrigérateur dans la suite avec sofa lit). Nos enfants disent  #tropcool

title: Excellent
text:
Very Nice rooms, Friendly staff, good location. Will be back.

Helped with parking in the area and gave us tips for food locations. 

beds were extremely comfortable and clean. highly recommend this hotel

title: book directly through the hotel
text:
I went on Google maps and searched hotels with a budget in mind, Found a few different ones close to the Penn station, I decided on Le Soliel since it had their own website, I didn't want to book through a third party like booking, there was another hotel i almost booked before, but Le soleil website just felt way nicer and easier to book through,

what i loved about booking directly through them is that they contacted me on watchapp and their customer service was really nice! I even had my flight canceled after I checked out of their hotel, So I texted them on Whatsapp asking if they had a room, and they responded in 3 minutes. everything was easy and convinient,

Room was nice and clean and quite,
Aircondition was nice and cold and quite, 
bed was nice and soft, 

the only thing bad i can say is that their upload speed is really terrible, I had to upload some photos and it took forever

title: Incredible service and fantastic location
text: I’ve been to NYC for various trips over the years, and it’s actually hard to find gems that combine good price, great location, charm, a passion for customers and details, and cleanliness. This hotel is one of those delights that I will definitely return to for future trips. Every staff encounter was friendly and engaged, and I was reminded constantly that it mattered to them that I was a hotel guest. This is a hotel team that takes great pride in their work and loves their customers. I had a high-floor room that was cozy (it’s NYC after all) but was quiet, felt like a European 3-star room with utility and simple design, and incredibly clean and well serviced. The staff was incredible: All requests were met — dining recs, late checkout, options for airport transfer. This will be my hotel of choice for return trips.

title: Excellent location and price
text: We wanted a location to be able to walk to the most iconic New York City landmark, and staying here was the best decision made. I hate driving in city so being able to walk all places needed was option. Recommend 100%

title: Best Secret in New York
text: The staff was outstanding and the queen suite was designed perfectly for us an our 11 year old son Plenty of space for a New York hotel.  Location was central to everything.  Best part of the experience was the staff from the Front Desk to the Bell Hop.  Would stay here again.

title: Bad experience with cleaning lady but otherwise a good stay
text:
PROS: Room perfect. Floor to ceiling windows made it more spacious. Fruit flavored cold water welcoming and very welcome. Most staff friendly, especially the tall male  Asian staff member. Very reasonable—- allowing us to check out at 1230 pm vs 11 am.  Reasonably priced. Excellent location. 

CONS: Airconditioning control not working. Room super cold and thermostat not working. Froze all night. Blanket not warm enough.  Only 2 elevators working. During busy times, there’s a 5-7 minute wait to use the elevator. Had to ask for extra towels 3 times. First night we didn’t get the extra towel. No hair dryer available. The worst part was the Eastern European cleaning lady assigned to our room (1104) who was unfriendly, not accommodating, and even rude. What happened to customer service? She made us feel we were an inconvenience to her.

title: Great Experience
text: My stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil in New York was an absolute delight. The hotel boasted immaculate cleanliness and an enviable location, but it was the staff that truly made the experience exceptional. Nikko and Shelly were consummate professionals, exuding hospitality and friendliness in equal measure. To top it all, a complimentary bottle of champagne added a touch of celebration to our stay.

title: Lovely staff, well-kept rooms
text: The hotel was very well kept and clean and included everything you would expect. Specifically, the front desk employee, Shelley was so nice and helped us with all of the requests that we could’ve asked for. I would recommend to others.

title: Excellent Location with an Elegant Setting
text: We spent a week at this fabulous hotel in midtown Manhattan. The location was phenomenal, just a few blocks from the subway, not too far from Broadway theaters and Times Square. The hotel is elegant with an incredibly attentive and helpful staff. While our executive king room was certainly not huge, the design of the furniture allowed us to store our week's worth of clothes just fine. The bathroom was very nice, with an especially nice, large shower. The bed was very comfortable, and we loved the floor to ceiling windows. I was really impressed with the friendliness of everyone on the staff, all whom seemed to care that our stay was satisfactory. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Scott and Neosha's 15th wedding anniversary.
text: This hotel is a hidden gem. My wife and I love the ambiance of this hotel. The staff was amazing, thoughtful, and courteous. The front desk person, Shelly, was great. She gave us a room with a view  of the Empire State building and a bottle of wine for our wedding anniversary. Also, the gym was awesome. I lift weights daily.

title: I had a great evening
text: I had a slight problem when I arrived but Shelley and Nikko took care of the problem and made my stay one to remember. I will be booking again and I highly recommend this hotel. Thank you Shelley and Nikko.

title: Great stay!
text: Niko and the whole staff were exceptionally nice to me and my family! The hotel was centrally located and was very clean.  The price was more reasonable than other comparable hotels in the area.  I recommend!

title: Cozy
text: The room is cozy and has a great view of the Empire State Building. There are many snacks and amenities in the room. The staff was quite helpful, notably Hector. He brought my bags up and was kind everytime I saw him.

title: Fabulous!
text: Our stay at The Executive Le Soleil was fabulous in every way — the location, the accommodations, the staff, and the restaurant, Trademark.  The hotel staff was superb and tended to all of our needs.  When checking in at the front desk after a long day of traveling, my husband commented that he just wanted to drop off our luggage and get an ice cold beer.  Someone on the staff overheard him, asked him about his beer preference, and brought him a beer from the bar!  It was a great start to our fabulous stay at the hotel.  When asking the staff at the front desk for dinner recommendations around Madison Square Garden, where we were attending a concert, the staff provided an outstanding recommendation and called to make reservations for us.  The restaurant was amazing and treated us as if we had been long-standing customers.  When I needed to fax some documents, the hotel staff immediately handled it.  When I was trying to pour a glass of water from the lobby water dispenser (my hands were full) someone on the hotel staff immediately came to assist and helped me with the elevator.  Every day, we were greeted warmly by the staff and asked if we needed anything.  The staff went above and beyond to provide the best service possible and to make our stay in NYC a memorable one!  We would like to give special thanks to Shelley and Louis at the front desk, and Connor with the Trademark restaurant at the hotel.  They were terrific and made our stay so special.

title: Great hotel!!
