text: great hotel great customer service great rooms friendly staff comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. great location near lots of restaurants and has complimentary chocolate and drinks in the lobby definitely recommend!

title: Fantastic stay in the city.
text:
Simply fantastic!!!
I was unsure about where to stay for my three-day birthday vacation in New York City. After viewing several different hotels near MSG (to see Drake), I found a wonderful Parisian-inspired hotel. Close to my reservation date, I spoke with a lovely lady named Yaya, who was very helpful and insightful and even gave me a complimentary late checkout for my birthday stay. Upon arrival, I was greeted and offered a refreshing water, and my check-in was quick. I stayed in an executive queen suite with a sofabed. The room was very clean, stocked with towels, and exceptionally decorated. Just like the pictures!! Check-out was a breeze too. The staff here are all wonderful. Special thanks to Sunil. Location is great too. Very close to everything and there is a restaurant inside. I would definitely come back again.

title: Great for business and personal satys
text: I always stay here when visiting NYC. Highly recommend.  Close to the sights, great restaurants in the hotel and surrounding. Staff is very accommodating. When you need to go to the airport make sure to book a car through the bellhop. The best way to get to the airport!

title: Top Notch Consierge
text: Lovely boutique hotel in an excellent location. It's a walking distance to The Times Square, Empire State Building or if you are into shopping then Macy's is just 5 min walk away. Metro is close by, so you can get anywhere. In the lobby there are cold drinks and hot coffee served daily. The gem of this business is consierqe Juan. He is extremely knowledgable, well mannered and efficient.  Thanks to his advice we were able to sort out a problem with an other hotel. Also, we saved a lot of time following his travel tips and reservations. Happy to go back and the reason I didn't give 5 stars, is the slow internet.

title: Have Not Experienced Exceptional Hospitality Like This in Years, Maybe Decades
text:
I booked Le Soleil Executive hotels for a short trip to NYC with my family (husband and 2 kids) and chose it because of their modern aesthetic and suite-style room. We booked the Queen suite with a sofa bed in the separate, living room area. We tried to check in early (2pm), but our room wasn't ready. None-the-less, we were greeted warmly upon getting to the hotel, the bell staff helped with the door and stored our luggage so we can make our appt at the Statue of Liberty ferry.

Upon returning to the hotel, we were offered cold, flavored water which was super refreshing after being out in the heat/humidity. Our room was perfect, as we expected, with extra pillows and blankets for the sofa bed. It is worth mentioning that the sofa bed cushion was not the usual 3-4 inch variety we've seen at other hotels and my 10-yr-old even noticed it enough to say this is the first sofa bed she'd slept on where she couldn't feel the wires/springs. It had a light-up mirror and a desk outside of the bathroom so I was able to get ready while the bathroom was in use. And more importantly, the hotel manager was so friendly and gave the kids chocolate every time he saw them, which made them feel special. I did not taste the chocolate but my kids assured me they were delicious.

On the day we checked out, we learned that our flight was cancelled and we were stuck for an extra 2 days due to weather. They kindly stored our luggage and let us use their lobby area and restaurant, while we were on hold/on the phone with the airline trying to get our flight home rebooked. Although they had no availability, except for a penthouse suite, which was going to be available around 4-5 pm (departing guest requested late check out), they assured us that they'd figure out a way to have us stay. They ended up accommodating us at the penthouse suite, as a free upgrade from the regular suite price.

Their kindness and generosity lifted our spirits as we went through the unexpected travel disruption, and we enjoyed the extra time in the city. Special mention to Shelley, Sunil, Nikko, and the rest of the Le Soleil and Trademark (on-site restaurant) staff for taking care of us and turning a frustrating situation around. Our extended time in NYC was very enjoyable and we will definitely stay at this hotel again if given the chance.

Lastly, this hotel is 5 mins from the nearest metro station (34th and Herald), 7-10 minutes walk from Time Square, and very central to many coffee shops, restaurants and bars, and retail shops.

title: Upscale quality at a great price!
text: Staff was very friendly. Room was large and very clean. Good location. We were concerned when we booked as the website and confirmation email had contradicting info about the cancelation policy. Luckily that was not an issue and we are please we stuck with our plan to stay here.

title: Great find in the middle of NY
text: Lovely hotel, all aspects of it very nice.. a nice environment, very well located, ( good rooms and facilities ) the staff here make this hotel what it is… all super friendly, generally want to help you have the best time. Special thanks to Shelly on reception. Would definitely rebook here . Thank you all.

title: Home away from home
text: Everyone was super friendly… Very helpful… and wanting to make us feel at home. Every day we were greeted and asked if there may be something we needed. The cucumber water was also a delight after a long days walk! Thank you for a lovely stay!

title: Trip to NY for mums 70th
text:
Firstly, the location of this hotel is excellent. It's less than a ten minute walk to times square and we felt like everything was on our doorstep e.g. central park, broadway shows etc. (15-20 min walk from the hotel to central park). In addition to this, the hotel staff were really friendly and we were made to feel welcome throughout our stay. There's a couple of excellent cafe's just as you walk out and turn left which are great places to pick up some breakfast etc. The hotel arranged a taxi back to Newark for us (our initial transfer was arranged free through booking.com) at a cost of $105 (cash)/$110(card) which we also thought reasonable. 

The only downside was that there are only 2 lifts in the hotel and given that we were on the 13th and 17th floors we sometimes had to wait a while to get to and from our rooms. That said, in the grand scheme of things, this wasn't a big deal.

Overall, we'd definitely stay here again.

title: Great location, wonderful service, friendly people, delicious food around it, walk distance to attractions
text:
The best for the hotel is the service,  EVERYONE is friendly and ready to help any time! Make you feel like a home. The location is great, Empire State, Time Square, Broadway show and Train station are all walk distance, but hotel rooms are nice and quite at night. Did I mention the food, hundreds of great food restaurants are around it.
I would stay there next time when I visit the city!  Definitely recommend !

title: Excelente Ubicacion para conectar con el centro de new york
text: Personal amable, instalaciones limpias y de un ambiente muy familiar, cerca de todo es perfecto para los nuevos visitantes par estar cerca de todo, metro cerca, y caminar les facilita ir a los emblematicas edificacion de New York.

title: Our new NYC go-to hotel
text: Service was top notch. Rooms were clean, comfortable, and reasonably well appointed. Bed and bedding were comfortable. Lay out was great for a week, gave us lots of room to spread out, work in the office space, and lounge in the living room space, both of which were apparent from the sleeping space. Huge bathroom with the best counter space I’ve seen in an NYC hotel. Only odd thing was no usb ports by bed, only one was across the room and not near any furniture meaning no place to put items that were charging so that’s a little odd.

title: Excellent and very clean accommodations centrally located with fantastic staff
text: This is a fantastic, safe property!  The rooms are on the small side if you are trying to fit 4 adult size people into the Queen Executive Suite, but 3 of us fit fine.  The property is very clean and feels extremely safe.  The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  The building is solid and we never herd another guest during the 5 nights we stayed there, even though we were next to the elevator on the 5th floor!

title: Gem in the Big City!
text: The hotel was charming! Overall, it was comfortable, clean and cozy. The room was spacious, with a bonus room nook with pull-out couch, which also had its own flat screen TV. The staff were friendly, welcoming and helpful, anytime we had questions or needed assistance. The daily fruit infused water and juices in the lobby was amazingly refreshing, and enjoyable! The hotel location was convenient to Times Square and the city highlights, and felt safe.

title: Attention to Details are OUTSTANDING
text: This review is long over due.  I stayed at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York for business and after a week at this boutique hotel I felt at home.  Hospitality is clearly this teams core competency.  First the hotel has very nice Keurig Coffee Makers in the room but no tea options.  I mentioned this to the front desk and the next day the team had left a note for me with a full box of premium English Breakfast Tea to meet my daily needs.  The week I was in town was particularly hot and the hotel AC runs on motion sensors which were shutting down while I slept.  I mentioned this to the front desk and they accompanied me to my room immediately and saw that the settings were set to shut down after 2 hours.  They changed this setting to 8 hours.  I mentioned while they were in my room I was working so hard that I was too tired to go out for even a pastrami sandwich.  30 minutes later there was a light knock on my door.  The Front Desk had the restaurant make me a few Pastrami Sliders.  I cried.  This simple act of humanity and hospitality was enough to cement my business at this hotel for my annual meeting in the city.  Look, I'm sure not everyone is getting a sandwich, so don't expect one, but note that these guys are paying attention! Its classic old school hospitality that has seemed to disappear. The hotel is very nice with bigger hotel rooms than most in the area.  It is very close to the subway which was good for getting me to my meetings and close to famous restaurants like Joe's Pizza and Nan Xiang Xiao Long Bao.  They were also walking distance to Times Square and Broadway which is how I spent my evenings after work when I wasn't crashed out. They have a car service that you can book with the Concierge that will get you to the airport.  I loved my driver.  She was fun to talk on the way to Newark.  I really can't say enough good things about this hotel.  Good for Business or Travel.  Stay here!

title: Great hotel in Midtown
text: Excellent location close to subway and lots of places to eat. Room was comfortable and well kept although the bathroom door could use a handle to make it easier to close. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Complementary water very nice touch.

title: AMAZING STAY
text: Was such a great stay with the hotel being quick to everywhere I needed to go. Nikko and Bill were two of the best hotel executives I have met. The herald train stop was able to get me to any location in nyc. Thank you again LE SOLEIL

title: Amazing view with access to everything we needed
text: I stayed here in December for a work trip and had to come back again for my summer escape with my spouse. The hotel is beautiful, and I love that the floors are always so quiet and feel so private. We had an Empire Suite, and the view of the empire state building is always breathtaking. Located in midtown, we were always just a quick walk away from everything we wanted to see, and everything we needed. Food, shopping, and entertainment, it was all nearby.

title: Nicest staff
text: The bedroom was very clean, comfortable bed, nice decor but what made my stay as an amazing experience was the staff. Yadira and Eranny are so friendly and helpful. They were always smiling and prompt to help me out with any requests.

title: Lovely hotel with attentive staff in an excellent location
text: We stayed for 4 nights in a queen suite (myself, my husband and teen son). The room met our needs well—a workspace for my husband, pull out sofa for my son and queen bed for us. The Keurig, mini fridge, bathrobes…all really nice features. The bathroom was modern with a big shower. The staff accommodated all our needs—from providing umbrellas when we went out to Broadway to a later check out because our return trip was in late afternoon. I would recommend Le Soleil NY as a great jump off point for your trip to NYC because you can walk almost everywhere. We walked the city every day from the hotel—Broadway, Times Square, MoMa, American Museum of Natural History, the High Line, Chelsea and Little Island Park.

title: Lovely hotel in midtown
text:
Rooms were compact! Make sure you travel light. Very little space for your suitcase. That’s my only criticism. 
The beds were super comfortable. Great A/C. Nice showers. Gym too. 
Staff were lovely. Hot and cold drinks provided free in reception most days.

title: Wonderful
text: Had a fantastic stay at this hotel, my travels are continuing around the country and other hotels do not compare. Most comfy bed, stunning views, cannot fault this place. I hope to return next month before heading home.

title: Excellent return to Hotel LeSoleil!!!
text: Another great stay of 3 nights. Great location; comfortable room; welcoming environment. Home away from home traveling with my teenage daughter to do some college campus tours. Shout out to Shelley, Luis, and Nikko who went above and beyond . Can’t wait to return for our next trip into the city. Couldn’t have found a better option for our stay. Love this place💕

title: Shout out to Shelley and all the friendly staff!
text:
This hotel is awesome. Such amazing hospitality from the staff who were so friendly and kind. Definitely recommend this place!
P.S.- Shout out to Shelley from the front desk who offered my friend’s and I her perfume because she smelt amazing! Wonderful lady she is.

title: Family City Break
text: Really great location in downtown Manhatten 5 mins from 5th Avenue, Macey's and Empire State Building.  The first room we had the air conditioning wasn't working properly so they quickly moved us to another room.  Customer service was excellent and any issues were quickly dealt with by the team.

title: Yadira is the Best
text: We stayed in May and had an excellent stay and part of it was because of the service we received from Yadira. She was very attentive to our needs. We made  future reservations in September and December mainly because of her. The hotel itself was very clean and quiet.

title: Always a great experience
text:
Yadira and Eranny at reception were extremely helpful and polite. We have stayed at this hotel many times and we have found it has an excellent standard of cleanliness and ideally located for a great holiday in New York
It’s also very handy for food and drink as it has a restaurant and bar attached. We have dined here for breakfast and dinner on numerous occasions and the standards are of a very good standard

title: Great hotel in a great location
text: Small boutique hotel only a few blocks from Times Square. Location is great to explore Manhattan. We didn’t pay extra but we were allocated a room on the 19th floor with a magnificent view of the Empire State Building that’s only two blocks away. The rooms are small but very clean and comfortable. All the staff were very courteous and helpful. Overall a great hotel for a four night visit to NYC.

title: Great Stay
text: We picked this hotel, because it was one of the few with enough space for 4 of us together. Perfect place for NY City visit. This hotel was better than we had expected, given that the room price was reasonable for the area. The staff is amazing. Helpful with every request we had. Location is great, we walked every where from Central park, to SoHo, NYU, and all the TikTok restaurants. The room was very clean and spacious for the 4 of us. The big window was our favorite part. It has a small fridge that worked well. The pull out sofa mattress is not the best, but serves the purpose. The bed is very comfortable.  Coffee and cold drinks are served in the lobby.

title: Amazing service thank you yadira !!
text: Lovely staff and great facilities. Everyone was really helpful and accommodating, the bed was super comfy and the bathroom had great lighting. Yadira at the reception desk was super welcoming and made the experience of missing our flight connection last minute livable. She was super friendly and accommodating of our jet-la which I appreciate so much. It was awesome to have such great staff looking after us

title: Nice  boutique hotel with great customer service!
text: Great service at the front desk. Yadira and Eranny were amazing- helping with my early arrival and check in. The room was clean, nice, and a good size. I used to stay here frequently years ago and I'm excited to start staying here again on my future trips to New York City.

title: Great staff. Great location. Great choice.
text:
I booked a last-minute trip and really lucked out by staying here. It was a good price for an excellent location. The room was spacious. Bathroom was modern and clean. The bed was comfortable. Wonderful floor-to-ceiling windows made the space. Still some COVID precautions (remote controls in plastic, for example), an indication of extra care. This is an old-school hotel in the best ways - beautiful lobby, courtesy phones in hallways, turndown service. And thoughtful, welcoming staff. 

The people working there, from the front desk to the maids and the management, made the stay enjoyable and stress-free. They have an unfortunate number of Yankees fans but that’s really the only complaint I could make.

title: Nice hotel with great staff
text: First time staying here .. I usually stay at the sheraton .. but decided to try something new and I definitely was impressed .. Jamie was Good at the front and Yadira was amazing at the front desk … she was polite and checked me in swiftly and even offrered me champagne … the location is great as well so many things to do and explore … will come again this time with family …

title: Amazing service!! Thank you
text: At check in Yadira and Eranny went above and beyond to accommodate me and my family. I booked through a 3rd party site and they messed up so on arrival our room was not correct. They went over the top to fix the issue and checked us in early. Definitely would stay here again

title: Nice quiet hotel with great people
text: Shelley and Luis helped me out check in earlier than anticipated. Rooms are clean and everything is 3 to 5 mins away from this place. It is quiet compared to the typical new yoek hotel where sirens can be heard thru the night.

title: Staff is amazing!
text: Andrew at the front desk and Hector on the bags made our stay carefree! Andrew made sure our room was top notch! Hector watched our bags for us downstairs for 4 hours while we waited for our pickup! Could not have gone better!

title: Excellent
text: Excellent hotel and service. Very clean, everything works. Shelley and Luis are the best. I would recommend this hotel to anyone coming to NYC. You won’t be disappointed. Satisfaction is pretty much guaranteed.

title: Amazing Staff and Location
text: We have come to NY five times and usually stay in Queens at an AirBNB. This hotel is so convenient and is  such a great area with many people walking around at night with many of the sites and attractions nearby. Great restaurants and shopping is so close as well. The hotel is very clean, with a nice warm lobby area and great, clean rooms. One of the best attributes of this hotel is also the staff. Both Shelley and Luis at the front desk are amazing! They are so helpful, friendly, and you can sense that they really care about your and your stay. Simply walking past the lobby they always say, ‘enjoy your evening sir’, and again personally welcome you when you return. You can truly sense that you are important to them. I never write reviews, but this hotel and the staff deserve it…we will definitely be back to stay here…Shhh…dont tell anybody..we want a room this fall when we come back!

title: Unexpected Gem
text: Stayed here for a family vacation in the executive room with sofa bed. Room was spacious and the sofa bed had its own space which was great for the kids. Hotel was in a perfect location and close to the Empire State, Times Square, and Bryant Park. Hotel was clean. Hardly heard any outside noise which says a lot about NYC. I don’t usually give 5 stars but the hotel staff was the best I have experienced in all my stays in NYC. Shelley and Luis were top notch! Always cheerful and accommodating. Knew us by name after a day. Made the stay superb and will definitely be back!

title: A mixed experience
text: The location is great… The front desk staff made this experience better. Andrew, Andre, Sunil, nicole and Juan are stand outs. Absolute assets to this property... The housekeeping department was the most disappointing part of the stay. We were there for just under a week and had to constantly ask for housekeeping tasks to be done. And some of the tasks enquired about should have been a given. I’d be hesitant to stay there again and/or recommend this hotel subsequently. I do hope the housekeeping department improves. Peace and blessings.

title: Absolutely Amazing!
text: The staff is PERFECTION! SO KIND and friendly. SOOOOO accommodating. The hotel property is stellar! Going back again and again. The restaurant next door is amazing too. If you are looking for a GREAT gem of a hotel, this is the one to pick.

title: Great service and awesome location
text: I can wholeheartedly recommend this hotel. The staff is kind & helpful, the location is unbeatable and the rooms were clean - I even got a free room upgrade due to a prolonged stay. What a service! Thanks so much to the whole staff to making our first stay in Midtown Manhattan a special one.

title: Nice hotel but too pushy
text: I want to say I don't write review, but I want to say I am writing this because I got to hotel early but because they was sold out day before u couldn't check in but the two ladies was so nice they took my number down. I was also able to leave my luggage with doorman Jaime. However my disappointment was when I checked in at 4pm the woman in the middle with red hair I believe her name was shell she  checked me in but kept repeating to leave a trip advisor.. I was OK on doing this but after i checked in everytime I came downstairs she trained me to leave her a review. I mean I don't know what occurs but I just feel it was a tad much. Everyone else assisted me and nobody pushed for a review like her.. I had a great experience at hotel with everyone but the push and push I felt obligated. So I give the stars that I did.. but I will return ...

title: Great stay
text:
Staff was very nice and helpful! Particularly Shelley and Keron. Brought us extra sheets, and gave us a last minute late checkout. Also helped with restaurants and transportation options. 
We will definitely be back!

title: Fantastic mix of luxury and value in great midtown location!
text: Beautiful hotel with lots of luxurious touches. Bed and pillows very comfy! Giant walk-in shower. For the busy midtown location, it was remarkably quiet. Shelley at the front desk got our visit off to a great start with her warm and friendly personality. And she offered us each a glass of champagne at check-in! Anissa in housekeeping was also incredibly helpful making sure our room was just right. Parking right next door, and it was very convenient to be able to prepay for parking when we made our reservation. I wish we could have stayed longer, but we will definitely return!

title: Sooooooo awesome!!!!
text: This hotel and staff is by far the best ever! The place was clean and beautiful and they made us feel so welcome. Steve is one of the kindest people I have ever met. He upgraded our room for free, took the time to help us get around the city, and even gave me wine and chocolates for my birthday. He made it one of the most amazing trips and birthdays I have ever had! The Trademark Bar is also amazing with equally kind and awesome staff! Best food and drinks ever! Everyone was so amazing! I would never stay at a different hotel! This place is the best!! 1000% recommend!! Thank y'all for being so awesome!! ❤️

title: Executive Hotel Le Soleil and staff are a gem !!
text:
Hi there, 
My son and I travelled to NYC in April 2023. After looking at reviews, we decided to try out Executive Hotel Le Soleil. We were not disappointed! We’ve travelled to the city numerous times and this hotel is by far the best we’ve stayed at. We arrived at around 11 am and although check in wasn’t until 4 pm, Andrew and Luis from front desk were super helpful and welcoming. They were able to find us a room right away on top of upgrading us to a suite at no additional charge. The suite was slightly bigger than what we had initially booked, with a king size bed. The room was very clean, perfect to accommodate both of us. If you are travelling as a family of 4, I would recommend the suite or an even bigger room (depending on how spacious you want it to be) as the room wasn’t overly spacious. The window gave view to the street which wasn’t an issue for us. The hotel was perfectly located for all of our sightseeing, only a 5-minute walk from the Empire State building, 15 minutes from Time Square. It was about a 45-minute walk from Soho etc. Juan, the Concierge was very helpful with some restaurant suggestions. Jamie, the doorman was also very helpful in giving us tips on how to get around the city quicker. Thanks to him, we know the city inside out.  This hotel and its staff are a gem. Definitely worth checking out! A big thank you to Andrew, Luis, Jamie and Juan for making us feel right at home. Peter and I are forever grateful for your hospitality, we will be back again.

title: Le Soleil - the BEST!
text:
We had a great time at the hotel and in NYC. 
The hotel's location is very good, the facilities, staff, room and general care are rated top! 
We will definitely be back when visting New York next time. Thank you Le Soleil New York

title: Clean, enjoyable hotel at lovely location
text: Comfortable hotel, friendly staff, accommodating and a free upgrade to a beautiful and larger room made the stay fantastic. In addition, super close to transportation, Uber/Lyft pick up as well as a parking garage.

title: Incredible Experience!
text: I recently stayed at the best hotel in NYC. The bed was incredibly comfortable, the location was prime, and they had fresh lime/cucumber waters available at all times. But what made the experience truly exceptional was the staff - they were incredibly nice and helpful. I would definitely stay there again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great hotel in the city.

title: Awesome stay
text: We stayed 6 nights and Shelly and the rest of the group , Meredith made sure that we have a good stay with the hotel. We loved the lemon water drinks that are available for all guests after long walks. The bed is comfy and our girls loved the sofa bed. Their age is 12 &14 y/o. Walking distance to most attractions.

title: Great location and nice room
text: Very nice hotel - there were a few problems in my room (coffee machine did not work and not possible to use a bedside reading light) - they were never resolved but overall the staff were courteous and pleasant.  great location in midtown.

title: GREAT CUSTOMER SEEVICE
text: This hotel is absolutely beautiful and clean! Yadira was extremely welcoming. Wonderful customer service.!!! The rooms were spacious for a NYC hotel. I will definitely be going back when I travel to NYC again.

title: A Nice Surprise
text: Very attractive hotel. Good location. The staff was great too. very friendly. I would absolutely stay there again! definitely North nicer than the other hotels that were available in that price range.

title: Amazing Smile and a
text:
A friend of mine recommended this hotel and promised that I would not be disappointed. Well, I have to say that this is by far the best service I received in NYC. What made me write this review is not the suite nor the amazing location, but it is the service we received from Shelley. She welcomed us with a  Genuine SMILE. 
We are still here and we felt obligated to write this review. If there was an option to give Shelley higher than 5 stars, we would. This hotel will be our family’s go to hotel every time we come to NYC.
THANK YOU once again Shelley💚

title: Poor room service
text: Hotel was neatly maintained but the room service was terrible. We had to call several times for bedsheets, creamer, sugar etc. One day they did not even put any bedsheets on the bed. Sometimes they did not even pick up the phone.

title: Great place to stay
text: Great location in Midtown Manhattan. All staff were very friendly and helpful. Very prompt response to request for a kettle and the sage to be reset. Room was big enough for 3 adults and kept clean and tidy. View from room 604 was east 36th Street, not the most exciting in NY. Would stay again if in NY

title: Amazing Hotel Experience!!!
text: All of the customer service staff went above and beyond to ensure a smooth and comfortable stay. My wife and I felt like our questions were always answered and the staff were very kind and sincere. Louis, Juan, and Jamie went especially out of their way to take care of us. Great location. Within walking distance to many of the major sites. Highly recommend.

title: Charming and well functioning
text: Charming and well functioning hotel at a perfect location! The breakfast restaurant is nice and the greek youghurt dish is worth a Michelin star! The Doormann is super nice and efficient, he deserved a good tip!

title: 5/5 great stay, definitely reccomend!
text: My safe haven. I loveeee this place! I come to stay here whenever I’m in the city . The location is super convenient and close to all the restaurants/bars and sightings. The staff is super friendly! Shelley at the front desk is an Angel, always so nice to me. Very sweet and attentive! The rooms are clean & spacious. And the beds are soooo comfy. They also have a restaurant in the lobby, the food is delicious. 10/10 reccomend!!

title: ELITE!!!!!!
text: I’ve stayed more than a few times and it’s because of two reasons. It’s an amazing clean hotel but Shelley is top tier!!!!!! She’s really sweet helpful professional and that just makes this hotel even more amazing!!!!!!!!

title: Great customer  service
text: Customer service is top notch. My mother is handicapped and they provided exceptional service to accommodate us and got us checked in very fast. The room was perfect.  Shelly at the front desk was amazing.

title: Hidden Gem
text: We loved this hotel.  The location is excellent.  Close to Times Square and many subway lines and buses.  It’s tucked away on a side street.  We were on the third floor and didn’t have any issue with street noise at night.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The room was spacious by New York standards and clean.  You can’t beat the price for this location.

title: Amazing
text: This hotel is absolutely beautiful and the reception I received from Shelley was absolutely amazing. She made sure I got the best room.  I will definitely book this hotel again when I come back to New York. She

title: Loved it!
text: Stayed here for the second leg of our trip. Wish we’d of stayed here the whole time. I loved how the room was separated with a tiny wall so the kids felt like their pull out was their own room.  2 tv’s so we could watch separate things.  So spacious for NYC. Great views.  Super friendly staff. Will def stay here again.  We were in 1304.

title: Thanks Yadira!
text: We received the best service from the amazing Yadira. She assisted us with early check in and was friendly, accomodating and so helpful as were all the staff we met. The hotel is really comfortable and the room was spacious.

title: Good vibes
text: The hotel was so nice and accommodating. Absolutely loved the receptionist Shelley. She made sure to prioritize our comfort and wellbeing, and I couldn’t have been more thankful. It was an epic birthday.

title: Good Midtown location
text: Enjoyed my stay here. Well located for Midtown, especially for Macy's, Empire State Building and Madison Square Garden. Thanks to Shelly and Luis for their kind support with a later check-out on my final day there, it gave me a bit more time in New York before heading back to the airport.

title: Beautiful experience 10+
text: The hotel is very very nice, perfect position and welcomed by a beautiful staff, always available for any need. We spent several days in 2 different stays. We were also pampered with a wonderful box of belgian chocolate for our room with excellent view on the Empire State Building. Much appreciated also the flavored fresh water always available in the reception.  Yadira and Eremy, you are the best, thank you!

title: My experience with LE Soleil
text: I quite frequently travel to NY and my preferred place of stay is LE Soleil, Friendly staff, clean, great location, good amenities…. I love to stay here always!! Shelley at the front desk is always heart warming and very helpful!!

title: Who says all NYC hotels are small and overpriced? :)
text:
I booked two separate rooms and quality was uneven.

Empire view suite - disappointing and would not recommend at all for any reason.  Not worth the money.

Plenty of space but room was oddly configured and not much of great view of ESB. 

Bathroom was outdated with a tub/shower curtain. Window in bathtub area and no curtain.

A one-person old/dirty lounger in very small separate sitting space with a tv.

Executive suite 1 queen bed with sofa bed - met expectations, looked as shown on website but not as fresh/clean/new/updated. Overall, very pleased. Nicely sized room. Would recommend for sure.

Nice sized walk-in shower. 
 
Bathroom had sliding door so extra space.

Separate sitting area with couch/tv/end tables/lamps etc.

Nice glass closet, fridge etc.

Food/restaurant

Breakfast on Friday morning. Limited menu not much friendliness or accommodation from server. After that didn't go back as had a few quick spots on same block.

Lobby
Free water, cold hotel water provided was refreshing and appreciated after long summer days of walking. There is a place to sit outside of restaurant.

Elevators
One or two but at times very slow

title: Great boutique hotel in midtown
text:
We first stayed at the hotel 8 years ago when it first opened and the stay was so nice we didn’t look anywhere else. Again we were blown away by the clean and luxurious room but more so by the friendly helpful staff. Everyone we encountered was friendly and helpful and we loved the small non busy atmosphere and especially cold flavorful drinks in the lobby after a hot day sight seeing. 

I have to give a shout out to Keron at the bell desk who always had a smile and kind greeting and helped us with our bags and finding a car to the airport. When we came down early to leave for the airport he even called the call service to pick us up early so that we didn’t have to wait in the lobby.

title: Great stay
text: Excellent stay at this hotel, it was clean and very convenient! I had to arrive very late at night and they were able to accommodate. It was also very quiet. The staff was wonderful and Eranny & Yadira we’re very helpful during my stay!

title: Hotel Front Desk assistance
text: Eranny and Yadira were patient, helpful and friendly.  A superb NYC welcome! They assisted me with locating my company’s account, offered great dinning suggestions and alerted me with travel delays and suggested alternatives.

title: Well placed for most of the sights
text:
Just a couple of blocks from the Empire State Building, this old world style hotel is well placed for sightseeing.   There are a couple of bars and restaurants just a few steps away.   The bar attached to the hotel serves good food too.

The King room we had was very small.  (If the chair in front of the desk was being used, it was impossible to pass behind it)  but everything you need for a short stay was there.  If you want a room with a view ask for it when booking.  Ours on the 7th floor faced front and was probably the only floor with a high brick wall just two metres from the window which made it quite dark.   The views are probably at the back of the building.    

Apart from that, it was very clean and the bed was comfortable, although the quality of the bedding could have been better - the pillows in particular were low-grade and didn't have protectors on them.

There was a fridge with bottled water but unfortunately no fresh milk.   We British do like fresh milk in tea.   I'm sure it would have been provided by the excellent staff if we'd had asked.

The shower was very good and toiletries provided.  

36th Avenue is not that busy compared to other streets around and we weren't bothered by any street noise.

If in NYC for the first time, I recommend taking the city tour by the hop-on-hop-off bus.

title: Super!
text:
Excelente trato!!! Gracias a Shelley por sus chocolatinas y a Andrew por su simpatia y sus consejos
Siempre pendientes de los huéspedes 
Volveremos!!! El hotel está muy bien situado 
Los servicios son magníficos

title: It was awesome!
text: Check in was quick and easy but felt the front desk person with the red hair was a little to pushy on leaving a tripadvisor comment. Eranny and Nicole are great and are always ready to help or give advice or directions to anything I needed.. Jaime the doorman was great he also booked a car to the airport and loaded my bags overall will be back and will definitely recommend staying here.

title: Best reception staff
text: Such a lovely hotel with clean, spacious rooms and cool lobby. The front desk staff Shelley and Andrew are amazing, very accommodating, professional and super friendly, they are honestly the best! Definitely coming here again whenever we visit NYC

title: Comfort in the chaos
text: The hotel is cozy, homie and cute with the friendliest staff. Being so close to literally everything you’d want at your door step, it feels like a hidden gem. A special thank you to Yadira Eramy for going out of her way to accommodate us. She was so helpful and kind! I recommend looking for her with any concerns, questions or just to say hi if you need a smile put on your face!

title: Great Location
text: Me and my wife visit the city at least once a year and we have been in multiple hotels in the area, we will definitely return to this hotel is easy to get and out and in the center of everything, We will definitely recommend it.

title: Warm and welcoming staff!
text: Exceptionally friendly and warm staff members make this hotel a pleasure to stay in. Shout-out to Jamey at the front door, Yadira at the front desk, and Latch for quickly repairing a small issue with the lock on our door. Really, the whole staff is outstanding and it makes such a difference. Plus we had a room overlooking the Empire State Building and that was delightful.

title: MVP: Ms. Shelley
text: Thank you to our girl, Ms. Shelley!! She did amazing accommodating our large group. I felt very welcomed from the moment I stepped into the lobby. Will definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family! Thank you so much, Ms. Shelley!!

title: Luxe customer service/amenities at affordable price? Look no further!
text: A SIX on a scale of 1-5. Everything was FANTASTIC: clean, well-appointed and the customer service was what I would expect from a Luxury hotel. Coffee/ice tea/spa water filled and properly maintained in the very welcoming and spacious lounge area.  Our room was spotless. We had great water pressure in the rain shower, and there was a nice makeup mirror, too! The pullout couch in our suite was easy to use and surprisingly comfortable. When we decided we wanted an extra blanket late at night, it appeared at our door promptly. Every single staff person we saw was friendly and efficient. We were able to store our luggage conveniently when we arrived several hours early to check-in, and they called to let us know when the room was ready and had our bags waiting for us. When our flight was delayed, they again stored our luggage AND made arrangements for a car service to pick us up (which was prompt and a reflection of the same level of service we received at the hotel). Special shout out to KERON for arranging everything, and SHELLEY for also going above and beyond and taking the absolute best care of us. I can't wait to come back!

title: Great experience, will definitely stay again!
text: Very friendly and helpful staff.  The attached restaurant was nice for cocktails and brunch.  The hotel was not too loud and was able to sleep peacefully.  Decent amount of space in the suite with queen bed and foldout sofa.Only a short walk to the NY Public Library!!

title: Fantastic
text: Fantastic stay. Very welcoming and accommodating- let us have a late checkout & it was no problem! Water in lobby was a great touch. Tip: they will also arrange for a car to pick you up and drop off at the airport. Will definitely come back!

title: Great time!
text: The staff was amazing, the hotel was beautiful  and clean. Especially knowing that the staff was friendly and respectful The rooms were clean. Yadira and Irani were very welcoming. I would definitely  recommend  it.

title: Great location and some of the Best Hotel Staff Around
text: You can compare hundreds of hotels and many live up to the hotel basics such as comfortable furnishings, good TV, decent space, clean...all of which Executive exhibits.   If you need a centrally located NY hotel that's not quite as overwhelming as Times Square, look no further...Most importantly, the front desk staff was above and beyond expectations..clearly caring about my stay.   This includes complimentary coffee in the lobby each morning.  The gym could use a stand up cardio cycle and I hope they bring back the daily NY newspapers in the lobby, otherwise all good.

title: Great staff!  Awesome location too!
text: I loved everything about this hotel. With all the options, I would stay here again and again and again.   The rooms are super clean amd I appreciate the touches of chocolate and good soap. I wish they Keurig option has regular coffee, but this is an easy fix. Book here!!!

title: A gem in the heart of midtown
text: This was an unplanned overnight in New York City due to a canceled flight. I was so fortunate to find a room at a reasonable rate at this gorgeous hotel in Midtown Manhattan. The room was generously sized by NY standards, and the staff was extremely personable and professional. I’d like to give a special shout out to Keran for storing my bags and getting me an excellent (if expensive) ride to the airport. Keran went above and beyond, helping me consider the best time to leave in order not to miss my flight, but also to get to enjoy a little extra time in the city this morning!

title: Top class service!
text: After an unfortunate experience at a previous hotel Yadira and Eranny, the staff that welcomed us to LeSoleil, got out of their way to make us feel safe and at home. We had a great stay and were so happy about the high standards of the hotel! We will not hesitate to come back when we take the next trip to NYC!

title: Weekend getaway
text: Came here to celebrate my daughter’s 8th birthday. Immediately upon arrival we were greeted at the front desk my Shelley and Nichole. They were super friendly and made both my daughters feel really special. They even had chocolate for them!! We were then upgraded to an unbelievable room! They really went out of the way for my daughters. We travel frequently and I would say these two were the best hotel reception we have encountered!! Would definitely recommend this hotel and hopefully you get to experience the hospitality of these fantastic employees!! Thanks again Shelley and Nichole!

title: Great boutique hotel in central Manhattan
text:
Very friendly and courteous staff.
Facilities in rooms are good.
I’d recommend asking for a front facing room because the light is better but it’s New York, it’s going to be built up.
Coffee in room good quality, decent machine, and topped up daily.
I will book again.

title: The best customer service
text: Excellent customer from Ms Shelly and Ms Nicole! They were kind, polite and very accommodating. We are here for Gay Pride and they were welcoming! We felt welcomed! It was a very sincere warm welcome!

title: Volveremos siempre
text: Excelente servicio, la ubicación perfecta para visitar la ciudad, la vista de Empire State, el desayuno maravilloso, y la atención de Shelley siempre atenta a todo lo que necesitamos hicieron de esta experiencia un excelente recuerdo. Volveremos siempre.

title: Great Hotel. Great Location. Great Staff. Very Clean
text: Best location in a great shopping area, walk to Times Square and access to subway lines to get you anywhere you want to go. Hotel is a nice quiet hideaway in the middle of all the crazy. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was very clean and functional. Free Wifi. Good Parking on the same street.

title: Fabulous Suite and Service in Midtown NYC
text:
I absolutely loved my 7 night stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil NYC. The rooms are extremely comfortable and spacious with separare sleeping and living areas. Included with the room is bottled water, and a coffee machine, which is excellent.

 The location is truly central and you can step out into the action of the city at any time, which is exciting as well as safe, as a solo female traveller. 

 Depending on your floor, you may or may not have a view, however from my 11th floor room I had a fabulous view of the Empire State Building.

 The bathrooms are well stocked with toiletries as well as being exceptionally spacious and bright, and with ample marble counter space for getting ready, I just adored the room.

I spoke with Shelley and Luis the most at reception, and they were both a tremendous help and support for me in whatever I needed guidance, advice, or simply directions on. And it was truly lovely to be able to come back "home" after an adventurous day in the city and to be able to chat with genuine, sweet, caring and kind people. 

Without a doubt, I will be staying here again and again, and I can't wait to get back to the city.

title: Our stay at the Executive Le Soliel~ Superb
text: Jaime, Nicole and Shelley made our stay in NY comfortable and so much fun. They were also helpful and friendly. The Trademark bar attached to the hotel was a great place to go to for food/drinks and the staff there were super friendly as well. Highly suggest staying here.

title: Perfect stay in NYC
text: Great and Central location to explore New York. Super comfi room, large and soft bed and a great bathroom. Staff is super friendly! I can abolutely recommend this hotel for both business and private trips. I will come back!

title: Great Hotel In NYC
text: Fantastic hotel, great location and service was wonderful.  Yadira at the front desk was so kind and helpful for us. Close to everything. Room was well appointed, very comfortable, nice bathroom. Highly recommend.

title: So happy I chose to stay here! Thank you!
text: Thank you very much Yadira,Eranny and Andre for being there for me with a very personal matter. I travel a lot for work and whenever I have to come to NYC for work purpose. But moving forward with all that these 3 individuals did for me I am staying here at Le Soleil!!! I hope you all get acknowledged for all your hard work and how nice you all are! Thank you again

title: Girls Trip a Hit
text: This hotel is truly a wonderful place, the only thing that I could say needed improvement is the smell in the hotel. When you walk in it smells like sewer, the lobby where you sit there is a fireplace but I feel it can be upgraded more and just more modern. The doorman Jaime was very pleasant as soon as we walked in. However I have to mention two women who from when we walked towards them, to us explaining to them that we was on a "Girls Trip" that was overdue and both immediately connected with us. They checked us in immediately, Steve greeted us with delicious chocolates and was so nice. My girls have us an amazing room and sent us a bottle of bubbly with a card that made us feel so loved! Yadira and Eranny you ladies go over and beyond and I now see why other guests speak so amazing about you two. I'm huge on Trip Advisor and I read about you ladies but experiencing it first hand 👌🏻 phenomenal!!!! Thank u

title: Gems!! Yadira Eranny and Nicole
text: Arriving to two women who have amazing smiles and personalities, just starts the amazing check in process! I wanted to surprise my husband and these two ladies assisted me in every way. I needed balloons and decor and they pointed me in the right direction. As my husband was finishing work they made this whole process so much easier for me. I cannot thank you ladies enough for making me feel as if I was just the most important guest in the world!!!! Thank you to Nicole who assured me with where to go for dinner and it was a hit! I’m writing this review because when people go out their way to make you feel at home and assist you in anyway they can. You give them recognition!!!!! I wish there was more than 5 stars to rate .. Yadira and Eranny thank you and thank you! I am going to tell my friends and family to come visit you two and book direct as you both recommended!!!! Until next time ..

title: Amazing Hotel
text: I have been using this hotel for about 2 years now when I want somewhere nice to stay near work. Never had an issue, views of midtown are amazing, everything is clean and the customer service from Shelley is immaculate!!

title: Fantastic staff made it a great experience
text: This is a very nice boutique hotel.  The staff is fantastic!  Yadira Eranny was especially wonderful!  Only reason I am rating four instead of 5 stars is that he room was quite small.  Well equipped gym too!  Best thing about the hotel was the wonderful staff!

title: Very pleasant stay
text:
Perfect.  Amazing location, very welcoming and kind staff. The room is relatively big to other hotels in Manhattan’s area. Free water any time is a very refreshing attitude. 
We received cleaning services any time if the day or night. 
The only thing - the WiFi is a bit weak.

title: Excellent service
text:
I stayed at the hotel for 5 nights and has extremely happy with the service. 
I got support from Shelley, Luis and Andrew, they are amazing - very welcoming very supportive and happy to help. They bring the service of the hotel to highest standards.

Thank you, I would definitely recommend the hotel and will stay here again!

title: Great place to stay.
text: This was a very nice place. We felt secure and would be willing to stay here again. Everyone was really nice and helpful.  Shelley was really friend and helpful. She even remembered my name the next day.

title: Amazing
text: I was traveling with two other friends and we absolutely had the best time. Checking in and out was so easy and quick. Shelley and Luis went above and beyond for my friends and I, 10/10 service. We loved the room and the layout and the comfort of the beds. Everything was great. We couldn’t stop raving about it. We will definitely be back!

title: Nice Smallish Hotel
text: Second trip to this hotel - albeit 7 years apart. Considering the years in between -the hotel looked/felt the same - which means it’s been well kept up. Great location - easily accessible to Penn Station if arriving by train. Midtown location made it easy to go both to the east and west sides as well as south. Very clean, I love their infused ice water in the lobby, friendly/generally helpful staff.  It’s a little on the pricey side, but not crazily so. I would go back.

title: Le Soleil NY
text:
Great small hotel in a great location 
Tucked in next to a couples restaurants 
Walking distance to many areas 
Reasonable prices, clean, great staff, great car service to airport, 
Room was very quiet. 
Will be back.

title: Where you are known! Thank you all
text: This is my second time coming, and for Yadira, Eranny, Jamie, and Nicole to remember me was just amazing! My wife wanted us to try a different hotel but when she saw how we was welcomed. She said “This is where we will return each time we visit NYC!” Thank you Eranny and Yadira for checking us in early, thank you for the bottle of bubblies. Thank you Luis for the sports chat lol and Nicole thank you for helping my wife with her “girl necessities” you all are wonderful. To walk in a hotel where they recognize you means a thousand words!!! Also Steve and Will thank you for taking a moment and welcoming us as well! Will return everyone.

title: Wonderful Place To Stay
text: Can't say enough about this hotel and the staff. Shelley at the front desk greeted us and took wonderful care in getting us an amazing room. The location of the hotel is perfect for all activities (theater district, museums etc...). Also it's very close to an amazing bagel shop! Highly recommend!

title: Wonderful Stay!
text: GREAT location (close to Penn Station, subway lines, very walkable to many NY highlights), FRIENDLY staff, prompt response to a room issue, very clean. The refreshments in the lobby were appreciated as well as the coffee in our room. The view was of another building, but it is NY and to be expected. We very much enjoyed the Executive Hotel Le Soleil NY.

title: Feeling welcomed Thank you Yadira and Eranny
text: If i had to use one word to explain my experience from when i walked into this hotel would be " WELCOMING" Starting with being greeted by Jaime and having two wonderful smiles and a "Welcome!" From two awesome ladies Yadira and Eranny! These ladies made me and my family so happy, with crying children who are restless they checked us in immediately. So so grateful 🙏  you ladies truly made an impact on us. Thank You

title: Hotel Le Soleil is a gem, in the heart of Manhattan
text: We recently had the pleasure of staying at Executive Hotel Le Soleil . Upon arrival , at 1am , we were welcomed and made to feel at home with great hospitality.  The receptionist was even kind enough to order us a pizza at 1am as we needed a snack after our travels. The first morning, the manager Steven introduced himself to us , and was gracious enough to sit us down and carefully write us a list of everything worth seeing in New York with instructions of how to get there.  The hotel room was wonderful with a charming view of the Empire Estate building amongst others ,which were beautiful to admire. The room was spotless, quaint and had the most comfortable bed and pillows. The hotel is a gem , situated in the heart of Manhattan New York, and central to all the sites that are worth seeing within walking distance to 5th Avenue, Macys and the Summit one experience, which the concierge Juan recommended and very kindly helped us to book. A special thank you to Steven for making sure we had a wonderful stay. We have fond memories of our trip here and are planning to visit again in the near future !

title: Perfect stay
text: Executive Le Soleil is the perfect location to everything New York.   Staff was welcoming and accommodating. Room was comfortable.  Views of the city were amazing. And everything was within walking distance for a fun filled week in the city.

title: A small heaven in the middle of Manhattan
text:
This was a pleasant treat  after we visited USA for the first time. We had visited Puerto Rico and Fort Lauderdale,  and decided to do a four day stop to experience NY Manhattan.
Our flight was delayed due to smoke from bush fires in Canada and ended up landing at midnight.
The position of the hotel is strategically placed a block apart from the Imperial State Building.
The staff were exceptionally helpful, booked us in at no time and even helped us order one of the best pizzas we ever eaten in our lives !
The room was extremely clean, quite with breathtaking view.
The next day we were met by the manager, Steven who took it very personal to draw us a list of what we should do, what to avoid, what to see and where to eat!
His directions helped us utilize our limited time and experience good food, shopping as well as museums and a cruise on the harbor.
We consider Steven an  asset to the hotel business management.
The concierge was available every day to book for us trips as well as tickets and transportation.
The next day we were offered complimentary wine, and upgraded to a stunning pent house 😎
It is worth mentioning that we had access to free bottled water every day ( other hotels charge 5$ for a small bottle).
At the reception there was always free cold lemonade .
We had access to food at a minutes walking distance.
The bill was transparent with no hidden charges.
We will return with kids and friends for sure.

title: Great place to stay in NYC!
text: Awesome place to stay in NYC. Walking distance from Penn Station. By New York standards the room was HUGE! Great shower. The front desk staff are super friendly. Flavored water in the lobby and champagne at check-in was a nice touch. Very walkable to food, shopping and the Empire State Building. Would def recommend.

title: Great location for girl's trip
text: Great location to tour Manhattan, close to train and many food options nearby. Close to tour buses and shopping. Beds were comfortable and rooms were clean. Close to the start of Puerto Rican festival.

title: NYC is our new favorite!!
text: Huge thank you to Yadra, Eranny, Nicole, and Steven for making our stay the best! They even surprised us with a bottle of wine and remembered that we were celebrating a special event! We will be back:)

title: Excellent service
text: Wonderful service, with attention to detail and friendly staff. Management is truelly in charge. Thank you to Yadira at the reception for all the help and attention. Made a big difference for our work in the City. Will certainly be back!

title: A stay in the city that never sleep
text:
Wonderful hotel, great localisation and in the center of the city ! Plus great rooms, we had a room with a view witch is a real plus to our stay.

Great staff too Shelley and Luis were wonderful and made us feel like home. There joy and smile really warmed our days.

title: NYC Gem. Keep it that way.
text: Always one of my favorite places to stay in New York. Great location, comfortable rooms, and great service at really a reasonable rates for NYC. This place is awesome for business and family vacations. I’ve stayed here at least five times over the last few years. The friendly and helpful staff at the front desk are, perfect examples of how customer service should work… shout out to Yadra, Iranny, and Nicole for taking care of our whole crew on this last trip. They got us checked in early and we had a fantastic stay.

title: Amazing front desk ladies Yadira and Eranny
text: From when you walk in, I want to thank Yadira and Eranny for amazing amazing customer service. Yadira helped me with documents so I can open a bank account … and I just want to say thank you for this! Thank you Steve also for being nice… I will be back I promise

title: Birthday off to a great start!
text: Yadira & Eranny are awesome! Very nice greeting I arrived early and Yadira offered some cold drinks and assured room will be ready soon she also realized it’s my birthday and everyone in the lobby wished me a happy birthday that was so sweet! Eranny also let me know about a lot of rooftop vibes and restaurants in the area. Room was ready in no time. Appreciate both of them a bunch! Looking to the rest of my trip!

title: Great Place to Stay
text: SUPER comfy bed, amazing staff that are super friendly. Definitely feels like a higher end hotel. Had poor experience in a different hotel the night before and this was the complete opposite! Loved it

title: Exceptional Hotel
text: We absolutely loved our stay at Le Soleil. And to the amazing staff, instrumental at making our stay extra special, they all deserve a special shout-out. Thank you, Shelley, Nicole, Luis, and to the wonderful doorman/valet attendant, for consistently going out of your way for us, and for making us feel incredibly welcomed!We were also impressed with the comfortable, spacious, modern-styled rooms - they were always kept nice and clean for us. So, once again, thank you for making our stay both memorable and pleasant! We definitely look forward to returning soon again.

title: Do not recommend- rooms delayed by several hours
text: Do not recommend- check in is at 3 and we were notified that they were running behind and the room Would be ready in 20 min. Stepped out to eat lunch and came back 45 min later and the room still wasn’t ready (now an hour after check in). I was told to sit in the lobby and wait. After hearing several other customers complaining- I again talked to a manager who told me it could be another 2 hours. At this point I feel like we got the bait and switch- I can’t believe they would expect guests to sit in a lobby and wait for 3 hours at the start of their vacation. We ended up cancelling our reservation and stayed at a different hotel up the street where we walked right into our room. Sadly- we can’t get those precious hours back from the start of our trip. I definitely would not stay here until they can get their mismanagement back under control.

title: Fab Stay!
text: The best experience! Such incredible suites, perfect for work trips. Great location! The staff are great and warm too. Yadira and her colleagues made extending my stay a very smooth process! Jamie had some great city recommendations too

title: Saved us thank you Yadira and Eranny
text: I want to start by saying the experience in the airport was horrible, taking a yellow taxi to the hotel was just the worse! I was already aggravated and when I arrived I thought I couldn’t check in and thanks to Yadira and Eranny as soon as I walked in with my kids they saw the stress of a mother. They told me to give them a moment and they will work magic..  I waited half hour and at 10am Yadira said we have your room! I couldn’t be more grateful… all I am saying is with all that I went through these two women calmed me and allowed us all to check in promptly… Thank you ladies .. because of the treatment I will return

title: The best hotel in NYC
text: Me and my daughters had a wonderful time at Hetel Soleil.  The staff is kind, attentive, trustworthy, and outstanding.  The rooms are ALWAYS a joy to stay in.  The regular rooms are spacious, quiet, and able to comfortably accommodate parents and children with their own spaces.  The penthouse suite is a dream come true.  The view is impeccable and the room itself is like a spacious apartment!  The towels are so fluffy, the pillows are always the perfect combination between soft and firm, and the decor is luxurious.  Every time I go to NYC, which is every month or so, I stay at Hotel Soleil.

title: Lovely time!
text: I mainly chose this hotel for the excellent location, but was delighted by the entire experience. Everything was clean and comfortable. I was able to text them when I needed something, which they took care of while I was out to dinner. Would definitely stay again?

title: Top notch service
text: I have not been to new York in so long, but as soon as I checked in I felt at ease. Two agents by the names of Yadira and Eranny immediately greeted me and made me feel that New York was still a home away from home. Amazing customer service and you just know you are loved. I will return thank you ladies

title: Thank you Yadira and Eranny
text: I can't thank enough Yadira, and Eranny for being so nice to me and my wife. We was greeted so nice, they both smiled and was so attentive... They offered us early check in and gave us so information on the city and the hotel. When you walk in a hotel and before you even walk in your room and you feel like family but is all you need to know, you have to come back!!! Thank you ladies

title: 很棒！
text: 酒店非常不错，很干净，很安静，位置也很方便，地理位置好，我们将会在这里呆两天，但是都看起来很不错，前台Shelley非常棒很贴心，

title: Cozy and clean room. The size is pretty decent and great front desk. Yadira and Meredith were super responsible and frie
text: Thumbs up! Met every bit of my expectations and the staff were super friendly and helpful.  Thumbs up Yadira and Meredith.  They were a plus to the hotel. So many good places within the shortest walk and great sites too. I surely got a new abode in NYC! 100%!

title: Excellent Hotel
text: A very nice hotel, with very friendly,  attentive and exceptional staff. The fabulous views and a perfectly centralized location will make you want to stay here on your next NYC visit. Book your stay at Executive LeSoleil Hotel NYC and you will be glad you did!

title: Very good stay
text: No big complaints. Nice room, good location, quiet. Expect to pay premium prices for a premium experience. As this was our third stay at this hotel, we were expecting some offer of upgrade or complimentary perk such as breakfast (which we received the first time we stayed here). Unfortunately, nothing was offered, so don’t expect anything and you’ll be ok.

title: Grate place.in the middle of the FUN!!!
text: Grate swanky place. Rooms are clean.  Many restaurants and even a few cvs drugstores .to get toiletries. You might need to buy .if you forgot your tooth brush. Or deodorant.  Very closed to empire state building and world trade center memorial.

title: Excellent Experience
text: Shelly and Andrew made me feel so welcome! The customer and room service were excellent, the room was very comfortable, and the hotel is lovely. I highly recommend staying at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York, NY.

title: Great experience
text: We had a great experience staying at Le Soleil from check in to check out. Andre provided a warm welcome. Yadira was a delight every day-very friendly, professional and helpful. Jaime provided us with seamless airport transportation. Juan and Anna and the other restaurant staff provided excellent service and tasty breakfast, brunch and drinks. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. The location was perfect for access to theaters, subways and museums. The hotel manager Colin was friendly and eager to assist as needed, and clearly does a fine job of managing the staff and operations. We will stay here on our next trip to NYC and would advise anyone seeking a nice boutique-style hotel in midtown to do the same.

title: Welcoming Staff
text:
Thank you for the warm welcome by Shelley, Luis and Andrew.  Much appreciated after a 10hr flight. If you’re visiting Midtown Manhattan this is a great location to stay. 

Located close to Koreatown there are lots of food options in the vicinity.

title: Perfect
text: Usually it’s a great a experience when staying at this fantastic hotel / location and staff as well specially Yadira at the front desk, She is very nice person and very professional with a smiley face, She is usually helping me to book my stay directly with her instead of a third party. Thanks a lot Yadira.

title: Worst experience. Misbehaving
text: Not helpful. Tried to change my reservation but they said no and hang up. Staff is rude. No help us given nor they decided to make my experience. I ended up booking another hotel for my trip. I don’t advise

title: Good people win
text: First time to NYC. Complimentary upgrade to floor 20 from Luis and Shelley … Me, my wife and two adult daughters … made our stay all the more pleasant with the extra space. Good people win when they treat their customers that way. Thank you L&S!

title: Highly to recommend
text: Perfect location, room with sofa bed has a Room with sofa bed has good size for NY even with some space for the suitcases, friendly stuff everywhere, very quiet if room is not to the street side - to recommend for the nights.

title: Great stay
text: The hotel was very nice and Shelly provided great service very quick with checking in also very friendly and was very attentive to our needs the room was perfect would definitely book in the near future !!

title: Great
text: Shelley was very inviting and friendly, she gave great service and had good conversation. The view from within the hotel was lovely as well as the view from the room. The rooms are nice and spacious.

title: Very good hotel and awesome front desk
text:
It was an amazing stay. The rooms were nice. Location is very good. No street noise yo disturb but at the same time very close to everything..
Shout oht to the front desk- Shelley and Luis.. they both were very welcoming especially Shelley, the check in was a breeze.. would definitely recommend the hote to family and friends

title: Nice hotel with great staff
text:
Nice hotel with great staff and good comfortable rooms. Very good location. Stayed here also last visit. Will come back.

Only two elevators so sometime wait time to go up and down. Wifi still slow, could improve be more efficient to use.

title: Exceptional stay
text:
My experience was exceptional in every aspect. From the quiet and clean room to the reasonable pricing
One of the standout features of my stay was the friendly and welcoming nature of the front desk staff. Shelly, Andrew, and Yadira went above and beyond to ensure that my needs were met and that I felt comfortable throughout my stay. Their genuine warmth and helpfulness truly made a difference.
In particular, I would like to commend Arisa for her assistance. I had a specific request for an extra chair, and she promptly took care of it, Convenient location to Penn Station.

title: Customer needs first
text: The hotel personnel are very attentive to guests needs and desires. Steve and Shelley were very helpful and responsive to all of our needs. This stay was just outstanding. Very comfortable rooms and cozy robes.

title: amazing staff!
text: 10/10 experience staying at this hotel! Amazing staff!! Shelly welcomed us with champagne and chocolate when we checked in and was super helpful our entire stay. Room was nice and clean too. Will definitely be staying here the next time I’m in NYC!

title: Best front desk staff.  Luis, Shelly & Andrew
text: I’ve been staying at this hotel for the last couple of years whenever I come to nyc on business.  One of the best thing about staying here is the staff. “King” Luis “Queen” Shelley and “Prince” Andrew are so accommodating, friendly and makes you feel so welcome.  They know my by my first name when I check in and always very helpful with all of my needs.  I will continue to stay here.  The only ding I might have is that the rooms needs a little updating but the size of the room for an nyc hotel is pretty good.

title: 5 night stay Hotel Le Soleil
text: Great location close to all the main sights in mid town. Lots of local bars and restaurants. Stayed in 2 rooms on 4th floor, some days rooms were not cleaned. On one day cleaners wanted to clean at 7pm. Issues with bathroom doors. Both rooms had sliding doors, one had a faulty handle that was partially fixed, the other room had a door that’s was not fixed either end or the bottom. Staff on reception very attentive but rooms need updating and some attention. Beds were comfortable.

title: friendly, comfortable
text: Shelley was so friendly and great with my son.  She made check-in easy and we had a great stay.  The rooms had everything we needed and were comfortable.  The location is wonderful and the hotel was clean and not too crazy for NY.

title: Had an amazing time!!
text: Had an amazing time here! Stayed with my sister and cousins for our first trip to New York! Shelly and Kiran were absolutely lovely and treated us so well and greeted us with warm smiles every time we saw them! Will definitely be staying here again!

title: Feels Like Going to a Friends House
text: I loved this hotel so much that I am coming back in June! I felt welcome every time I walked in the door. I want to call out some of the super staff - Shelley, Juan, Keron, Andrew, Juan and Meredith. They all went out of their way to ensure we enjoyed our stay.

title: Great time for sisters birthday
text: We went here recent got my sisters birthday and it was tremendous. The second I walked in I was greeted with such kindness and care from Andrew and Shelley. When I told Andrew it was my sisters birthday he said,"wait" and gave us a bottle of Prosecco on the house. The hotel room itself was clean and comfortable. What more could you want! I recommend this hotel 100% and we're big fans of Shelley and Andrew !

title: Awesome Manhattan hotel w/ proper customer service
text:
Shelley and Andrew the best!! Super accommodating with parking and all favours large and small.

two for one review: Originally had stayed at Executive Manhattan Times Square, but experience was so awful I had to leave and luckily stumbled onto this hotel instead. Come to Le Soleil!

title: Excellent customer service!
text: From the minute we arrived Andrew, Shelley and Luis were amazing! They were very inviting, friendly and helpful. The room is cute and clean with a view of the Empire State Building directly in front of our room. What else can you ask for?! We’ll definitely come back!

title: Consistentexceptional experience!
text: Amazing hotel with incredible staff! I stay here every time I’m in the city for so many reasons. 1. The staff and longevity of the staff, they are courteous, kind and always go above and beyond, Shelley and Andrew are absolute rockstars! Each trip has been consistent, clean beautiful rooms with top notch amenities. I’ve never been disappointed with this incredible hotel. The people here make a difference!

title: Awesome
text:
I would recommend this Hotel to everyone, 
They are very welcoming here , pleasant and nice  people Shelley and Andrew at the desk were the best they made sure that I have a good time here with my friends  they were very helpful!!! Thank you for that
Also  the room was nice and clean , all the sheets and towels  ironed :)) nice scent in the room
All together it was Awesome.
Thank you

title: Fun times! Great Staff!
text: Shelley and Andrew really took care of us today. Not only are they really amazing at their jobs but awesome, caring people as well. I wasn’t feeling great when I showed up and they gave me a lot of things and laughs to help me feel better. The bar staff is lovely and very helpful. I’m very glad I chose to stay here!! Will be back!

title: Excellent hotel with amazing staff!!
text: Excellent hotel with incredible  location. It is extremely clean and comfortable. The staff at the reception is amazing, specially Shelley and Andrew who went over the top to make us feel welcome. I would definitely recommend this hotel to everybody!!!

title: Excellent New York Hotel!
text: Shelley and Meredith exceptional!!  Room refreshed the first night!! Always greeted by Shelley!  Face towels promptly delivered when requested..5mins!!.Great breakfast/ lunch option next door with $ menu..I Refreshing fruit water/ tea in lobby weekdays! Coffee in am.. Times square.. Broadway.. Macy's..Gap..Grand Central station all about 6-10 min walk..I love this hotel..nice clean room too!

title: Great service
text: Very good service, esp. Shelley! Will definitely go there again! Centrally located, clean rooms. Overall nothing to complain about. Would recommend to anyone planning on visiting New York for business or pleasure.

title: Awesome!!! Clean and comfy. Great location
text: Absolutely great hotel !!! Great location, staff was very friendly and helpful !! And very clean. Comfortable rooms and no sound of NYC noise. Will def be going back. Shelly and her colleagues at the front desk very very helpful. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: Exceptional service creates lifelong customers - Thank you Shelley and AN
text: Hands down exceptional customer service! If you are looking for a best class experience - this is where you book. Shelley Nicole and AJ were incredible - they were instrumental in facilitating a wonderful experience. They provided the ultimate service experience and now this is my go to hotel. Thank you 5++++ starts.

title: Hermosa estadia!
text:
He pasado un hermosa estadia de 3 días en este Hotel muy bien ubicado, cerca de lugares para desayunar, almorzar y cenar. El recibimiento y atencion del servicio al cliente ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ limpieza⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️, mi habitacion estaba perfecta para una sola persona. El baño y ducha super espaciosos. 
Muy recomendable. Sí vuelvo a elegir este Hotel!

title: Very  good
text:
Je reviendrai  volontiers. 
L hôtel est bien  situé,  près  de macy s, times square et gares.
Le métro  n était pas loin. 
Le restaurant  sur  place  était un plus et la nourriture  variée.
J ai apprécié la qualité du lit.

title: Excellent Service
text: Yadira and Meredith provided friendly and professional service from the moment I walked in. The room was clean and well appointed and the location was excellent. From top to bottom the experience, as usual, was excellent and I will continue coming back.

title: Good time at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil NYC
text:
Nicely located. Very good guests services, nice and welcoming staff at and a special thanks to Meredith at the front desk! Very responsive and efficient. Far from home we felt very comfortable and appreciated it.
The place to be in Manhattan.

title: Holidays at Executive Hotel - Le Soleil
text:
I went to this hotel for holidays with my family, it has a great location and the room was spacious  and very comfortable. 
Meredith who assisted us during our stay was very nice and did everything for making us feeling at home, a special thanks to her! 
I recommend this hotel.

title: Hospitality Extradordinaire
text: Quiet.  So accommodating.  You are treated as a guest.  You're known by your name and greeted with a smile.  The food matches their level of all around service. A smart tasteful menu.  Please, more options to the spirits.  Thank you Steve & Juan.  After seeing "Shucked" our first night you are both the cream of the crop.

title: Pleasantly surprised.
text:
Stayed overnight in the city with my sister and my brother-in-law. This hotel about 2 blocks away from the Grand Central Station ans within walking distance from NY Penn Station (10 min walk), Rockefeller (20
min), and Times Square (10 min).
The hotel is nestled next to a big-chain hotel that I have used many times. I must say that Executive Hotel is by far the better of the 2. The hotel management has hired the best people at the  front desk. They are so warm and friendly and make you feel welcome in their hotel. Shelley was exceptional ....the guy who was working alongside her was just as nice judging by the way he treated the other customers who were inquiring about something. 
The lobby was clean and our suite was also very clean. They have thoughtful touches of free chocolates and water in the room. We had a great view of the city at night. Except for the broken cabinet that holds the safe  (i forgot to report it so they can get it fixed), everything was just LOVELY.
