I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Was visiting NYC for my great niece’s college graduation and my birthday.
text: The staff is fantastic! From the time we checked in with Luis, to Juan the great concierge and Steve the operations manager. The food in the restaurant is also very good. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Nice Stay in NYC
text:
The hotel is well located. One block a Subway Station, Macys, HM. The Empire States is two walking block. Is possible to get the Hotel from JFk using the LIRR to PEN Station. The facities are so nice, the staff of the Hotel is friendly. I  lost my Wallet and the Hotel contact me informing that someone find it.
I staye with my 23 years old son in The Executive Suite with an Coach/Bed where he could sleep well.
The room was very big for us.
I would stay here again.

title: Great service all around
text: Great service from the front desk, Meredith and Yadira were exceptionally understanding and helpful during the checkout process. Everything was easy and smooth from the get go. Looking forward to staying here again!

title: LOVELY
text:
Absolutamente genial
Localización estupenda, personal encantador
Especial mención a Nicole, que los ayudó con un error en el check out
La habitación muy amplia y limpia
Muy recomendable, espero poder volver !
Muchas Gracias

title: Very good choice
text:
The hotel staff is very friendly and extremely helpful. 
Operations Manager Steven Kyriakides was very thoughtful and extremely generous, he making our stay at this hotel and the birthday of my wife perfect. Thanks!
In the attached restaurant you can eat well.
The room is perfectly adequate - all the amenities you need are there. 
The location in the center is great, you can reach a lot on foot. 
We will definitely check in there again!
Conny and René

title: Cannot be beat for the price
text:
These are typical NYC rooms (compact), though with good size bathrooms. The one knock is that the pocket doors on the bathrooms have worn rollers and crappy hardware. It’s time for replacement 

The hotel itself is in a brilliant location in midtown. It’s next to Keen’s Steakhouse, clean se to shopping and the subway, and walking distance to Times Square. The staff, as everyone has pointed out, is very friendly and helpful. It’s my new favorite hotel in the city

title: Home away from home
text:
The hotel staff are friendly & extremely  helpful.  Yodira & Luis welcomed us back, remembering us from our December 
visit. Yodira makes greets us each morning with a smile & reminders on how they can make our day better.  They aim to make their hotel a home away from home. HimThe food at the affiliated restaurant is great. 
The room is wonderful - all tge amenities that we look for.

title: Perfect
text: I booked this hotel at the spur of the moment for a quick trip into NYC. It was terrific -- Shelley and the staff were all excellent and attentive and I would highly recommend it especially if you want to be in the area of the Morgan Library and Bryant Park. The hotel is quiet, even though Fifth Avenue is yards away.

title: Great Stay
text: Ravis de notre séjour en famille. Troisième fois que nous allons à l´Executive hotel Le Soleil. Equipe à l'écoute, réactive, et toujours souriante. Chambre au calme, literie juste comme il faut, bouteilles d´eau et carré de chocolat tous les jours. Le restaurant de l´hôtel propose un petit déjeuner varié et frais. Merci à toute l´équipe, en particulier à Steven et Andrew et leurs collègues qui nous ont si bien accueillis.

title: Exceptional customer service
text: I had forgotten what exceptional customer service and friendliness was like until I experienced it at this hotel. Shelley and Luis both went above and beyond to make my stay unforgettable. I will definitely be staying in this hotel again and recommending to my colleagues because of the referenced team. Nice job in demonstrating that excellence isn’t a thing of the past!

title: Le Soleil Stay
text: Hotel was amazing and the service was wonderful. We stayed for three nights and the staff was very accommodating and answered all of our questions. Keron was an awesome and friendly doorman. He would give us advice and tips on where to go and made sure we were treated well.

title: Lovely Stay at the LeSoleil
text: Lovely hotel in a wonderful location! Stayed for 3 nights and had plenty of room for four people. Walking distance to public transit, Ktown, and Times Square. Great customer service as well, especially from Keron the bellman!

title: Very clean, kind staff
text: Stayed here 4 days, 3 nights. Very clean place, and staff were very kind. The rooms were updated and the amenities were nice. Keron took care of my family and made us feel welcome. Would stay here again.

title: Very comfortable
text:
This hotel is centrally located and close to multiple subways. The room was super clean and comfortable. Checked in with Shelley and Nicole, who were amazing and very accommodating to all our needs. 

I would definitely recommend and stay here again!

title: Great Room and Fantastic Customer Service
text: Came into NYC on a rainy day and were greeted by a wonderful front desk group of Shelly, Luis and Nicole. Everything was ready when we got there. We got into the room and everything was in great shape. This is the kind of hotel experience I always expect when I travel and this time i got it. Will definitely stay here again when in NYC.

title: Overnight layover
text: The staff were amazing.  Especially Meredith and Shelley.  We arrived well before check-in and they did everything possible to make our stay comfortable.  They gave us great recommendations and made sure our room was ready as soon as possible.  The Valet was great during checkout and the car service to the airport was awesome.

title: My Special Holiday.
text:
I have been here for 3 nights, the property was gorgeous, cleaning and good service, the food is really good, the bed is comfy.we really love the hotel signature cocktail.
I definitely come back and stay again here. Highly recommend you will have no doubt on you staying.

title: Best  daytime management
text:
When I first check in  my room wax Terrable  my house man arrive two hours later as I needed him night front desk only one person night house man helpless my bed sheets dirty stains tiny room. It was Terrable but next morning I got a much better room. Bigger front desk staff morning day time much better 
 front desk service mr Steve was wonderful very helpful I got a free upgrade to a bigger room. so much better bug thank you ti Maria  housekeeping manager she made my bed and made sure I was all good hug thank you to mr Steve hotel operations

title: We keep coming back because of the staff 🥰
text:
After giving my spouse an earful from being left behind for nearly half a year of business travel they finally agreed that yes:  my birthday might be a good reason for me to come along this time.

The Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York is a go to for my spouse when they are in NYC for work:  travel and transit connections are great, as are the neighborhood choices for food and culture.  Herald Square is 'right there' but doesn't feel like it from the midblock hotel, which is quiet and serene for Midtown.

But it's the staff who keep us coming back,  always curious and kind.  On this trip when Shelly and Luis at the front desk checked me in they noted from my ID "this is your birthday weekend?"  I confessed it was and they asked how we planned to spend our time.  When they heard that my spouse always had an exploding suitcase and liked peace and quiet they moved us to a room that made my spouse happy.  Best of all, the night we came home from my birthday dinner there was a nice bottle of wine and a card from Shelly and Luis and other staff wishing me a happy birthday.

So it's great that when we come back to NYC next fall we will not only be looking forward to the accomodation but the good people, like Shelly and Luis, who work there.

title: Andrew from Start to finish was Great
text: The rooms are larger than most NYC rooms these days and its a chill spot next to everything. The best part was Andrew, from reservation to check-out he kept the same high quality energy and professionalism that I look for when enjoying my time. Andrew you rock, and this place is dope.with great restaurants very close by.

title: Fantastic
text: The hotel was amazing. The hotel staff were amazing and made our anniversary stay truly memorable. They gave us a bottle of wine to make it special. Will definately be back again. Location was so close to everything. Thank you for a amazing stay.

title: Definitely recommend
text:
We were made to feel very welcome on arrival. We mentioned we were celebrating our wedding anniversary and a bottle of wine was sent to the room - lovely touch. 
Best shower in a hotel we’ve ever had. Very comfy bed too. 
Cleaning dept  didn’t always leave water and replace towels that had been taken but again reception were quick to help. Although the room was cleaned spotlessly. 
Great location. 
Definitely recommend the hotel.

title: Nice hotel, good check-in
text: Good location. Nice clean rooms. Shelley and Andrew at the Front desk are  super friendly. The flavored water in the lobby and complimentary bottles in the room are much appreciated after flight. I’ve stayed here before and will stay here again.

title: Good Stay
text:
Liked this hotel very much.  The location for us was ideal, waking distance to so much and close subway for sights further away.  
Our room was on the 17th floor and had a fab view of the empire state building, Extra impressive at night :)
The room was plenty big and equipped with everything we needed.  We did have an issue with the coffee machine but it was replaced immediately so top marks for customer service :)  The bed was lovely and comfortable.  The only issue was the aircon  (?) pipe outside the window was so loud, it made it difficult to sleep.  We bought earplugs so that helped. 
All staff we encountered were very nice.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and would stay again.

title: Service, Shelley and Nicole, Front Desk
text: Shelley and Nicole are amazing.  They are a primary reason why I return to this hotel time and again.  The level of hospitality - service they provide is second to none.  Warm smiles are a welcoming presence every time I walk in the door.

title: The Best hotel in NYC
text: The accommodation was excellent, and the personnel were outstanding, courteous, welcoming, and skilled. Among them, Ms. Shelley , a guest service representative, truly shined. Shelley demonstrated the highest level of professionalism and showed genuine concern for her guests' needs, ensuring our satisfaction and catering to all aspects of our stay. Ms. Shelley is genuinely the finest. Thank you for everything!

title: best hotel for vacation in New york
text:
The location of the hotel is perfect. in the center close for everything. 
The staff was amazing. everyone was so kind, everything we asked for they try to help immidiatly.
Specially Yardira and Meredith - Thank you for your service, you definetly make our staying excellent!
we are enjoy everymoment at the hotel /

title: Highly recommend
text: This was my first time staying at this location and I had a wonderful time. The staff was very friendly and respectful. Shelley and Latch made me feel right at home from the beginning and checkout was a breeze.

title: What an experience with Yadira
text: What an amazing experience at a hotel that is in the middle of all good restaurants! The staff at the Front Desk and the Doormen was all amazing and helpful! But I will say one agent caught my whole attention and her name was Yadira, even though she said they call her Yaya as well .. lol … she assisted me with a smile and just assured me that I was at the right spot. She expressed how the hotel was a “baby” to her as she has been at this location since opening! She assured me on where to visit and where to eat! I was feeling down as I had a loss in my family but she talked to me and showed me a bright side to life! She didn’t know how much she helped me emotionally and I just want to say Thank You! I have informed my friends about visiting this hotel and asking for Yadira for reservation. Thank you Yadira and Le Soleil staff!

title: Hospitality!!!
text: Hospitality!!!! The people were warm and friendly. They attended to details and they remembered me. They helped in every way they could. I stay in hotels in NYC every month and this was my first time here. I will absolutely make this my regular-no doubt. A special thanks to Yadira, Nicole, Meredith and Steven K. You went above and beyond. Thank you!!!

title: Recommended
text: Exactly what we expected from a centrally located city hotel. The rooms were adequate and clean with all required amenities. Service was excellent throughout too. The hotel is well located to subway stations and walking distance to sites such as Rockefeller, Grand Central and Empire State.

title: BEST HOTEL EVER AND THE STAFF WAS AMAZINGLY AWESOME AND SO HOSPITABLE!
text:
Prior to the pandemic, I was in NYC monthly and always enjoyed staying there.   I  think they have even improved further.   EVERYONE THAT WORKS THERE is truly delightful!!

The best hotel ever...I was in NYC for three days for business.  As I was setting up my product, I realized that I needed straight pins to pin my product on the walls.   I went to the front desk and asked if Housekeeping had any pins..  Shelly at the front desk was amazing..  She gave me 6 safety pins that belonged to her and she saved my day!   Everyone is so delightful there.   Ian, Sales Director is truly amazing.     I wanted to check in early so that I could hang my clothes up and he so graciously accomodated me.    He is also one in a million.    The entire staff was so accomodating!   I love the room size and I love the fact that it is brighter in the room than most NYC hotels.   Makes me want to return to NYC.

title: Shelley at Check-In
text: Shelley at Check-In was the absolute sweetest. She had the greatest attitude and made me excited to be staying at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York. She even went out of her way to ensure I had a high room since it was my first time there. Location of the hotel was perfect. Right by 34th street stores, walking distance to Broadway shows, so many bars/coffee shops/restaurants walking distance.

title: Comfortable Location
text: Excellent and friendly staff from the moment you arrive until you leave.  Great location with restaurants nearby that are diverse and delicious!  The beds and linens were superb and extremely comfortable.  Free coffee and water is another bonus!

title: Best hotel experience
text: The establishment was well maintained and clean.  The room was great and the staff were amazing,courteous, friendly and professional. Ms Shelley Rosario a guest service agent was the best. Shelley is very professional, she cares a lot about her guest and makes sure that we were comfortable and had everything that we needed for our stay.  I give Ms Shelley a 10 out of 10 and Executive Le Soleil a 5 star. Roscoe and Andrea will definitely be back again.

title: Great stay in NYC
text: Very convenient location to Penn Station, Times Square, and easy access to anything else you want to do in Manhattan. We chose this hotel as we needed 2 beds at an reasonable rate, which this one offered.  The other main plus was soundproof windows- we were on a low floor, but couldn't hear any traffic!  We recently stayed at one of the hotels right next door, on a high floor, and even with earplugs, the traffic noise was super loud!  The restaurant attached looked nice.  I didn't eat, but hung out at the bar for a bit and it was very pleasant.  The lobby area is large, with lots of comfortable seating and a nice gas fireplace.  The only thing I was missing was a rooftop place to hang out, with a view!

title: Awesome Hotel and Location
text:
The location of the hotel is amazing - bang on in Manhattan but not to close to Time Square or the noise one normally gets being within the Manhattan area. 
The size of the rooms too - really condusive compared to what one gets in NY

title: Dedicated team, charming place!
text:
Service is cutting-edge! Besides the beautiful interior and the charming theme with gold and art-deco-touch, there is a fabulous team around the manager and his colleague Shelly - they put a ton of effort in their jobs and have just been lovely! 👍🏼 We never felt “customer is king” more than here. 

There are roomy and renewed bathrooms, sometimes even with a window. Upper floors (there are 20) come with a spectacular view - either Empire or Vanderbuilt. If you want this, make sure to be above 12th floor. 
Suite-layout is pleasing. There is a fridge and a practical closet. Lighting is comfortable. 

When it comes to breakfast: there are vouchers of 25$ per Person for an connected restaurant.

We had the best time at Le Soleil in New York and would love to return. 💛🌞💛

title: Amazing Stay at ExecutiveHotel LeSoleil
text: Yadira, Front Desk Agent, was genuinely kind, patient, and extremely helpful during our stay.  She truly is a blessing to this company. Our stay was both relaxing and oeaceful.  We are already looking forward to our December stay.

title: Good Place in NYC
text: The room we reserved was very small and they moved us to a suite without an extra charge!  The front desk was accommodating, friendly and efficient.   There was a problem with the door to a cabinet in our room and Ron, the maintenance person repaired it in no time.  He was personable and knowledgeable. This hotel treats guests wonderfully and the location is perfect

title: STAY HERE! Best hotel!!
text: By far the best hotel we’ve been in. We actually had a full night’s rest with an extremely quiet room. Shelley greeted us and went above and beyond for our weekend out. Keron gave us recommendations and was a great first person to see when you walk in the hotel. We will definitely stay here again. Perfect location and amazing staff. No complaints.

title: Stay at LeSoleil
text:
The hotel was excellent.  Rooms were clean and comfy. The team there were very friendly.  Shelley was very warm and welcoming and ensured anything that we needed for our stay to be worthy was completed. 
Thanks.

title: Great hotel
text: I highly recommend the Executive Hotel LeSoleil.  Fantastic experience from initial reception to booking out.  Great staff, great rooms, perfect location.  We were made to feel so welcome.  Thanks Yadira and Jimmy.  Would definitely stay again.

title: 최고의 직원들과 호텔 시설!
text: 호텔 위치가 완벽합니다! Penn station, Empire State Building, Bryant Park, Grand Central Station과 무척 가까워서 교통도 편리하고 주변 관광하기에 최적의 장소입니다!! 게다가 호텔 분위기랑 룸 컨디션도 신축이라 무척 깨끗하고 아늑해서 지내기 편하고 쾌적했어요. 호텔 시설(Amenities)도 gym, lounge 등등 웬만한 건 다 있습니다. 호텔 직원들도 정말 친절했습니다. 특히, Shelley라는 직원분이 엄청 꼼꼼하게 잘 챙겨주셔서 호텔에서 지내는 동안 행복했습니다. 게다가 룸 업그레이드를 펜트하우스(Penthouse Suite)로 받아서 정말 최고의 경험이었습니다. 펜트하우스는 야경도 엄청 좋더라구요. 다음에도 이 호텔에 머물 것 같아요!

title: Lovely front desk staff amazing location
text: Amazing location in the heart of Manhattan the vibe of NYC can be felt just stepping outside of the door. The hotel is very well maintained with high standards in materials & very comfy! Don’t forget to ask for Luis & Shelley two wonderful individuals that go out of their way to make you feel welcome and comfortable hone away from home thanks guys will definitely be back 🙏🏼

title: High recommanded
text:
We chose the first one for its location (10mn walk from time square, the Empire State building, the subway) and the good reviews it had
We were seduced by the kindness, the fact that the staff is helpful (I asked for a kettle they assembled it in 1/4d hour, I asked to heat a dish, they assembled a microwave! It is the 1st time that I see a hotel so reactive. I am a travel agent and I am used to hotels!
The comfort of the room, the cleanliness, the cozy living room with the fireplace, sincerely everything is there, I really recommend it if you pass to NYC

title: Estadia perfeita! Tornaram meu aniversário muito mais especial.
text:
O que tornou minha estadia perfeita sem duvida foi a atenção e gentileza de toda equipe do hotel, fizeram com que meu aniversário fosse muito especial. Um agradecimento especial a Yadira, Luis, Jimmy e Juan, sempre dispostos a ajudar e tornar tudo o mais agradável possível.

A localização do hotel é perfeita, já fui 3 vezes a NY e sem dúvidas foi minha localização favorita. Hotel bem centralizado, próximo da Macy’s, da 5th Avenue, da Times Square e o que não for perto basta pegar o metrô, pois há várias estações bem próximas ao hotel. Ao redor do hotel também tem restaurantes, redes de fast food e uma farmácia.

Quarto confortável, banheiro espaçoso, ambientes elegantes, modernos e aconchegantes.

title: Excellent
text: The best hotel I have stayed at in New York. Everything was more than perfect. All employees are very helpful and have a smiling face all the time. Rooms are very clean and the location of the hotel is perfect for walking to all must seen locations.

title: Exceptional Experience
text: First time at Hotel; but such a wonderful experience it will be our go-to whenever we are in town for a show. Staff was more than helpful; entire place was spotlessly clean; bed was more than comfortable.

title: Might be the best hotel in the city
text:
Shelly greeted me upon checking in...

She could tell I was very sad and leaving a bad situation 😔 

She talked to me and did her best to cheer me up ..smiles for days..that helped get me get back on my business mindset ,she really made sure to say may full name Nicholas how very respectful 🙏 

I know her happy greeting is the really what helped me get my self going !

That night I went out on the town there's so much do as soon as you walk out the door..you find yourself right in the action ..

As I came through the door I was greeted by Andre ..this young man stood up and said good evening sir how was your night...

Well I stood there and got to know this fine gettle man ,we spoke and the many possibilities of my business as a Vintage rolex dealer and metal detecting expert.

He was kind enough to share with me that his mom had a stroke..and that he is taking good care of her..truly a great man ,works hard ,treates ppl great and takes care of his sick mother...a American hero !!!

The hotel it's self is very classy, upscale with a touch of elegance that really stands out ..

title: great hotel
text: We stayed for 4 nights and look forward to going back.   The staff from check in to everything were so kind, friendly and helpful. The location was fantastic for shopping and getting around. I would like to say how great Shelley on reception was, she went above and beyond. Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: First time staying at Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York
text: Great experience staying at this hotel from out of town. The rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable updated and extremely quiet (no noise/street noise). The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Great rate and location. Would stay here again and recommend to others.

title: Great place to be now and next time!
text:
Great location, wonderful staff. I’m a very seasoned traveler but I have never ever been treated so well - thanks to Shelley! She is extremely nice and careful! 
Thank you, Shelley! You make me feel like home!

title: Warm and friendly staff!
text: This was my second time since November staying at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York and it was a great experience!  Every member of the staff we encountered was friendly and helpful.  Shelly and Nicole at the front desk greeted us with prosecco, a smile, and kindness.  The rooms are a good size for NYC and the hotel is very quiet.  I will definitely stay here the next time I'm in town.

title: Wonderful!!
text:
Most welcoming staff at front desk…complimentary chocolates and water and in-room coffee. The toiletries are great, the bed and pillows were so
comfy, the hotel robe was so soft. And location,
location! A block from Macy’s and Empire State Building. Steven Kyriakides, the Operations Manager was very attentive. I am definitely going back’

title: Thank You Yadira your amazing
text: I had a wonderful stay, they assisted me with everything. Thank you to Yadira who helped me with even printing my boarding passes. She has amazing hospitality talent!!!!! The restaurant had great food and was very kind. Doormen was always ready to assist. Everyone was great at front desk a team that goes over and beyond. Again I want to thank you Yadira A. For all your assistance and making this couple feel welcomed we will go home and tell our friends.

title: Exceptional Service
text:
We traveled from California and just loved, loved staying at the Executive Hotel LeSoleil!
This boutique hotel is a true gem! The rooms were immaculate, showers were great, the beds were very comfortable, and most of the city’s popular tourist attractions were relatively within walking distance.
The hotel staff were all great!  We especially loved Yadira, the front office agent, who was truely amazing and treated us like true VIP’s! We have recommended the hotel to all of our family and friends!  Would definitely stay there again next time we visit the city🤩

title: What a fabulous hotel!
text:
From the moment we entered the door, that was opened for us, we were treated like royalty! 
The entire staff went out of their way to create a fabulous experience. 
I highly recommend this hotel when you're in New York City!

title: Great Hotel
text: This hotel is absolutely one of the best!! We travel a lot and stay in tons of hotels and this one we have stayed multiple times and will continue to visit while we are in town. The staff is always so friendly and wonderful, always with big smiles and they go above and beyond to make sure you are taken care of. The hotel is super clean too. The restaurant in the hotel is phenomenal, with great drinks, food and specially their brunch!!!

title: Perfect hotel perfect location perfect vacation
text:
We have been in the hotel more then a week 
The staff were smazing 
And gave us welcome feeling through the whole staying 
Shelley in the front desk was more then helpful with all ours needs 
We will definitely come again 
Thx again shelly 
Doron and libi 
From israel

title: Consigliato
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato per sei notti nella camera suite: l’albergo è centralissimo ed il personale gentilissimo e professionale, ci ha perfino omaggiato con una bottiglia di prosecco (Jay; Fetcha director engineering; il ragazzo alla porta della hall; tutto il personale del desk).
Pulito, le stanze andrebbero ammodernate (specialmente i bagni) ma sono comunque carine, spaziose ed il materasso era comodissimo.
Non c’è colazione ma offrono nella hall caffè americano.
Rapporto prezzo qualità accettabile nella media alta di New York.
Consigliato

title: Perfect stay! 100% recommend!!
text:
We had a lovely 4 night stay during a mother daughter trip. The queen room was just perfect for us. The hotel staff were above and beyond friendly and accommodating. If I ever return to NYC I would stay here again, no question! 

The location was 2 blocks from a metro station and 3 minute walk to Times Square. Several close restaurants, including a restaurant in the hotel that was delicious! There were several floors, maybe 15-17. Our floor only had 10 rooms. It felt small and personal. Coffee and water in the lobby every day was a nice touch.

title: Tolles Erlebnis!
text:
Sehr freundliches Personal! Sie sind zuvorkommend und geben super gute Tipps. Juan hat uns einen tollen Ausflug empfohlen und Latch war sehr freundlich und aufgestellt.

Das Hotel ist sauber, mit allem ausgestattet und es sind sehr bequeme Betten. Der Strassenlärm wird gut abgedämpft, besonders in Zimmern, die nicht auf die Strasse gerichtet sind.

title: Great stay, again!
text: From the very start, Shelly at the front desk was so kind and sweet, welcoming us with a glass of prosecco. This is our second stay at the Executive LeSoleil, so we knew it was going to be great. The rooms are nice and comfortable with a small refrigerator, coffee maker, hair dryer, and magnification makeup mirror. Complimentary water bottles in the room, and you can always ask for more at the front desk as well as k cups. Yadira, Nicole, and Juan took care of any request without hesitation and always with a pleasant attitude.  We travel to New York at least twice a year and will continue to stay here without a doubt!

title: Excellent stay In NYC @leSoleil
text: Our 5 day stay in the hotel was great, after a very warm welcome by Shelly at the front desk, we went up to the room wich was impeccable. Very clean, roomy, nice bathroom with a large mirror. Bed very comfy and a view of the Empire State.. lovely! Few minor things as a stuck bathtub drain and a clogged toilet  got fixed the same day, so very quick action taken by the hotel. Very friendly staff everywhere and location was great. Very central in Manhattan and a subway nearby to get around were great. Also around the hotel enough livelyhood and restaurants, everything you want is just around the corner. We didn’t eat at the hotel so I cant comment on that but overall we were very satisfied. Would definitely recommend.

title: Fantastic hotel
text:
Fantastic hotel and an amazing location. Staff extremely eager to help in anyway especially Yadira, Nicole, Jimmy & Hector! We also have lovely chats with Conserge Juan too!  Rooms small but equipped with and iron & board, steamer and a hairdryer! 

Iphone was left in the taxi back to the airport that was organised by the hotel, contacted them on our return and they located it and returned it to Ireland 

Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again. Soon I hope! 

Many thanks 

Vivienne Kelly & Seamus Redmond

title: Highly recommend this NYC hotel!!
text:
We have stayed in many NYC hotels and this is by far the nicest experience we have had.  Excellent, friendly , well- trained staff...every one!  The room was not large but comfortable and very clean.  Good bed, pillows, temp.  It was quiet and with minimal street noise.  The location is great...an easy walk  from the train, it is an easy walk to the theater district and restaurants, shopping.  
 We loved it.

title: Ideal mid town stay
text:
Great hotel, ideally situated for most things, especially if you enjoy walking, but even if you prefer to get the subway. Friendly and efficient staff, very comfortable room. Our bathroom widow even opened a little bit for some fresh air.
Good places to eat close by.

title: Esperienza fantastica
text: Hotel fantastico! Suite executive al 19 piano con una vista eccezionale, camere riordinate quotidianamente,  con personale gentilissimo. Acqua e cialde del caffè sempre riassortite. Letti e cuscini molto comodi. Servizio custodia bagagli gratuito, receptionist professionali, accoglienti e molto disponibili. Una menzione speciale per Shelley,  veramente unica e speciale. Torneremo sicuramente ❤️

title: You can't go wrong here!
text: This hotel is the BEST!  We have stayed here multiple times over the years and have never been disappointed in the wonderful hospitality, the friendliness of the staff, and the actual rooms.  This hotel is quiet.  We stay in a Queen Suite.  It is extremely spacious.  The modern design is really comfortable.  Try the Trademark Restaurant.  It is also really comfortable and inviting with good food at a reasonable cost: a nice place to relax after a long day on NYC's pavement!  Happy Hour during the week is great.

title: Excelente
text: Quarto espaçoso. Banheiro amplo, chuveiro ótimo, cama excelente. Tábua de passar roupas e steamer no quarto facilitam. Cafeteira no quarto e café na recepção pela manhã dão conforto de sair no frio carregando um copo. Agradecimento especial ao manager Steve, excepcionalmente disponível e disposto a ajudar.

title: Great hotel & Service
text: Let me say that Luis  is the Best front Desk person I every met. He help me from jump . I live and Florida and was having online problems with my reservation.  Luis got it all square away and got me the room I ask for . The room was clean , comfortable and spacious.  The hotel was clean and welcoming,  and a short 10 minute walk from everything.  Thanks again, Luis, for the great service & hospitality.

title: Best hotel midtown Manhattan-you won’t be disappointed!
text:
We loved our stay here! Had the best welcome, the room was lovely, comfortable beds, complimentary water & hot chocolate from 3pm which the boys enjoyed.
We had complimentary Prosecco sent up to our room courtesy of Steve & he was always there ready to help with his knowledge of New York City😇
The hotel was very central, subway near by & a great little shop on the corner if you needed a snack.

title: Overall very satisfied
text:
Pros: location - within walking distance to almost anywhere; staff - very courteous and helpful;  amenities; room size - very spacious for a Midtown Manhattan room
Cons: small issues like a loose shower head, no slippers, no additional wash cloths and day 2, carpet worn and spotted

title: Great Hotel and location!
text: Would definitely recommend Executive Hotel Le Soleil in NYC.  The hotel staff was very kind, friendly, and helpful.  You could tell they strived for a high level of customer satisfaction.   The Hotel was very clean and room was a nice size, given it is in NYC. Would stay here again for sure.

title: From Singapore and China
text:
On behalf of our party of Travellers, commending Shelley and Latch for their helpfulness and kind service  during this trip to Manhattan!

The location is terrific with the Empire State Building just behind us and all other attractions in close vicinity.

title: Comfortable and convenient location
text: The hotel is in a great location, reasonably quiet for NYC especially on a higher level floor. Good value, but be aware of hidden "facilities charge" fee which does not appear until after reservation is confirmed

title: Excellent stay/
text: Would highly recommend this property. It was very clean and a nice looking room. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The overall property is very well decorated. I will be staying here again! Thank you for a very nice experience.

title: Great location
text:
Great hospitality!
It was a very comfortable stay for my family. Location was a major plus. Guest services and welcome was excellent. The doorman "Laxman" was so courteous and generous and held our spot to park our car and load our luggage at checkout. Jose was great in guiding us the route through NYCs best sightseeing spots. Overall, great hotel and great hospitality!

title: Our new favorite!
text:
We had a lovely stay! Everything was beautiful, clean and the staff (Keron especially) were so helpful! 
We stayed in a Queen room with sofa pull out and it was perfect for us and our 2 kids. We can’t wait to come back again!

title: Perfect for our family of four (Queen with sofa bed)
text:
Overall very pleased with our one night stay at Le Soleil. Yadira and Nicole at the front desk were most accommodating, allowing us to check in very early and arranged for a late check out. The room was decent size and had everything we needed. It could have been vacuumed a bit better but we understood that our very early check in cut down on their cleaning time.
Temperature for the room was easy to control and it was quiet (we were on the 11th floor).
Location is fabulous, a 2 minute walk to Herald Sq, a major subway hub, and most midtown attractions (Times Square, ESB, Rockefeller Plaza, etc.) are walking distance.
Would definitely stay again!

title: Pretty good hotel in a great location
text: Hotel is in a great position and generally very good. We were unexpectedly upgraded to a suite (203) on a high floor. Whilst we were grateful for this we didn’t have much of a view and there were one or two niggles that you wouldn’t expect in a $1000 per night room, i.e. the toilet seat was very off-centre, the basin in the bathroom also off-centre which was just careless when they installed it. The net curtains on one of the lounge windows were a foot shorter than the other. The kitchen area, although we didn’t use it, has cutlery and crockery, glasses etc. a plenty, microwave, oven etc. but only a frying pan to cook in! The most irritating thing though is that when you turn all the lights off in the bedroom it turns the charging dock/clock off as well. If you want to charge your phone by the bed you have to sleep with the LED  pelmet lighting on - very odd! We had dinner in the restaurant once and the food and service were good. All staff we came into contact with were friendly and helpful. All in all a good experience.

title: Champagne with a smile!
text: If you are looking for a well appointed boutique style hotel in midtown manhattan, search no more. Around the corner from the Empire State Building and Macys, the Executive Hotel leSoleil checks all the boxes. Luxury comfort at an affordable price, the Executive feels like home away from home thanks to their staff who welcome you with champagne and smiles. A special thanks to Yadira, Nicole and Lacht, front desk staff, always willing to offer their assistance to make you  feel at home and to Juan and Jimmy, support staff / Concierge for going above and beyond  to help give us the best NYC experience.

title: Outstanding and Wonderful!!!
text: We so enjoyed our stay here - our grandchildren felt so welcomed by the Staff! From the bellman to the Front Desk, to the Chief Engineer, Latch, they are all so accommodating and welcoming. The hotel is very nicely appointed, extremely clean, and gives a European boutique feeling. The location is outstanding and extremely convenient, it is very reasonably priced. We are thrilled to have come across this wonderful hotel and will be back….soon!

title: Positive experience all around
text:
First of all, the hotel location is EXCELLENT!  You can walk to Penn Station/MSG, NY Public Library, Bryant Park, Herald Sq, Times Sq etc etc etc.  You will save a mint in transportation fees.  

Second, the staff are amazing!  It is well-staffed.  We needed extra towels, so we asked at the front desk, went back to our room, and within 5 minutes, someone came with extra towels.  There is complimentary water in the rooms and in the lobby.  We also had a problem as we were leaving with a phone that got left behind.  The concierge, Juan, went out of his way to help us get it back. A hotel is only as good as its staff, and this hotel has excellent staff.

Finally the room itself was comfortable.  We were 4 people in a room and no one was stepping on anyone's toes.  Also, one of the few double room hotel rooms that has queen sized beds! Most places have only double beds.

100% would stay here again!

title: BESTTT HOTELL EVERRR!!!
text: I’ve been here a few times and I can positively say that I have not met a more helpful staff. Yadira, Nicole, Luis, Conal and Jimmy are the most kind individuals I’ve ever met. They were very helpful when I came to have lunch. The meals at the restaurant were amazing!! Looking forward to come again!!

title: Excellent hotel in Midtown New York
text:
Thank you very much and many congratulations to all the staff for the treatment and kindness with which we were treated throughout the week.
Special thanks to Latch for his help with the security box that annoyed us a little bit. 
The room was perfect all the time, they helped us with everything we needed. 
We will recommend it to all our friends for their trips to New York.
From José Manuel, Patricia and Martina (Valencia, Spain)

title: Class and Comfort
text: The hotel is modern, but comfortable and classy, I found the staff to be very helpful, but without being intrusive. The location of the hotel was really nice not only for my business meetings, but also for restaurants, and for those who aren’t here in business, I want to see the sights. I will definitely be staying here again!

title: Good value
text: Although the location is not my favorite part of town the hotel is good value for the money.  The rooms are fairly large, are very clean and the bed is very, very comfortable. The bathrooms are nice as well and the amenities are good. The  staff are friendly and professional.

title: Great trip
text: First time at this hotel and it was terrific. The staff was lovely and the hotel charming with so many amenities. We will definitely be back! The restaurant next door was a huge bonus. Staying at Le Soleil made our trip.

title: Wonderful Staff!!!
text: I had a fantastic experience at Executive Hotel Le Solei.  I stayed there with my son who feels the same way. The room was great, and the service was excellent.But what truly  made this stay so special was the wonderful staff.  They were very accommodating, professional and extremely nice.  I want to say a special thank you to Meredith, Keron, Yadira, Luis, and Juan.  These are the folks who deserve all the credit for making our stay unforgettable.  Thanks again guys, you’re awesome!  Jim Bacon

title: The very BEST hotel....!!!
text:
We live only about an hour outside of New York City, and love to spend an occasional weekend there, taking in some of the many things the City has to offer. Our grandsons join us now, they also are falling in love with New York. This past weekend we had the WONDERFUL pleasure of staying at this hotel and it was OUTSTANDING!  We loved the cozy lobby and sitting area, complete with lots of chairs, sofas and an electric fireplace....will remind you of a European hotel right away!  Our grandsons loved the large water dispenser with the citrus fruits added. Our bags were kindly checked in and held for us since we arrived early, and the parking is very close by.

We were greeted by what must be "the friendliest and most accommodating" staff in all of Manhattan. From the front desk to the bellman,  the restaurant, AND the Chief Engineer Latch, who kindly introduced himself and offered to be of assistance, no matter what we might need! Our grandsons were overwhelmed with how friendly everyone was, and we were thrilled for them to set aside some of their generalizations that everyone in New York is rude and in a hurry! 

Our room was perfect for the 4 of us, and we felt safe, letting the boys meander throughout the hotel. Our breakfast was delicious and the portions were generous. A great start to a day of sightseeing!

Consider this hotel next time you are traveling to New York - the location is so convenient and within walking distance to an incredible amount of popular sights. We can see ourselves using this hotel over and over again,

title: Muy recomendable.
text: Excelente hotel, muy buena ubicación, todo el personal súper amable, en especial Shelley en recepción, el restaurante muy rico todo y la mejor atención y servicio. He viajado muchas veces a NY y llegado a diferentes hoteles, definitivamente me volveré a hospedar aquí. Muy pequeña la habitación, baño si es grande, pero si viajas solo y poco equipaje está muy bien, recomiendo más la pedir el cuarto que tiene sofá cama extra. Las camas muy cómodas, la verdad me sentí como en casa.

title: Going Above and Beyond
text: I was traveling to New York for a weekend trip to see a couple of Broadway plays. I arrived more than 3 hours prior to the 3 pm check in time.  I checked in my luggsge and decided to just hang out at the hotel because I was tired from traveling.  The hotel staff went above and beyond and found me a room within 45 minutes of my arrival.  The entire staff was amazing, especially Yadira. They even delivered my luggage to my room. The room was spacious. It was very clean and comfortable. If there is one ding, it would only be the view because it was an alley. That didn't bother me much because I wasn't in the room for that. It was conveient to walk to The  Empire State Building, Times Square, and Broadway. I would definitely stay again the next time I visit New York.

title: Great location and excellent services
text: Fantastic place to stay.  We had a great experience with Le Soleil in Vancouver and decided to stay at the NYC location.  The facilities met our needs; yes the rooms are on the smallish side, but very cozy.  The bed is comfortable and the room we had was quiet.  The hotel offers infused water in the lobby, as well as coffee in the mornings and hot chocolate in the afternoons, which is a nice touch.  The staff are super friendly – shout out to Latch (thanks for looking after our two boys as they wandered out in the halls with their mouse stuffies), Juan (gracias for keeping the boys entertained and providing ideas for our daily itinerary), Luis (thankful for our Yankee and Blue Jays debate) and Keran (thanks for arranging the transportation to the airport) – you’ve all made our stay very welcoming.

title: Shelley was AWESOME!!
text:
We checked in on April 9th and stayed till 16th it was my wife and I Anniversary vacation of 22 wonderful years! We have stayed in this Hotel quite a few times and saw a great deal on our week stay! As we checked in Shelley was checking us in and from the start she was wonderful an amazing! We first stayed in 907 which was good, but my wife and I wanted a view of the Empire State Building in our room and that room we can only see the top of Empire State but wanted see more. I came down and asked Shelley if anyway possible to change our room higher floor so we can see the Empire State Building and boy she really worked her magic and made it all possible although we had to wait an extra day to get the room we wanted. She orchestrated our move to a new room and all I can say it was amazing and she did an awesome job and we couldn’t be more happier. Thank you for having Shelley work for your company as she definitely did her job above and beyond! We definitely coming back here again! 

Sincerely, 

Ryan

title: Perfect Executive Hotel
text: Don't pass up this gem of a hotel. It's in a perfect location, is quite, comfortable and has an amazing Restaurant. Also would make a great romantic weekend in the City.  Also tons of other great restaurant choices are near by.

title: Great staff and room!
text: This place was amazing! The area was safe, the room was big and clean. The best part was the staff! Shelly, Jay and Sam were very helpful! They accommodated my friend and I into a better room that we could imagine for the price and NYC

title: Clean, safe, and a professional staff
text:
This is the spot to be if you don’t mind being a short walk away from Times Square…. Shelley, Jay, and Sam - thank you! These folk are part of a professional staff team that’s ready to accommodate to the guests however they can. I’m normally staying at Hilton’s but this is a damn close comparison in terms of service. Room was SPOTLESS CLEAN and after coming from a hotel on Times Square, it felt like we were at the Ritz Carlton!!

Highly recommend. Safe area.

title: Väldigt bra
text: Absolut ingenting att klaga på. Mitt i hjärtat av Manhattan och känslan var nära till allt. Dessutom kändes det personligt och familjärt.  Entré på ett hotell är viktigt och det här känns välkomnande. Vi hade en svit med bäddsoffa och sov fyra där. Fungerade bra, med två olika tv och känsla av två rum. Kommer gärna tillbaka hit.

title: 2-night stay visiting from CA with my wife
text: Good 2-night stay.  Very good service.  Shoutout to Latch,  Connor and manager Steve.  professional and very cordial. Location for us works because it’s a short walk from Grand Central and same to Penn Station to fly out of JFK.

title: Nice and convenient family stay, tight rooms
text: We had a great stay with my mother (70+), teenage son, and myself. We stayed in a double queen room, which had very comfortable beds, and was very quiet (minimal noise from the street or other rooms). However, the room was very small, with just enough room to walk around the room/beds, no closet (just a freestanding rack), and a pocket door for the bathroom which was difficult and noisy to use. The bathroom was nice and spacious enough. Amenities in the room and hotel were sufficient and nice - TV, mini fridge, waters, plenty of charging, and a comfortable lounge area in the lobby. The location was great, just a block from many subway lines, good breakfast and eating options nearby, and walkable to Bryant park, Times Square, and other sites.

title: 5 Stars - Amazing
text:
5 stars and absolutely would recommend. Amazing service and the room was top notch. Wouldn’t stay anywhere else. Yadira, Nicole, and Jimmy were incredible. Extremely
hospitable and made our stay very comfortable.

title: Awesome!
text: I don’t usually write reviews but the staff at Le Soleil was amazing. Treated us like family! I traveled to NYC and my husband and our 9 month old for my birthday.  Our Empire State Building suite view did not disappoint at all. There was enough space in our suite for a pack-N-play (provided by the hotel) and a lot of luggage, which is rare in NYC. Trademark restaurant downstairs was SO delicious as well. Very easy walk to Bryant Park and Times Square. Highly recommend!  Can’t wait to go back!

title: Fabulous staff!
text: We had the most fabulous stay at Le Soleil in NYC!!! The rooms were clean, comfortable and perfect for our family of three. Our son was able to sleep on the pull out couch. For New York it was actually a nice size and extremely quiet! We did not hear any noise from the street, as we always do when we visit NYC. It was great to have parking on site. Perfect location for walking uptown or downtown. We were especially thankful for the wonderful staff, including Kevon, Nicole, and Shelley. They went and above and beyond to make our stay wonderful! Our family highly recommends, and will be staying here again on our next trip to the city!

title: Promosso a pieni voti!
text: Hotel molto pulito e curato, consiglio le camere Queen con vista su Empire State Building, silenziose e con vista davvero unica! Personale gentile e disponibile a qualsiasi ora, servizio taxi per l’aeroporto con prezzi contenuti o comunque nella media per New York. Posizione davvero notevole, una chicca a due passi da Times Square!

title: Excelente, Shelley la mejor!
text: Excelente todo. Shelley una excelente recepcionista que nos atendió de forma amable desde el primer minuto. El hotel con una comodidad increíble y necesaria para pasar unos días. Remarco una vez más a Shelley como la mejor recepcionista.

title: Clean, nice hotel in the perfect location to walk and see NYC
text:
Hotel is in the perfect location to walk and see NYC. The subway is also close by, as well as enough food spots, coffee shops, shopping opportunities, etc. 
The rooms are clean and have everything you need and nothing beats the view of Empire State Building when you get one of the rooms with view!

title: Clean and Comfortable!
text: Truly felt welcomed and taken care of! From our easy checkin to inquiries about restaurant options and transportation. We had a small issue with the sink in the room. All was resolved within 15 minutes. The staff and space exceeded expectations on all 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

title: Comfortable bed
text: The bed is so comfortable! They have daily housekeeping which some hotels don’t offer nowadays. They also leave complementary 2 water bottles daily when they clean the room. Also they have  infused water near the front desk or hot chocolate. We stop by to refill out water bottles. You can walk up time square and grand central fr the hotel, great stay!

title: Room not as described
text: The room was not prepared for my arrival. Even after the receptionist made me wait while the staff “inspected the room.”  Mattress to sofa bed was missing. Also there was no robe provided normally this would not be a big deal but I packed minimally thinking I would be able to use the robe in the room. As a mom traveling with her children, this was inconvenient. The location and the hotel itself were fine but overall it was quite disappointing to have to deal with a missing mattress at 11 PM.

title: Great stay and would return!
text: My wife and I had an excellent experience at hotel Le Soleil. The hotel is centrally located within walking distance to many attractions (Times Square, Broadway, etc…) out room was facing the Empire State Building which is beautifully lit at night. The black out drapes handle the lighting so you’ll sleep fine. The A/C and Heater in the room worked great. The customer service and staff at the hotel were excellent. They were very helpful and patient. Andrew at the check in desk is the best! I wish I remembered his name but the butler was such a help as well. Great stay and would return!

title: One of the best hotel we have ever stayed in
text:
Very warm and friendly cooperation by the front office people.
Really loved and would like to be in this property whenever we are next in Newyork.

When we 2 wanted to add one more guest in the same room, they upgraded us to a suit room, with not extra cost. This was beyond our expectation and we really appreciate it.  

Sanjay Dhanuka from India

title: Great Place and Would Do It Again
text: NY Rooms can be small and the window view is looking at a brick wall.  We had our kids with us so we needed a suite.  The room was a decent size and very comfortable -  good view of the street with floor to ceiling windows for the rooms facing front. (don't know about the other rooms). Whatever we needed or were out of (blanket, comforter or towels) - we got it.  Service was great. Good advice on getting around.  Doorman arranged to get us back to the airport. Daughter forgot her laptop and the concierge got it to Fed Ex the following day. Don't go to NY often but would definitely stay there again.

title: A great place to stay  in NYC!
text: My 17 yr old daughter and I visited for spring break. We stayed in an Empire View Suite with Separate Living Area. We had plenty of room for the 2 of us and an AMAZING view of the Empire State Bldg from the 18th fl. The staff is great. The hotel is clean.  The Trademark, the restaurant connected to the hotel, is good. The hotel is centrally located and you can take a short walk to so many places, theatre district, museums, restaurants. It’s very close to Bryant Park. I’ve stayed at the hotel many times and would definitely recommend.

title: First time in NYC
text: Within walking distance to all things touristy, our hotel was smack in the middle of "must see in New York". Service was excellent, amenities pleasant and the view from our window right at the Empire State Building. A subway station was right around the block to get to farther destinations. Strongly recommend! Also, our housekeeper was beyond amazing.

title: Wonderful hotel
text: I was very apprehensive about booking a hotel in new york city. Had never been there before but knew there were issues Finding parking and a decent price however however we found this total online and I called about parking and they were so nice. They assured me the parking was just two doors down and it was charged on our hotel so we didn't have to worry about that. The hotel was in a convenient place for us just a block or so from broadway. Pulling up in front of the hotel it was beautiful and inside had an old world charm about it that I really liked. The people at the desk were very helpful giving us suggestions on where to get dinner. The room itself was super clean and very nice. Since it was our 1st trip to New York City. They ask if we wanted a room up Hi for a view and they gave us one it just Overlooked the building next door l o l. The only thing I can say is. They should tell you when you use the elevator you have to use your room key. We were idiots and didn't know that so we Took a couple of trips up and down till we saw how the others were using keys.

title: Awesome Employees and Beautiful Lobby where you can eat take-out food
text: Great Midtown location, fridge and coffee maker in room, walk-in shower, and the best employees ever.  I stayed here with two teens in the queen suite and it worked well, allowing them some privacy.  The pull-out bed wasn't very comfortable, but that's pretty standard.  One unique aspect that we loved was the large lobby area with tables where you can eat take-out meals -- thus saving on expensive NY restaurants.  A special shout-out to Nicole at the front desk!  When Delta mistakenly canceled and then reinstated our flight, Nicole helped us with the cancellation and rebooking of our room and let us keep the original price.  Actually, all of the employees were friendly and helpful.  Keron at the door was great.

title: amazing experience
text: the view on the Empire State Building is magic, this combined with the quality of room, service (water bottles in the bedroom every day, chocolate) staff make the stay special!I I will definitely come back, next time I' in NYC.

title: Clean and Friendly
text: Super clean, friendly staff, amazing check in. The gentleman who helped us to our room even sent us a complimentary bottle of wine for it being my sisters first trip to NY. Amazing all around. Definitely would recommend

title: Great place to stay for a girls trip!
text: I spent four nights at this hotel with my daughters (27 and 29).  Although the room was on the small side, it didn't feel cramped.  There was enough room for all our stuff and the bathroom was big enough for my daughters to get ready together.  The room was very clean and we appreciated the daily cleaning service (this is not happening at all hotels in Canada).  The free coffee and water was also much appreciated!  Staff was very helpful and the location was perfect.  We felt very safe here.  Highly recommend!

title: Beautiful experience
text: What a great experience! it's start from the moment you check in, with such a great  friendy, helpful staff and professionnal at the same time! Special thank to Yadira and Meredith for making us feeling special, for being so helpful. We felt you were doing everything with you heart, not only because it's supposed to be your job. Same for you other colleagues🙂The view from the room, on the Empire State Building is amazing. And last but not least, the little attention in the room, 2 bottles of water every day, chocolates, is the cherry on the cake😊will definitely comeback.

title: Amazing view, great staff, living area isn’t worth the upgrade
text:
I don’t think the view can be beat, it was incredible to have the Empire State Building front and centre with floor to ceiling windows. The staff were amazing, especially Yadira at the front desk, but everyone that we met went out of their way to be helpful and friendly. 

We always ensure hotel rooms have a view and a sofa when we book and it was the reason we chose this hotel. The Empire View Queen suite has a “separate living and sleeping areas, you can entertain guests”. Unfortunately it was a chaise in a dark corner of the room where one person could sit but wouldn’t want to. It was disappointing and certainly not worth the extra money. 

The bars and restaurant also closes early which I found unusual for a hotel. We got back at 10.30pm on Friday night thinking a cocktail and a desert might be nice but it wasn’t open. 

All in all, the location was fantastic, a short walk to Madison Sq Gardens, Times Square, Empire State Building etc. the hotel was clean and staff really go out of their way to ensure you have a good experience.

title: Amazing Staff
text: Amazing hotel with the best staff in New York City. Luis is a gem and is the absolute best front desk employee I have ever encountered. Shelly, Yadira, merideth are also amazing employees.  They all take care of the most little of your needs. Management should recognize how fortunate they are to have that team.

title: Love this place!
text: This is the 2nd time I've stay here and both times the service has been excellent. The roams are nice and beds are comfy. It's in a great location for exploring the city! It was nice for business as well as the family.

title: Muy buena experiencia
text: Es un hotel elegante, con habitaciones amplias, con hermosas vistas a la ciudad. La insonorización es perfecta, y la cama muy cómoda lo que asegura un excelente descanso. El desayuno es con un sistema por el que se nos daba un crédito de U$50, y si nos pasábamos pagábamos la diferencia. No es desayuno buffet, pero es bueno. La wifi es excelente al igual que la ubicación

title: Great getaway!
text: Traveled with a family member for personal business, then free time in the city. The hotel was centrally located for us. Our room, while not spacious, was very nice. It was clean and fresh with nice linens. The bathroom had plenty of space, The front desk team were terrific, very helpful and friendly.

title: Great location and superb staff!
text: Great location, comfortable, one of the few quite hotels in Manhattan area! Superb service from the staff and special mention to my MVP Hector Casellas - was very helpful to a first timer in New York like me! Will definitely come again.

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel in a good location with shops and restaurants to explore! Very friendly staff, including Keron, who was very helpful upon arrival and departure and booked a car service for me to the airport!

title: A hidden gem in the heart of it all
text: Fabulous, warm and helpful staff in every facet of the operation. Lovely room, well appointed as always at a Le Soleil property. Priced well within the market for this caliber in Manhattan. This will be my first-look for accommodation every time I travel to NYC.

title: Bedbugs
text: This hotel is infested with bedbugs. After we informed management,they refused to be held accountable. They put the blame on us and we were accused of mistaking mosquito bites for bedbugs even after we provided proof. This has been my worst customer experience ever, and I’ve stayed in hotel rooms across the world.

title: Fantastic Experience!
text:
Had a great birthday trip, the staff was very friendly and super accommodating. Had a room and they upgraded it! Steve, the operating manager even sent a bottle of Prosecco up to my room. It really made my birthday feel extra special.   

My suite was very clean and a great size. It was filled with amenities such as a small cooler which was extremely useful. The location is very convenient and walkable to different key locations in the area for shopping, and food. The entire hotel space was beautiful and clean with multiple areas in the lower lobby to enjoy and get comfortable while you check in, check out, or enjoy your stay. I can’t rave enough about this hotel, next time I find myself in NYC I will be returning. Shoutout to Steve, Meredith, Jimmy, and Yadira for making my quick stay memorable and fun.

title: Noisy toilet
text: Good value for Manhattan.  Very convenient location and walking distance to everything.  Though the maintenance staff never came around to fix my faulty noisy toilet depsite asking them every single day.  It was pretty loud and annoying to sleep at night.

title: Holtel le Soleil : le bon choix. Meilleur rapport qualité / prix. Situation très centrale
text:
Accueil chaleureux, souriant et très agréable de Shelley à la réception. Grâce à Shelley nous avons pu obtenir une très belle chambre dans les étages hauts. Chambres agréables et confortables bien équipées. Wifi offert. Boissons à l’accueil.
Situation excellente à quelques blocks à pied des sites à visiter.
Shelley est également de très bon conseil pour les activités et les restaurant.

title: Excellent stay, good location
text: This hotel was a great find. Every single person on staff was exceptionally helpful (shout out to Keron at the front entrance who consistently helped with bags, directions, rides, you name it). The room was good sized for NYC, very clean and comfortable. There is spa water available in the lobby every day (and coffee and hot chocolate). You are also centrally located to so many things — and easy walk or can ride away from shopping, shows, etc. We will definitely be back!

title: Great stay..
text:
Hotel is conveniently based. First time in the big apple from the Uk. Wonderful and friendly staff.   The room and hotel was Clean and well maintained. A big shout out to Keron for his knowledge of the area advised of great spots to visit.
Would highly recommend this hotel for a friendly and welcoming vist.

title: Great Stay!
text: The hotel is conveniently located. We had a quiet and comfortable stay. All the staff we encountered were extremely friendly and helpful, especially Keron the bellhop. Definitely the place we will stay next time we are in New York. Thank you for a lovely stay!

title: On-site Corporate Work Event
text: Excellent stay.  Room was fantastic!  View of Empire State building with different colors at night.  Not bad for my first trip to the Big Apple.  Will be back and have extra time to explore more of the "We Love NYC" theory. Jaime fixed me up with a ride from Andreas over to LaGuardia.

title: Outstanding service and amazing value!
text: LeSoleil exceeded my expectations.  It was clean and comfortable with our room being a good size for a Manhattan hotel.  But most of all the staff here were incredibly friendly and helpful- even the hotel engineer asked me in the elevator if there was anything he could do for us.  The value and experience we had was wonderful.

title: See you again soon! :)
text: My husband & I stayed overnight in NYC at this hotel to celebrate my birthday. We thought the location was great for sightseeing. We went downtown and uptown by subway very easily. Luggage storage was so helpful and an easy pickup on our way back to Penn Station. The staff was very helpful and gave us great recommendations for dinner. Our room was very clean & comfortable. I thought it was very well appointed for a small space…it had everything we needed plus an amazing city view! Will absolutely stay here again!

title: Amazing service!
text: Andrew was amazing. He took the time when the concierge was off for the day to research and write down quite a few places to go for good cannolis in Little Italy. He wrote down phone numbers as well as notes about each one and a note for us at the end that was so sweet! He was very helpful. And Steve at the concierge desk met us when we came in and found out we were there to celebrate my daughter’s 21st birthday and 20 minutes after we got to our room he had a nice note and a bottle of champagne delivered to our room! Great service all around and they got us a car to the airport that would hold all the luggage for four people as well for a flat fee that delivered us right to the door of the airport instead of having to take an Uber and drag our bags from the drop off spot. Great location, within minutes walking distance from Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Grand Central Terminal, and The Empire State Building. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Queen suite (405) for nyc weekend
text:
Easy check in. Friendly front desk. 

Room very clean. Not spacious but for nyc a decent size.

Elevators not too bad for speed.

Did not use gym facilities on site. Did not make use of parking as opted for parking down the road which I got for 84$ for the weekend as opposed to what the hotel would charge. Adjoining restaurant on site but very many options in midtown for every budget and taste.

Room provided bath robe. Shower pressure was adequate and hot was not scalding but could have been warmer for my personal taste. Room did not have any view (405). Complimentary water, coffee and chocolate sampler was provided in room. Umbrella provided in room for use during stay.

Safe in room and mini fridge. Wifi was adequate.

title: AMAZING staff, nice rooms, great location
text: My wife and I loved this hotel.  Shout out to Yadira, Luis, Jimmy, Nicole, Andre, along with all the other staff which I unfortunately did not get all their names, were genuine, friendly and helpful. Great service, nice rooms and close to everything. We’ll be staying here again for sure.

title: Great people, service and location!
text:
I can't speak highly enough about my stay at Le Soleil. My sister and I were traveling with my 8 month old and 8 year old neices. The eight year old with a last minute broken foot to visit family in town from AZ. Needless to say we knew this was going to be an adventure exploring NY after a 4 hr car ride from Boston.  Le soleil staff is their superpower! They were helpful even before I arrived in NY. Luis (front desk) answered all my questions got in touch with Juan (consierge) to assist with mobility questions and I felt ready for our one day trip. When I arrived Luis knew who I was before I even said my name! He was extremely helpful and worked his magic for us. The bellhop Keron quickly jumped in to help with ALL our stuff. Latch, Chief Engineer came out to clean the side walk because I accidentally stepped on dog poop when getting my family out of the car. He went as far as to clean the bottom of my shoes with the hose! We arrived before check in so we left our stuff and heading out to explore the city. Shelly (front desk) helped get things sorted when my sister got back late in the evening to check into the hotel before me with a baby and our luggage. The room was great (including view of Freedom Tower) so was the location! If I'm ever back in NY, I'm staying here!  We will always remember this trip. Thank you Le Soleil staff for making our stay so WONDERFUL despite all the crazy and chaos my family and I brought into it!

Extremely Grateful!

Jeannette G.

Additional notes:
Recommend getting the parking if you're driving in.
Metro nearby. Not very handicap stroller friendly all around NYC. Hard to find escalators.
CVS 1-2 blocks away.

title: Most Incredible Customer Experience Ever!
text: To say that our experience at Le Solei was perfect would not do this hotel justice.   I travel all over the world and have stayed in 5 star hotels that didn’t come close to the level of professionalism and customer service that this boutique hotel offered.   The thing that really set Le Solei apart for me were the three fabulous women at the front desk Yadira, Nicole, and Merideth!!!!  These three women have hearts of gold and our interactions with them made our stay!!!  It was my 50th birthday and from our surprise upgrade to the penthouse to the bottle of champagne with hand written note, they couldn’t do enough for us.   The breakfast was delicious and the manager even brought us mimosas!   Another gem that I must mention is Latch, the director of maintenance.   We couldn’t figure something out in the room and he showed up in one minute.  He takes so much pride in the hotel and kept it going alone for two years when it was closed during Covid.  He was so welcoming and even told my mother if she is in the city next time and wants to pop in for a coffee and bathroom or to rest by fire in lobby to come see him.  We will definitely be writing to the GM about this unbelievable group of people.  Le Solei is SO lucky to have them!!

title: AAAAAAA+++
text:
Andrew, was our checkin person, and suggested an available room, that had a spectacular view overlooking skyline!! Service was Exceptional!  Our room was impeccably clean, came with morning coffee & infused water, and chocolates! Restaurant was right next door, as well as many restaurants, bars, and shopping on 5th Ave.. I would refer anyone to stay here, and look forward to staying again!!
Elaine Lacrosse & Ken Lazaro
Massachusetts

title: Great location, but very poor service
text: The hotel is well located in the heart of Manhattan, with the majority of attractions at walking distance. However, the service (comprehensive of both the front-desk and the cleaning staff) was very poor. Upon arrival we found our room not properly cleaned: dirt on the floor, hairs on the bed and yellow stains on the bathrobe. Moreover, our room has not been made up for 4 days (out of a total of 6 days) during our stay at the hotel. The front-desk did not care much about the inconvenience, did not apologize accordingly and did not offer any additional service to make up for it. Last but not least, after checking-out we found an unexpected charge on our credit card which has not being communicated. I personally would not recommend this hotel to a friend, since I believe there are better options at the same price.

title: Excellent service & Great hotel to stay!
text: Enjoyed our 5d4n stay over in this fabulous hotel at cleanliness, great location, great customer services by all staff especially Yadira. 10mins away from time square, Joe pizza, tonchin ramen Michelin star just opposite. Perfect ! Love it

title: Fantastic Stay
text: We just checked out after four wonderful nights at this great property. The hotel is very central and makes walking to most of the Manhattan tourist spots easy. What make our stay even more special was the team at the hotel, they are so friendly and go out of their way to make one’s stay special. THANK YOU especially Yadira and Keron !!!👍

title: Nice Gem by the Empire state building
text: was a bit skeptical about staying here . so many other options . but i was pleasantly surprised . Hotel was very neat ,rooms were very modern and food in restaurant was great as well . Front desk takes the cake . Yadira showed excellent customer service skills . was very helpful throughput my stay . Thanks will come again next time i visit NYC

title: Awesome location, modenr yet elegant hotel.
text: It was my third time in this hotel and I absolutely recommend it to anyone who is looking for fantastic location and good quality for the average Midtown Manhattan price. Rooms are comfortable, clean and modern. Yes, they are rather small too but this is New York, dont expect large rooms anywhere and it is just what you need after a long day of wialking: a relatively big and comfy bathroom and a comfortable bed. I have always been treated politely and friendly by the staff and never have experienced any problem with the elevator or other staff members as written by other - in my view rather sensitive - reviewers.

title: Great Staff
text: Great location, walkable to Broadway and many restaurants. Staff especially Shelly was helpful and kind. Next time I’ll request a higher floor for a better view. We will definitely choose to come back next time we are in NYC.

title: Highly recommended by an ex Manhattan residence.
text: Location is superb, convenient, and neighborhood is safe. Room is very clean and comfy. Lobby feels fresh yet classy. Service is very nice and warm. People are very helpful and caring. They contact you prior your visit and want to make sure all smooth.

title: Amazing Hotel, the Staff and their Service!!
text:
Great Hotel!! Prime location!! Just couple of blocks to Empire state building, Time Square, Macie's shopping center and etc..
Rooms were clean, well maintained.  Love the See through closet. Bed was very comfortable. Daily housekeeping and Turn down services was provided and attain to detail was immaculate. One day we asked for a bucket of Ice and next day evening Ice was delivered without asking!
All staff we encountered including the GM, and  Sam Duty manager were very polite and courteous, specially Andre at the Reception and Juan at Concierge was giving the service of a Five star hotel. Both of them are a huge asset to the company! Exceeded customer expectation to the next level!! Gave good recommendations on all the places we wanted to visit as this was our first visit to NY! Truly Enjoyed the stay. will be back again.

title: NY experience
text: The hotel location is amazing and the hotel staff very friendly and helpful; rooms are cramped but adequate with great housekeeping staff. If you plan to stay at Le Soleil 🌞 I would ask for a larger room if possible.

title: Broadway & Hotel Le Soleil " YES PLEASE"
text: Went for the weekend to see The Phantom of the Opera one last time before the closing of the show, so I knew we needed to find a hotel that was going to be close to Broadway, the subway and close to restaurants, pubs etc. They communicated with me via text to make sure I was okay and if I needed anything prior to arriving. They assisted me with directions to get to their hotel from JFK to the city, checked up on us until we reached the hotel and even after we had already checked in. This truly made us feel welcomed. The bellman greeted us with the biggest smile and the front desk staff made that smile even greater. I am so happy that I found LeSoleil! We are planning on returning in September for my birthday and I can't wait.

title: Lovely hotel in the heart of NYC with close proximity to everything
text: This hotel is close to Grand Central, Bryant Park, Time Square, Empire State building, Herald Square, Penn Station, and tons of bars and restaurants.  From the moment I booked the hotel, I received the right amount of communication from the hotel regarding my stay.  The hotel room is clean and pretty.  I bit small, but that's expected in NYC.  My only complaint was the screeching sound the bathroom door made.

title: Excelent located hotel.
text:
Nice hotel with prime location without being directly on Broadway. Easy check in as the room was pre paid. Not enough towels in the room, this happened a few times, so we had towels sent up to our room.
Small things, but you expect house keeping to notice things like this.

title: Work & Pleasure Trip
text: Great location. Near Macy’s, great restaurants, Empire State Building and 10 minute walk to Times Square. Hotel has small boutique vibe. The restaurant on premises and be avoided as the service is horrible and the food is mediocre. The bellman are amazing. They supply umbrellas so need to buy or travel with one. Every morning fresh coffee in the lobby and fresh flavored water throughout the day.

title: So so experience
text: Check in team was uxnaccomadative. Lots of negative energy in each request. Last Wednesday the two check in team should not be working in the hospitality industry. Likely will not return. Room was comfortable, but hotels employees challenged the experience.

title: SO GREAT!
text:
The welcome at the Executive Hotel the sun is perfect!

The chief engineer LATCH is very efficient, very competent and he is a real professional.

ANDRÉ at the reception is perfect! He is attentive, very efficient and professional, the hotel is lucky to have him at his service.

MEREDITH, NICOLE, KERON, HECTOR, ANDREW, SHELLEY, JUAN LUIS YAYA are excellent and really very competent! It’s a pleasure, they are so efficient .

Thank you all! 🤍

title: We plan to stay here every trip!
text: This was the perfect location. We were able to walk to Times Square, Flatiron district, 2 LEGO stores and museums, and only needed public transportation once during our stay- to the Bronx. Friendly and attentive staff. Beautiful interior. Spacious room. This is our new favorite hotel in NYC!

title: Wonderful hotel! Excellent management.
text: I've always enjoyed staying at this hotel. It's clean, the location is great (it's easy to travel all over the city from the hotel), and the hotel employees were fantastic. The hotel manager, in particular, Yasir, is an epitome of an outstanding leader, and a good person in all respects. He is exceptionally compassionate, understanding, and friendly. He even delivered my luggage to my room during a time in which the hotel was very busy, and was always available to assist. Will definitely be returning to this hotel, over and over again.
