title: Fabulous location and FANTASTIC STAFF!
text: I had the nicest stay at Executive Hotel Le Soleil! I spent 6 nights here on my very first NYC visit and the experience was outstanding. Rooms are smallish, versus other parts of the country perhaps, but very nicely appointed. The front desk people were just lovely - friendly, kind, helpful. I would love to stay here again and hope to soon, as I fell madly in love with New York. Access to public transit was great, unbeatable location - room was quieter than I expected, given the proximity to so much going on. I arrived early and was able to get a much-needed nap after a miserable red-eye flight. I liked the convenient coffee in room, had a small refrigerator, and there were multiple good quick meal options on the street nearby. Just a great stay.

title: Very nice 😊
text: Great. Nice hotel. Great staff. My room was small and cozy. Came here for my birthday. Got a complimentary wine. Was happy about that.  Overall good experience and would visit again. Maybe in the summer

title: My new GO TO NYC hotel
text:
I can’t say enough about the responsiveness and proactive service from this hotel. I called the night before to inquire about an early check in for a wedding. When I showed up early, the front desk employee remembered me and had it all ready.

There was more space than most NYC hotel rooms and very family friendly. 

The staff all offered proactive tips and were great about storing and retrieving luggage. 

It’s conveniently located to a lot of attractions and subways w easy access.  And parking was included for a GREAT price. 

I will DEF come back here again.

title: Great location!
text: Great location, close to key areas of the city.  Staff were great.  Room was clean and bed very comfortable. Some issue with the bathroom door that took two days to put right. Minimal noise from the outside.  Housekeeping was very good. Used as a base, so did not use any of the facilities on site including the restaraunt.

title: An exceptional experience at Executive Hotel Le Soleil
text: Best hotel experience ever in NYC. A comfortable, cozy hotel with absolutely helpful, friendly and efficient staff, at all steps of our stay. Exceptional flexibility and kindness. Thank you Hotel Du Soleil Team!

title: Catherine
text:
Wonderful stay at « le soleil » , the hotel is very comfortable , clean, very quiet , great location
Shelley at the front desk is very professional and always willing to help. I will come back , no doubt !

title: First Trip to NYC Made Comfortable
text: This was my first trip to NYC, and all the staff made it so comfortable to have a place to stay at Hotel Le Soleil. We chatted with all the staff, and they all were fantastic. Some but (not all) of the great staff we chatted with were Mitch, Juan, and Shelley, all of whom gave us great suggestions!

title: Great customer service, amicable staff, & very clean hotel.
text: Second time staying at the best hotel I have stayed at. The customer service & cleanliness is top tier. Shelley at the front desk is the best; she remembered me by name from my first stay. Mitch, Juan, Meredith & the rest of the staff are very attentive & friendly & provided recommendations for local restaurants. Loved every minute of the stay!

title: Great Vibe!!
text: Always stay in when in NY. Excellent location in midtown Manhattan. Great hotel for both business and holiday. Wonderful staff, Shelley and Andrew at the front desk are very helpful and willing to accommodate guest needs.

title: 3 nights stay
text:
Overall good  experience. The company the hotel has a deal with was not available early Saturday morning when we left and front desk personnel refused to call another taxi company.
Late cleaning room service

title: Lovely staff, beautiful hotel, great location
text:
This is the second time I've stayed here, and both times it was lovely.  The best thing about both stays has been the kindness and helpfulness of the staff.  During this visit, I was helped by Mitchell, Shelley, Hector, and Jamie.  They were all wonderful.

This is a great place to chill out after a long day of travel, a night at the theater, or a day on your feet at museums or stores.  Everything is very clean and very comfortable.  It's like an oasis of calm in the middle of the city.  There is always cold cucumber/fruit water in the lobby and either coffee or hot chocolate (or both).  The coffee wasn't out when I first got there, but Mitchell offered to get me a cup.

The location is also excellent.  It's a short walk from Penn Station and near subway lines.

But, again, the best thing about both stays was the staff!  Thanks, Mitchell, Shelley, Hector, and Jaimie!!  Every hotel should have staff that is as nice and helpful as you are!

title: Great stay
text: Shelley was awesome made our stay more than we expected!! Very pleased with our stay room was clean and bigger than we expected. I will for sure be booking at this hotel again no doubt about it!

title: Never Dissappoints
text: We stayed at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil NY several times before the COVID shutdown and this was our first return to an overnight in NYC. This Hotel is the best. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Rates are reasonable. The staff is helpful and friendly. We met an employee in the elevator (possibly building mechanic or maintenance) who inquired if we were enjoying our stay. He suggested a visit to a park that we had never been to before. It was a great suggestion. The employees seemed invested in making our stay the best it could be. Make that reservation. You will be glad you did!

title: Vacanza con famiglia
text: Sarebbe partito con un punteggio da 3 per la camera inizialmente assegnata, più piccola rispetto a quella prenotata e con materasso del divano letto sfondato. Fortunatamente il giorno successivo Shelley, probabilmente con l'aiuto di Meredith, provvedeva a cambiarci di stanza con una decisamente più adatta per 3 persone.Un ringraziamento speciale quindi a Shelley. Hotel comodo a tutta la zona di Midtown con camere silenziose e pulite.

title: Great and comfortable stay, our receptionist Shelley was very kind and helped us a lot
text:
In our 5 day stay at Le soleil we enjoyed our stay a lot. Room comfortable and cozy, big shower and bathroom. We had a Problem with our door the first, but receptionist Shelley helped us and fixed it with a technician the next day. Very nice to find everyday 2 bottles of water. She was also very kind and professional every time we met her.
I recommend this place 100% for location, people working inside and general comfortable stay.
Thanks!

title: Best ever!
text: From the moment I checked in. the staff was super attentive.   I asked for extra pillows and towels. Received immediately. Asked for desk lamp also immediately received !  Every time I left or returned, the staff greeted me.  The room, perfect for one!  Plenty of drawers , nice bathroom size. A hundred stars for cleanliness!  It was the cleanest hotel.  Gorgeous view of the Empire State Building! Especially at night!  Location was amazing!  Close to everything.  I absolutely will stay here again!

title: Would not recommend
text: The bed was uncomfortable; the sprinkler had a flashing light above your bed, which could distract you from falling asleep. The customer service is mediocre, with the day shift more accusatory than customer service oriented. The night shift was a 10/10, day shift a 2/10, for professionalism and guest relations. Overall, I would not recommend this hotel to business travelers.

title: Great hotel.
text:
The hotel is nice and great location. Good service and helpful staff.
It Need to change the restaurant, which is slow and the food is just awful, even the Ice tea was bad. There are plenty of good places around and close to the hotel. Excellent Japanese next door, the Sushi&Co.

title: Great hotel
text: Beautiful hotel, water dispenser with limes and lemons were wonderful. Big rooms and a plus for the microwave and fridge! Great if you are traveling with a baby. We used the microwave to heat up bottles. We will be back again

title: Great Hotel
text: This is a great, clean and extremely friendly hotel. Rooms are a good size and set up very nicely. And definitely clean and comfortable. Shelley at the front desk is so amazing and welcoming. After only 2 stays she remembered my name as soon as I walked in. Amazing!

title: Great hotel and location
text: Location of this hotel is fantastic, right next to the fifth avenue and close to all major transits. It’s also easy to go up and down since it’s in midtown. The hotel lobby is rather small, but the room is clean and well decorated.

title: The Nicest Hotel Staff in Manhattan
text: From the opening of the door thru check-in and the super soft robes provided by housekeeping, we had one of the most pleasant hotel experiences we have had in New York  despite the typical small room size. The positive upbeat attitudes were fueled by an extraordinary on site  Manager. The location to everything, one block from Herald Square/subway, was a major selling point  and the complementary hot chocolate  and spa water added to the experience. Add extremely clean rooms and extraordinary restaurants nearby. 5 STARS for the Le Soleil team!

title: Never coming back
text: Pizza box left in my room from prev guest when I checked in. Hair all over my shower I was disgusted. Hotel staff was extremely rude. The doorman was the only decent employee. Totally ruined my engagement celebration.

title: Best location, accommodations and hospitality
text: Hector is so friendly and helpful!  He is the perfect person to say hello at the front door!  When you leave your bags, you can count on him to take good care!  Fantastic hotel for location, accommodations and hospitality!  Thanks for taking care of us Hector!

title: Location Location Location
text: This boutique hotel is centrally located and provides easy access to anywhere in Manhattan that you need to go. The rooms are clean and well-appointed, and the Staff is super helpful and professional. They made me feel special. It looks upscale but feels like family!

title: Ottimo!
text: Hotel in posizione ottimale per raggiungere a piedi gran parte dei punti focali di Midtown.  Stazione della metro a pochi passi. Sono stata molte volte a NY e questo è stato l'hotel dove mi sono trovata meglio in assoluto. Il merito va anche allo staff per la gentilezza e la sollecitudine dimostrate dal primo all'ultimo momento del nostro soggiorno. Camera abbastanza grande con un angolo salottino molto comodo e vista sull'Empire State Building. Bagno ben attrezzato e razionale. Pulizia ottima. Unica pecca.. un solo accappatoio ed un solo paio di pantofole in una camera per due persone. Un ringraziamento di cuore a Nicole e a tutto lo staff (dei quali non ricordo i nomi) per avere contribuito a rendere il nostro soggiorno una bellissima vacanza in totale relax. Ci tornerò sicuramente.

title: Broadway Trip
text: Had a great time with our visit to New York and a lot of it had to do with our stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Had Rooms are on the smaller size, but it’s New York. But they are clean and well kept. Had a great experience! Definitely will be back!!

title: Excellent hotel!!
text: I stayed for three nights for a birthday trip. The staff is very helpful and kind. The room was very comfortable and quiet. Being located in midtown it is central to everything. I will definitely stay again.

title: excellent
text: This hotel exceeded expectations.  It is clean,  quiet, great staff and ideal location.  Room size is small but not as tight as many NYC hotels.  Modern and updated.   Staff was friendly and helpful.  Had reasonable priced and tasty drinks at the restaurant.

title: Hospitality at its finest!
text:
There are only good words to share about this hotel - the location, accommodations, and hospitality are first-rate and beyond!  I spent a few nights at the hotel to, unfortunately, attend a funeral, and having a comfortable place to stay provided one less thing to worry about.  The staff, however, were the real gems of this establishment -- especially Yadira who took such outstanding care of me from check-in to check-out, as well as the other front desk professionals, Meredith and Eranny.  The cherry on top was that this hotel provided the comforts of home (espresso - yum!) without entirely breaking the bank.

I'm so glad I found the Executive Hotel Le Soleil and its wonderful team.  In fact, I've already booked another stay and am hoping to visit the Vancouver location in June.

title: Excellent staff and hotel manager
text: The manager of the hotel, Mitchel, was extremely accommodating for our needs and delivered.  The rooms was spacious, clean and had excellent views.  Located conveniently in Midtown and easy to get around.  The cost of the room was reasonable for this time of season and what we got was so much worth it.  I travel quit a bit and highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great location and WONDERFUL STAFF
text:
First, let me begin by mentioning Meredith, Shelley and Andre provided top notch QUALITY customer service. Professional, friendly, polite and for this I will return. 
Thank you for all you do!!! It was a pleasure meeting you.

I was in NYC a few weeks ago and stayed at another hotel across from the Oculus and WTC and DID NOT receive the same level of customer service.

Location location location is everything, near 5th and 6th walking distance to the Metro, Macy's and Times Square with a plethora of restaurants and bakeries.

The room was small but cute, bathroom was also small with hardly any shelf space for toiletries, bathroom door was weird with no door handle to pull out the sliding door making it difficult to close the door.
I came prepared with my own coffee creamer, not realizing the hotel provided creamers. I was extremely disappointed the Keurig machine and the coffee mugs were VERY DUSTY as if they have not been used in a while, so unfortunately, I had to go out for coffee. My suggestion is housekeeping / management should check the machine periodically for cleaning. 
I realize Sunday morning they offered coffee in the lobby for a few hours early in the morning.

Overall, my stay was pleasant, and I look forward to returning soon.

title: Lovely stay!
text: We had a lovely stay in a suite on the 11th floor. We didn’t have a view but that’s okay because it was a quiet room and we all slept so well. The bed was comfy (the sleeper sofa was not comfortable but our 10 year old didn’t complain). The room was quite spacious and the bathroom was nice too. Shelley at the front desk was very kind and my daughter enjoyed telling her about our adventures every day. She even left a bottle of champagne in our room for my 40th birthday, which was so nice!

title: Good value for price
text: decent room, though small like most NYC hotel rooms. Great location, friendly, very efficient staff. Mattress a little too soft for me, and the room needs brighter bulbs - it was always dim. But very clean and up to date.

title: Lots to love
text: What I loved about this hotel: LOCATION (great for walking to & from Penn Station, sightseeing in Midtown, access to numerous restaurants), SIZE (boutique size made for a cozy, relaxing, mostly adult venue), AMENITIES (loved my view of Empire State Bldg from the 15th floor, complimentary in-room bottled water &, Keurig coffee; cozy lobby with fireplace and morning coffee) & CLEANLINESS (from the front desk to my room, super clean!)

title: EXCELÊNCIA EM QUALIDADE E SERVIÇOS
text: Eu e minha esposa estivemos hospedados no Le Soleil NY, por duas semanas. Os quartos são excelentes, sendo que se vc tiver mais bagagens é interessante reservar o quarto de 27 m2. Os serviços  e a localização, são perfeitos. Registro especialmente, a dedicação da recepcionista Shelley, que muito fez para que nos sentíssemos benvindos e acomodados, superando em muito as nossas expectativas.

title: Top rated stay!
text: I must start by mentioning the front desk, my check in was easy, the staff polite and helpful..greeting me warmly and offering me some hot coco on a very cold day.  I had a lovely room near the elevator but wasn’t disturbed by any loud sounds coming from the hallway.  Housekeeping was on point, meeting all my needs in my room.  I especially want to mention Mitchel Whitley, assist. Front office manager, he helped me throughout my visit when my in room phone wasn’t working, sent an engineer up right away and continued throughout the visit to check in and make sure I was happy.  My family stays here quite often, it was my first time and when I come back in April I’ll be staying here again.  KUDOS to a safe and comfortable hotel and welcoming staff.  *****

title: Great location and staff!
text: Great location and the staff is so helpful and nice! Rooms are good size and clean. Reasonably priced compared to most hotels in midtown. Only complaint is the sofa in our suite was very worn and dirty (spots). Everything else was great!

title: One Word...EXCELLENT!
text:
First of all, I would like to talk a little bit about the location of the hotel. Since it is located between two important main avenues such as 5 and 6 and extremely close to the Penn Station; You can easily go everywhere by walking or by metro. Also, the hotel is wonderfully close to MACY's. =P

All the hotel staff we met (receptionists, cleaners and doormen) were extremely friendly and polite.

We stayed in one of the Executive Queen Suites and the size of the room was very good. It was also quite ergonomic. We had a very comfortable 12 day stay with 4 huge suitcases. The bed and pillows were also very cozy and comfortable. On the days we asked for it to be cleaned, we never complained about the room cleaning.

Thank you for everything.

On our next trip to NYC, I think we'll stay here again.

title: Xmas stay in New York
text: The hotel is located in the centre of Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park, Times Square and the Ground Zero memorial. the room that we had was very clean and well equipped with a fridge, microwave, sink and kettle etc. Breakfast was served in the attached bar/restaurant and was adequate.

title: Perfect Hotel for business travels and  not only
text:
it is the second time we stay in this hotel for business reasons; last time was in april
it is a Super clean hotel with very confortable beds and pillows
the rooms are wide rooms for Ny standards-we had a junior suite with sofa and two tv's
the position is just perfect super central in the heart of manhattan, 5 minutes walking distance from time square, bryant park and the empire state building
the concierge service is up to the hotel standards, nice and very helpfull.
Great choice.

title: Excellent experience
text: Great experience -- beautiful, clean, comfortable accommodations.  Staff and management were incredibly hospitable; highly, highly recommend for a sophisticated, comfortable, and warm hotel experience!

title: SUPER COMFORTABLE HOTEL IN FIFTH AV AREA
text: The first thing I can say about this facility is the extreme kindness and helpfulness of the staff, the room booked was a suite so spacious with a sitting area, it presented all the comforts starting from the comfort of the bed, the bathroom spacious and with a really big shower, complete with the accessories including bathrobe (purchasable if needed). Quiet room with every comfort. I will definitely be back

title: Amazing hotel, perfect located and with super friendly and helpful staff!
text: The location is very central and close to main attractions like the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, Times Square and 5th Avenue. The room was spacious, the bathroom was great and it got cleaned daily. The staff was always very friendly and helpful, they provided valuable information about the attractions, restaurants and how to get to specific places. Thanks a lot! Will definitely come back :)

title: Great NYC hotel!
text: Everyone was so friendly.  We had two rooms booked and since they don’t have adjoining rooms they put us in a corner so the doors were right next to each other.  There was 3 of us in one of the rooms so we had reserved a suite with a couchbed.  I highly recommend getting a suite even if there’s only 2 - gives you more room to move around. The location was great, decor was nice, there was a nice sitting area off the lobby - the pictures on line actually match the hotel which isn’t always the case - and most importantly it was clean! I would definitely recommend this hotel and will stay there again myself.

title: A beautiful hotel right in the heart of Manhattan!
text: We stayed with my husband and 17 year old daughter for 6 nights in January. It’s a very nice hotel, with character and a small but beautiful lobby. The people at the front desk and the manager were excellent, professional but warm and welcoming. The free coffee and hot chocolate in the lobby were a beautiful and very well received gesture. If I had to comment negatively on something, it would be the quality (or maybe the old condition?) of the mattresses. Also, the bathroom door did not lock and it could easily slide too far into the wall, and the lack of a hand held shower head in the bathroom may be a problem for many people. The sofa bed, which was opened for my daughter, did not have the same quality bedspreads and duvet cover as the main bed. Why? Initially we had a room on the 6th but after complaining about the mattress quality we were promptly moved to the 13th floor ( room 1304)  and it was larger and much better, we could even see the tip of the Empire State Building haha! But the best of all is the location.  Walking distance to whatever you like, Times Square, Rockefeller, Whole Foods market, multiple subway stations, Grand Central Station… you name it. The concierge arranged for a taxi to the airport and kept our luggage until the trip.  All in all I have to say that even though we initially had a few complaints about the room, the people at Le Soleil responded kindly and with professionalism to all our needs. And this is what we will always remember!

title: EXECUTIVE HOTEL LESOLEIL
text: I do wish all the rooms had a dresser.  It is very important for someone staying more than a day to be able to unpack their suitcase.  They are fairly inexpensive and there is always room in the rooms for them.  I just don't understand why there are so many rooms without a dresser.  We need drawers!!!

title: Great boutique hotel near the Empire State Building in NY
text: I was in New York for work and stayed at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York for 3 nights. My room on one of the upper floors was quiet and clean with good amenities. The front desk staff and bell captain were friendly and there was good wifi throughout the hotel. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Nice Hotel
text: Hotel was clean and in a great location. Easy to walk to Time Square and Bryant Park.  Staff were nice and provided hot chocolate! I will make sure to stay again. We enjoyed the clean room and fresh towels!

title: NYC stay
text: Concert at Madison Square Gardens was a 5 min walk. Great restaurants on the street and 5th avenue just a few minutes walk. Loved the location. Rooms were typical size yet well appointed and windows were large which made it feel spacious.  Was so quite for NYC. Will be back.

title: Definitely recommend, will stay again.
text: Clean, comfortable, quiet, good value, good location, incredibly friendly and helpful staff. Round the corner from Macy’s, Penn station. Good to go anywhere from here. Coffee shops, bagels, deli’s, lounges, restaurants close by. Recommend!

title: 10/10 Y’all Better Come on Over Here
text: Let me tell y’all about THIS hotel!! I arrived the day after my friends did so I can’t speak to the check in experience, but the staff were VERY welcoming. I was immediately greeted at the door with someone who helped with my bags. We stayed in an executive suite with a queen bed and sofa bed. It wasn’t a big room, but it was enough space for three women to share comfortably. Shelley and Andre at the front desk have IMPECCABLE customer service. All of the staff were always available and ready to assist whenever we needed but those two went above and beyond for the entire duration of our trip. I’m a southern girl born and raised so I was nervous about meeting rude New Yorkers, but they were quite the opposite and displayed great southern hospitality. The hotel is in a great spot and we were able to walk to many tourist attractions like Broadway, summit one, and Times Square. There’s also a lot of food and shopping around so if that is your thing you’re in for a treat. I’d give them 100 stars if I could because they were just THAT amazing. The best hotel experience I’ve had in a very long time. I will definitely be back.

title: STAY HERE!!!!!!
text: I celebrated my 25th Birthday in NYC and staying in this hotel has been one of my favorite parts of the entire trip. The hospitality that was shown to my friends and exceeded our expectations. Shelley made it her obligation to greet us every time we left and entered the building. I don’t know what homegirl gets paid but it’s not enough. A RAISE is needed. The hotel itself was great and it’s in a great location for tourist. I will be back to visit and truthfully it’s solely because of how well Shelley treated us. I love NYC uggghhhhh!!

title: Good job done
text: How do we start this because I’m not much of the writer but I do want to share our good experience. The hotel is wonderful. I have notice the staff are very friendly and good experience must be shared with other

title: Wonderful stay
text: Hotel staff are extremely nice and even the managers are extremely helpful. The greet you in the lobby and walk you to your direction. I would like to shout out Yasir so is a perfect example of making customers happy. We were satisfied clients and this hotel proved it that they care for their customers.

title: Pls try out this hotel
text: We had a great stay at the hotel. The staff are very friendly and the hotel rooms are clean. We had a good time. The hotel locations is mindful because it’s close to every place we wanted to go. We do recommend this hotel

title: Our visit was worth every Penny
text: We visit New York City ones or twice a year but this time we absolutely made a wonderful choice of picking this hotel. We had trouble booking through the website and I had made a call to the hotel. I spoke with Yasir and he was wonder. He made my reservation, and I had a lot of questions and he answered them all in details. When we arrived we met him in person. He was as kind and as professional as he was over the phone. The hotel did a nice job

title: Fantastic
text: We loved the hotel. It was just very nice, the rooms the lobby and the coffee was so good that I tried it each morning. The mattress was very comfortable and the room was clean. We had to store our bags and we were able to do that as well

title: The best laid plans can go astray but the excellent staff saved the day!
text:
Sunday, December 18th through Tuesday, December 20th, I had the great pleasure of staying at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York. 
Unfortunately, the best laid plans can go astray. Early Monday morning, I learned that the Billy Joel concert had been cancelled. I was devastated to say the least! 

The excellent staff came to the rescue in a big way!! There is no question that I will stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil again and I will definitely share my experience with my friends and colleagues. 
Below is a list of the individuals that assisted me including examples of their excellence. 
1.	Yadira Aviles – provided outstanding customer service and thoroughly researched entertainment options and excellent places to eat (Andrew’s was delicious!). Sent me a beautiful note and LaMarca Prosecco (Sparkling Wine) to ease my disappoint about the concert. She does not miss a beat! She demonstrated a keen knowledge about the job, a natural leader, attention to detail and very personable with everyone she encountered. She represents the epitome of customer service, leadership, and hotel management.
2.	Eranny Crisostumo – greeted me at check-in professionally and was very welcoming. Gave excellent advice on securing tickets to the Rockettes at a reasonable cost. Made sure that my Wi-Fi worked well and improved the efficiency of my cell phone service at the hotel. She has excellent work ethic, grace under pressure (at one point it became very busy), and outstanding professionalism. Her exceptional problem-solving skills and technological expertise should be commended.
3.	Juan Espinal – was very proactive in securing a taxicab for me during my hotel departure. Although it was very busy in the hotel lobby, Juan made certain that my luggage was safe and kept track of my taxi’s arrival (I noticed he did the same for all guests). He was very detailed oriented and expertly ensured that the guests departed safely and efficiently. His communication skills, knowledge of hotel management, and professionalism were exceptionally executed.
4.	Shelly Rosario – greeted me at check-in with a smile, professionally, and efficiently. She went above and beyond the call of duty to find a place for me to get a facial and tickets to the Rockettes. Very knowledgeable about the area regarding where to eat and where to shop. Her hotel management skills were exceptional because of her operational knowledge, communication skills, and flexibility in navigating unforeseen problems. She is a true professional and an exceptional leader.
All four of these individuals should be highly commended for their excellent work, knowledge, and dedication. Thank you so much for such a pleasant experience.

title: Our anniversary at the hotel was just speechless
text: We came to the hotel celebrate our 2nd wedding anniversary and we had a very nice room with great view. We loved the bottle of champagne which was a very nice touch. We were there for only 1 night but we loved one stay.

title: I think I’m going to call this my favorite hotel
text: I speak a large part of my year traveling and particularly I visit manhattan often. I had trouble making reservations so I had to reach out to the hotel directly. I was dealing with Yasir who made my experience incredibly memorable. He made sure to meet us when we arrive, he made sure the rooms are meeting our expectations and he kept his promise to make sure we have the hire floor. There’s a lot more which is very hard to believe in customer service but he made is feel so hospitable like we were the family.

title: Great hotel and excellent service
text: Great hotel, rooms are small but ergonomically designed well. That’s how the city is right so we had a nice and clean room. Bed was super comfy and the staff are just amazing. Yasir was very nice and extremely helpful to us and my family.

title: What a wonderful stay we had
text: Our check was smooth, loved the coffee and the hot coco at the hotel. The hotel is very nicely desired. The locations is marvelous because we can go everywhere anywhere in minutes of speaking. We will be back

title: Servizi executive ottimi
text:
Il comfort della room ha garantito una permanenza senza compromessi e senza stress.
Il materasso é stato comodissimo, e il personale ha pulito con puntualità e professionalità la camera ogni giorno.
Tornerò senz'altro per lavoro in questa struttura per il comfort, gli spazi comuni e lo staff.

title: January NYC travel.
text: This was a lovely quaint conveniently located hotel with available and friendly staff…Being on the 15th floor, the two slow elevators were the only downside as there often was a line to get on and off.

title: Wonderful hotel with a wonderful name and location
text: We really enjoyed staying here because our daughter's name is Soleil.  When we checked in, we were upgraded to the penthouse suite.  The rooms were just perfect for the three of us.  We were within walking distance of many sites and the facilities were clean and fresh.  We will return here whenever we come back to New York.

title: Great Location and Great staff
text:
The location was perfect and the staff very friendly and helpful.Room was spacious and very clean.We spent 3 days in New York and couldn’t ask for a better hotel.
Close to great restsurants and great shopping.
Thank-You

title: Overall good stay
text:
Shelly helped us check-in and was great. Very pleasant and helpful.
We booked an queen suite and the room was on the 2nd floor and view included the roof of the neighboring building which was really disappointing. We were told the queen suites are on the lower floors and do not come with a view. They were nice enough to give us a different room the next day which had a great view of the Summit One Vanderbilt. 
Jaime helped me check out my luggage and load it into my cab. Very friendly with a pleasing demeanor. 
Location is about 10-15 min from most popular attractions (Times Square, Bryant Park, Summit One etc.)
Shelly was a pleasure to communicate with. She was very helpful, and accommodated our late check-in request as well. Meredith and Nichole were very helpful as well but had a very serious demeanor. A smile wouldn't hurt :).
The hotel was clean overall. The tub stopper in our room was removed when we checked-in. When we complained about it we were told it would be fixed, but it was never done. 
The mattress and rooms could  use an upgrade. Mattress is really soft and was not good on my back. Rooms were clean but were outdated.

title: Yasir was amazing and room was fantastic
text: Exceptional service by Yasir. He checked us in. He was great at customer service, he polite and our check in process was very smooth. He asked us if we want the room on the higher floor and if we need help with the luggage. We had a nice and clean room.

title: Outstanding stay at NYC
text: The hotel had a great friendly staff. The room was well appointed and comfortable. The about the stay was the PHENOMENAL view. Would highly recommend and definitely a NYC experience to have! We loved it

title: Great night for honeymoon 💝
text: I booked the hotel for me and my husband for our honeymoon 💕 it was an amazing experience. We were on the 18th floor and had a view of the city. They also brought us a bottle of champagne as a gift. Everyone was so kind and professional. Great job and thank you for everything ❤️

title: Warm, welcoming and ready to accomodate.
text:
A glorious first impression. Beautifully lit concierge area where we were warmly greeted by Yadira. 

Upon arriving in our room, we noticed that it was not the room that was advertised to my mother via Booking.com ( wrong photos advertised)

Our minds were readily eased by the care of the manager , Mitchell. 
His calming guidance and reassurance allowed us to feel heard. 
(My mother and I have both been in the service industry (myself in the hotel industry)) so we try not to burden staff with complaints unless completely necessary.

We were, more than, compensated for our troubles.

I have a huge thank you to give to the housekeeping staff, who were ready to lend a hand or fulfill a request.

Our breakfasts were delicious and so was our dine-in room service dinner. (A big shout out for those scrumptious cocktail and mocktails)
Vincente was such a kind and thoughtful server.

Any moment we left to explore the Big Apple, we were greeted with Big Smiles upon our return. Eager to share in our joyous journey. 

Many thanks, as well, to Andrew, Shelly, Jimmy, Nicole and Eranny. 

When we return to NYC, there is only 1 spot we will be returning to.

title: Excellent service
text: Simply the best hotel in NYC! I stayed for few days at this hotel and every single day was just Excellent service, very helpful staff, excellent location. Most importantly they have fair prices. We loved it

title: Excellent service
text: I had a great experience staying at this beautiful hotel. We had called the hotel and we booked our rooms with Yasir. He was very helpful and extremely nice. It is very clean, the staff is kind and very helpful. The rooms are spotles recommend staying here

title: Great hotel
text: I had a very nice stay at this hotel. Le Soleil hotel looks beautiful and it’s a clean hotel. The hotel has great sitting areas, and the lobby is decor very nicely. The rooms are not that big but have a practical lay out

title: Amazing staff and a perfect location!
text:
Just got back from a 3 night stay with the family. 
The hotel is ideally located next to Macy's, the empire state building and Times Square. The entrance and lobby were magnificent with a beautiful decor and a cozy feel. We absolutely loved the hot chocolate and water dispensers near the front desk!
Staff was wonderful and accomodating at all levels. A huge thanks to JUAN for all his advice and help! 
We stayed in an executive Queen suite with sofa bed. Suite was the perfect size with a large bathroom. Unfortunately the pull out sofa was not up to par. The mattress was paper thin creating a huge crease in the center. Very Very unconfortable for early teens to the point where they did not sleep. I have no problems with sofa beds in general but these were bad as stated in other reviews. For a family of 4,I recommend taking a room with 2 queen beds.
Finally, the hotel is very clean, especially the lobby area. But some areas are a hit and miss. That was the case in my room when I walked in and found a Pepperidge farm cookie bag behind the bathroom door from previous guests. I would think a 4 Diamond hotel would have a quality control system in place...
All in all, I recommend this hotel for the premium location, the staff and charming atmosphere. With a little more attention to detail this hotel can live up to it's 4 diamond award.

title: Excellent experience
text: From the moment we arrived Yasir was incredible. He made us feel welcomed. The rooms were clean and beautiful. The location was fantastic and close to everything you need possibly. The staff were paying attention to details which was phenomenal.

title: Visit to this property
text: This place is located in the center of us going everywhere. There’s a train entrance a block away that services all the cool places and everything is walking distance. The hotel staff are nice and hotel is great.

title: Great Stay!
text: We loved this hotel. Good location, very clean and outstanding service. Just what my family of four needed. They were truly accomodating. The food at their restaurant was exquisite. Great value, we really hope to be back!

title: Great!
text: Great Hotel, great employees and service overall. The restaurant is really good and the staff helped us with the bags and getting through the city. Maps and taxis were provided. It was overall a pleasant experience.

title: Good but not great
text: Charming midtown hotel in an excellent location. Very walkable to all the main sights. Hotel was good but several issues and shortcomings that keep it from being a great hotel. Room was very comfortable but had several small issues. Hotel has the potential to be great if they paid more attention to details.

title: Staying in Le Soleil
text: Executive hotel Le Soleil was great. It was too warm in the rooms and you can’t open the window my only complaint :) Hotel staff at the reception were very friendly and cooperative. Location is great and close to all attractions.

title: Amazing start to the visit
text: We had a great time at the Le Soleil. Yasir checked us in and he was gold. He explained everything to us he was extremely polite and very professional. He gave us a nice room, he asked “what brings us to NYC” we were have nice conversation. Thank you for your great hospitality

title: Brilliant and impressive customer service
text: Service was excellent. I was greeted by Yasir when I have arrived to the hotel. He personally walked me to the reception to check in and he even mentioned my last name to the clerk which was impressive. I was checked in my Shelley and she was superb. I had a nice room on the higher floor. The hotel is gorgeous and nicely decorated.

title: Will be our to place next trip
text: Fantastic !!!! Clean and efficient, stylish lobby along with complimentary water, coffee and bit chocolate. Our room was on the high floor and the room itself was nice and clean. Our check in process was smooth and efficient and we were able to store our bags after checkout. We will definitely return

title: Hotel Le Soleil - sunshine service with a smile!
text: I had booked a queen suite, with a view of the Empire State building, for my daughter & I for 2 nights; in celebration of her birthday.  We received a warm welcome at reception on arrival, were offered hot chocolate & sat in the lobby lounge beside a cozy fireplace.  Our room was on the 18th floor, lovely views, beautifully prepared.  However, the photographs on Booking.com sadly were misleading on the size & lounge layout. I reported as such to reception, who immediately called management. Mitchell, the manager, kindly offered to move us to another room, however it would only be available for our 2nd night. So we enjoyed a comfy first night, with great coffee, and a complimentary bottle of Chardonnay. The following day Mitchell said we had been upgraded as a courtesy. He accompanied us to the 20th floor Decolette  Penthouse Suite! We were so impressed - such favour!  Double rain-shower, superb queen bed, lounge with huge couch, fully equipped kitchen, dining room & double floor-to-ceiling views of the city skyline! Breakfast was inclusive both days @ the Trademark in-house restaurant - delicious food!  The excellence of service from ALL staff throughout was the cherry-on-the-top! That includes the doorman, porters, concierge & our waiters.  Special commendation to Mitchell & his team Shelley, Andrew, Jimmy, Nicole, Yadira, Eranny & Vincente! Your service went above & beyond, always with a smile! My daughter & I convey our heartfelt gratitude 🤗

title: We will be back
text: 10 out of 10 to this place. Staff was always helpful, gave great recommendations for the area and definitely provided amazing service. The location of this hotel is just great, and we were very happy with our room

title: I’m in love with this hotel
text: Yasir and his staff were so kind and helped us with everything we needed. They are good people. I have stayed all over in Manhattan and this was by far my fav experience. I’d recommend this hotel and I’d just book it and don’t give it a second thought.

title: Can’t me more perfect
text: Stayed in the suite room which we were looking forward to for months. Locations, service, layout for the room was in credit and cleanliness in the room and hallways. This was our first time staying here and we will make sure to come back.

title: Experience was incredibly exceptional
text: My partner and I landed on the Executive hotel Le Soleil due to its beautiful comments. I wanted to give back the comment as well and yes I was also very satisfied customer. I was extremely impressed and Yasir was one of a kind. He greeted me and my partner when we arrived and he helped us with bags, he give us the hours of operations for the restaurant in detail and gave us the tour for fitness center and business center. Overall experience was top notch. Well done Yasir for being an amazing sport.

title: Rooms needs update but service was phenomenal
text: Great location in the city. The service was really nice, daily housekeeping which was a relief. Rooms was nice but doesn’t need an update though but again the service of this hotel was incredible. We will be back

title: Excellent Christmas and new year stay
text: A beautiful hotel in an ideal location. The staff was so helpful. Breakfast was great and they have coffee and hot chocolate throughout the day. Every day they will leave chocolate on your bed after cleaning. All in all, I recommend your stay here.

title: Amazing-Highly recommend
text: My seventeen year old and I had an amazing two night stay on 19th floor city view room. Made to feel so welcomed. Every need and question met and answered immediately. Staff was the most accommodating I have encountered since pre-Covid travel. We can’t wait to stay here again on our next trip into NYC!

title: Pleasant experience
text: It was our 10th wedding anniversary and we were glad to have chosen this hotel. The front desk staffs were welcoming and pleasant. I specifically appreciated Shelly's courteous attitude. We even had the chance to meet the chief engineering officer who helped us take pictures near the fireplace. The Christmas decorations were beautiful and The food was great. Everyone had a pleasing attitude. I look forward to going back. Thanks for a fantastic experience.

title: Top notch & friendliness staff
text: Had a wonderful three day stay. The hotel is 5 stars from top to bottom. It didn't matter where or when, every single staff member (not just the front desk) smiled, said hello & asked how your day was going. The hospitality & service Sam & Andrew provided was top notch. They were on top of every little detail. Thank you for an amazing visit

title: Ask and u shall receive
text: Hotel was wonderful staff was great room was great. But I noticed they did not have a microwave so when I did a review in the hotel room I didn’t ask for a microwave I said a microwave would be great to have. Five minutes later somebody brings Me a microwave how cool is that

title: Sams the man
text: Sams the man! He greeted us warmly and made us feel welcome. We are down here for a New Years celebration and Sam was really helpful with welcoming us, showing us to our room, and even gave us a complimentary bottle of champagne in celebration. Sams the man!

title: It’s about customer experience
text: Thank you Sam and Shelley for the fantastic experience in NY. You made the difference and our stay at Le Soleil was unique! The hotel is very clean, good rooms, and perfect services. Not to mention about the view from my room to the Empire State Building!!!

title: Great 1 night stay.
text: The hotel staff are top notch! Friendly, kind, and efficient. Thanks to all the front desk staff for treating my 6 year old son so well. He shared with family he’s going to work at the hotel someday, lol. Room is nice, clean- but small. Bathroom was perfect. Location is good, very close to Herald Square. The attached restaurant was great, not a huge selection, but delish. Great staff there as well. Thanks to everyone! We’ll be back.

title: Only place I'll stay in NYC
text: I'm a NYC native & have stayed at many a NYC hotel (lease didn't quite start yet, apt renovations, etc.) & this place is the place. The rooms are lovely, beds are comfortable, & they are truly clean. It's the perfect mid-size. What is most exceptional though is the staff. Andre shines. He's a real hospitality star. He knows everything about the City & doesn't withhold his knowledge from guests. He also goes out of his way to make sure you feel welcome & have what you need for a lovely stay. Honestly, this place is a gem.

title: D&C UK
text: Great location. Helpful staff. Sam, the Manager, sorted a problem quickly and efficiently. Only draw back was the cleaning service was a bit erratic. But overall a good place to stay, near to sights, shops and restaurants

title: Great rooms, bar, cozy lobby and exceptional customer service, especially from Hector
text: Really fantastic hotel. Loved the lobby, very comfortable rooms and with a decent gym but the standout was the customer service, especially the Bell guy/man, Hector. I had to get to the airport during rush hour during the holiday season and he went above and beyond to get me a car at a reasonable price (better than the insane surge charges from Uber and Lyft) all with a calm, lovely demeanor.

title: Amazing experience thanks to Shelley and Sam!!!
text: Went to celebrate holiday/birthday in the city and chose this hotel. Front staff Shelley and Manager Sam made this trip memorable and our stay beyond satisfactory with their accommodations. Thanksguys

title: My Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York stay
text: My stay at this hotel was great. from the staff to the location. The rooms was big and clean, the staff was very helpfull. Any time I needed something from them like an extra towel they were at my door in like 5 minutes. And I stayed at the 14 floor. The location of the hotel is great also. Like 5 minutes walk for bryant park, time square, the subway station, the bus ride. Anyways, its close to everything. Nice restaurants all around it too.

title: Excellent hotel
text:
Excellent reception service with always smiling 😊 
Nicole
Andreas
Sam
Shelley
Superb service attitude 
Room was so clean and the restaurant was very nice too. Room was also quiet and hotel is located just perfectly in central Manhattan. 
Happy New Year!

title: The Hotel Steals Your Deposit
text: This hotel is stealing the money of their guests - they take your deposit and tell you they will return it upon check-out - they don’t and then tell you it’s your bank’s fault and they just keep your money - it’s theft - worst hotel I’ve ever stayed in - DON’T STAY HERE!!!! Mitchel Whiley / Samrat Chakraborty / Yasir Raza - the names of the hotel staff who stole my $100 deposit.

title: Southern hospitality in NYC!
text: Southern hospitality in NYC!  Loved this hotel, location, cucumber water in lobby and extra attention to making sure we were comfortable. Sam was super kind and made our stay the best!  I would definitely stay at this hotel again!

title: Great stay, helpful staff
text: A lovely hotel in a great location! The team at the front desk, specifically Sam and Shelley, were incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. Walking distance to many attractions yet on a quiet street. Highly recommend!

title: NY
text: This hotel is in a very great location, near to Macy’s and Times Square; the hotel is very clean and the staff are friendly. Sam in the front desk was very helpful and kind. I would definitely come back to this hotel.

title: Just ok
text: I reserved a room for the “city view” that was advertised but I got a view of the brick building next door. Room could use some maintenance for being a $400 a night. It was also a very small room with barely enough space to walk around the bed.

title: Awesome staff and hotel
text:
We came here for Christmas holidays and found this hotel like home. Hotel is super clean and hygienic. And staff is so amazing specially Samrat is super helpful! ❤️

How can I forget Hot chocolate severed at front entrance!

title: A boutique hotel and a gem to stay at in New York.
text: Had a wonderful stay at this hotel. It is a gem . very clean staff was extremely attentive and located very near train station about a 10 minute walk. It is quiet and a nice oasis away from the crowds. Yadira helped us with reservations room selection also really helpful. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Will definitely stay there again.

title: 2nd time staying here-still great
text:
This is my second time staying in this hotel and I am blown away by how friendly every single person we have encountered there has been. We’ve been given helpful directions and recommendations to restaurants, etc..
Clean room, comfortable bed, and very central location!

title: Excellent location and superior service
text: I drove in and parked in front of the hotel to check in. The staff was wonderful and answered all of my questions about parking and amenities. The room was spacious with a sofa bed and very comfortable bed. Bathroom is quite nice. Staff was awesome throughout the stay. Location of the hotel is great for walking to lots of restaurants and pubs.

title: Massively overpriced and overrated
text: Breakfast not included as stated on booking.com vouchers given which hardly get you anything for breakfast, food choices terrible , dirty rooms lack of care and cleaning standards won’t be returning to this hotel

title: Above Excellent Service and Comfortable Rooms
text: I stayed at Hotel Le Soleil in November 2022 with my MFA program. The service was impeccable! Everyone was attentive, helpful and friendly. The location is perfect. Penn Station is approximately 10 minutes away, and there’s so many restaurants of all sorts also within short walking distances. The rooms are modern, extremely clean and the bathroom was huge and luxurious! Though there were many guests, it was quiet. I was in the 17th floor and had a close view of the Empire State Building. I was there in Election Day and at night it was lit up in red, white and blue, which was really cool.  Hope you get a chance to experience this hotel, and I look forward to staying there again.

title: Great Staff!
text: We spent the week before Christmas here.... it was the perfect location for our family activities. The staff is excellent... Mitchell was very professional  and resourceful in making sure that we had what we needed. Shelley, Tashi, Jallow, Chris, and Imrana gave extraordinary help and service.  Would recommend a stay here!

title: Cold Room
text: Firstly let me say the staff in this hotel are wonderful especially Shellie and Yadira, Shellie greeted me with a smile every day and made me feel like family it was lovely. The hotel ambiance is also very lovely. My complaint is my room was very cold and the heating was not working properly even after it being looked at by maintenance and the manger. But then nothing was done. I requested extra blankets and slept in the cold room for 2 nights. Not happy if I wanted to be cold I’d sleep outside not in a hotel named after the sun.

title: Fantastic hotel centrally located in midtown.
text: Wonderful hotel centrally located. The hotel itself was fantastic -  clean, not too big, great size rooms. The bonus was the hotel staff. Mitchel, the front office manager, was so helpful prior to our arrival. It was great to meet him and say thanks before we checked out. The front desk staff were all lovely and happy to help as needed. In particular, Andre who helped us out on the last night when my children were unwell. Thanks to all staff at the hotel. We’ll definitely stay with you again next time we’re in New York.

title: Beautiful building, fantastic employees
text:
I stayed here with my niece a for few nights before Christmas and the staff at the front desk is TOP NOTCH. Yadira drives into the city from Easton PA EVERYDAY which really speaks volumes about this company as an employer. Yadira and Meredith could not have been more welcoming, and  their smiles truly radiate the entire hotel lobby.  They were a wealth of information about the area and were genuinely happy we were there. 
Our room was beautiful and clean and the restaurant was just as exceptional. Òur server was so polite, knew the menu inside and out, and the food was absolutely incredible. The garlic knots were fresh baked and the best Ive ever had. The mushroom ravioli was to die for. 

Thank you to the entire staff for making our stay so incredible. Wonderful hospitality from start to end!

title: Outstanding service
text: We had few issues but that were addressed nicely and we were ok since they took initiative to handle it. We had a nice room and it was a little cold but like I said it was addressed. We love the staff.

title: Incredible stay
text: The staff are very nice and professional. We had requested to check in early and we were able to check in way before the check in time. Our stay started nicely and we absolutely loved it. There’s also a restaurant in the building trademark and the food was lovely

title: Stay at Executive hotel Le Soleil
text: We love love loved the property. It’s beautifully decorated for Christmas. The staff were happy and they seemed excited to be there. I’d like to shout out Mr. Raza for being so accommodating to us. He was amazing, very friendly and extremely polite. He’s an asset to the hotel industry.

title: Excellent hotel
text: Our stay was magnificent. Yasir made our stay so great and all the staff were kind and very friendly. Hotel is beautiful and beautifully located. The service was top notch and we loved our room. We will be back

title: Christmas stay
text: Had a great night in the city with family to celebrate the holiday, location of hotel was perfect with where we were going , hotel is clean , beautiful and very friendly staff. We would stay here again , and recommend it to everyone

title: Christmas In the City
text: We stood in the city for one night to experience the magic of NY at Christmas. We have been to the city many times prior. We arrived at the hotel on time and were informed that our room wasn’t ready and it would be a short wait. The car parking was also not clearly explained, where my husband had to wait 45 minutes to park a car in the adjacent garage. We waited over two hours to check-in. This was very stressful with a two year old. We were told late checkouts and labor issues related to cleaning staff caused a delay. We had to cancel a preexisting reservation. For our troubles we were given a $50.00 breakfast credit. We we arrived to the room, mind you two hours later, we were taken aback by the cleanliness of the room. The toilet had to be wiped down, there was a smell of vomit in the carpet outside the bathroom, broken bathroom locks and tape over windows, etc. We were elated to only be there for one night. We’ve stood many places and this by far was the worst stay in any city. I suggest you look elsewhere.

title: Christmas Vacay 2022
text:
Absolutely love the Staff!! That, in itself, makes ALL THE DIFFERENCE!! The Hotel Atmosphere is Amazing!! 

Our Housekeeper Pema did an EXCELLENT job. She was very charismatic and I really enjoyed talking with her.

title: Perfect stay and great service!
text:
Excellent service!  Excellent location.
LeSoleil is in a great location, it is clean and they have lovely rooms. We stayed in a regular room and it was perfect. The staff is very accommodating and will go out of their way to make your stay wonderful. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Nice Hotel but Could be Better
text: Excellent Location close to Macys and a 10-15 minute to the Tree. Late at night parts of the area can be very sketchy. Hotel is in desperate need a face lift as it is far behind all of the new modern hotels in NYC. The rooms are normal to NYC standards but they lack storage space. The closets do not have much space for storage. Sofa beds are very uncomfortable for an adult. These sofa beds may work for young children but is extremely uncomfortable for a grown adult. When sofa bed is opened it blocks the doorway to exit the room which could be an extreme safety/fire hazard. The Front Desk staff is amazing Special Shout out to Yadira, Eranny, Jaime, Nicole, Andrew and Meredith. They truly are special and care about their guests. Trademark offered great options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Overall the staff was great but the hotel could use some updating/fixing. It is quite dangerous to have the doorway to the room blocked should guests need to exit in the an emergency or staff needs to enter. Management should really reconsider the layouts of room as this could be dangerous.

title: Christmas in NY
text: LeSoleil is in a great location, it is clean and they have lovely rooms. We stayed in a suite and it was perfect for a family of four. The staff is very accommodating and will go out of their way to make your stay wonderful. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great stay
text: Booking reservations was easy, check in was simple, hotel was beautiful, very well presented. Close to major locations. Service was amazing and friendly. Very helpful, room was great, very clean great view of the Empire State Building. Over all I would definitely come back and also recommend to my family and friends.

title: We loved it
text: We loved our stay at the Executive hotel Le Soleil. The staff was wonderful and accommodating. The rooms are a bit outdated but still very clean. Kudos to a great customer service. We were very happy with our stay

title: Go and stay at this hotel
text: Great location and a very pretty boutique hotel. I love the name of the hotel LE SOLEIL very pretty name. The hotel is clean the rooms are good and the staff are very friendly. We will love to come back

title: Excellent
text: Only stayed for one night but we are hoping to come back. I have stayed in many hotel in the city but nonetheless this the by far awesome hotel we booked. The message service with the front desk was excellent, Yasir was extremely responsive via emails as well, staff were very helpful and friendly. Great leadership and great staff.

title: Customer service is top notch!
text: We recently had a wonderful stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil.  I had read several excellent reviews of the hotel, and it did not disappoint.  The location is wonderful.  So many good restaurants just a few steps away. Just a few blocks from so many sights.  The restaurant and bar at the hotel are wonderful too, but the best part is the customer service.   Everyone who works there is so friendly and helpful.  We had a situation with our shower not working at all.  We called the front desk to report it.  In just minutes, Sam called us back and offered to move us immediately. He explained that the person who could fix it would not be in until 10:00.  No problem. Our kids were staying in the next room, so we said we would just use their shower.  He told us to check with him when we came back from sightseeing.  When we returned to the hotel in the afternoon, Sam told us the shower could not be fixed, but they had moved us to the Penthouse! Oh my gosh.  What an experience.  Mitch took us to the room to make sure it was okay (of course!). What could have been a frustrating experience was handled so quickly and so nicely.  We will be staying here on all of our future trips.

title: Excelente estadia
text: Hotel muito bem localizado - 200m da Macy's e da estação Union Square. Relativamente perto também da Times Square. Quarto espaçoso, camas boas. Bom atendimento. O único probleminha foi uma lâmpada no quarto que não apagava e não conseguimos o reparo durante a estadia. No mais, recomendo o hotel.

title: Love this place!
text: This was our 3rd stay within the year. The location is great, the rooms are larger than most. Shout out to Sam and Meredith for their happy dispositions and going above and beyond. We’ll be back soon.

title: Great customer service!
text: Got to the hotel much earlier than check in time.  Sam, at the front desk, helped us out by allowing us to check in early!  Our room is beautiful!  Great place to stay.  Sam is the best!  Great location too!

title: good hotel
text: sam and meredith gave me very good service, very good room and felt very comfortable, the food at the restaurant was excellent. would definitely go here again, not too pricey. perfect place to stay at.

title: Nice and clean room and great customer service
text: We had an amazing view of the city and the service was amazing. Yasir and his staff were lovely. We had a lot of questions and we were given answers vey politely. The lobby is setup beautifully and we loved our coffee.

title: Exceptional
text: The hotel was great and the service was exceptional. The hotel manager Mr.Raza was very kind to meet us upon arrival since we were exchanging emails but taking the time out and meeting us during checking was very impressive. That shows that management care for their guests. Thank you

title: Yasir was extremely helpful throughout our stay!!!
text: I will be be coming back for sure for more night this time. The beds were very cozy, I had a room on the 11th floor perfect view and the most important thing of my stay was Mr. Yasir. I’d remember the great service I was provided and will make sure we come back.

title: Perfect
text: I took my 16 years old son for the long weekend in New York city. The executive hotel was perfect. Great customer service by Yasir and we loved him. The room are not that big but we were impressed that the room were in fact very clean.

title: Outstanding
text: Outstanding. The room was small but it was well organized. The bathroom is a good size and very clean. The check in was smooth and the hotel is close to Macys, Bryant park and a lot of more great attractions.

title: Great Experience
text: Yasir from the front desk was super helpful when I checked in. We loved our room that was given to us and I like the Christmas Decoration in the lobby. Hotel Le Soleil provides excellent hospitality service.

title: Great stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil NY NY
text:
Very friendly helpful staff Every request was given with a smile The bellhop was amazing helping us to get taxis going above and beyond  Would definitely stay here again Great value for money in NY
The Hotel is easy access to all the main shopping areas and sightseeing attractions

title: Good weekend Hotel in NYC Midtown
text: Great hotel with a unique location and the sence of a Boutiqe Hotel at a relatively good Proce&Performance. The service was quick and reliable. The Beds were great. The rooms were somewhat small but offered than other hand a good price&performance. Want to once more repeat, the Location is almost unbeatable!

title: December trip
text:
My son, fiancé and myself had a lovely stay. Comfortable room, very clean and all the hotel staff nice and attentive. On our next visit definitely be happy to stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soliel 
Great service all around. Keep up the good work ☺️

title: Wonderful stay
text: We arrived very late and kids were exhausted. All we wanted to check in and crash. The next day we came to the desk and met Yasir. We asked him about the area dinning options, attractions and a lot more. He was extremely helpful and very kind to my family.

title: Quite and comfortable stay
text: It’s not always about money it’s about a comfort. I travel most of the year and I look for comfort. I was excited to be in the city and extremely satisfied with the hotel. Everyone is very nice and professional. The rooms were cleaned and properly serviced. I do recommend this hotel.

title: very pleasant stay
text: Very pleasant stay. Location was very good, rooms were comfortable. However quite expensive in December, but everything in New York is. Bed was too small for a tall man. Breakfast was nice in the restaurant next to the hotel.

title: Great service ein a great location
text: We stayed from December 1st through 6th. The care and attention was excellent. When we were checking in we asked for a kettle for the room. When we reached the room the kettle was there. All of the staff were very helpful and I would have no hesitation in recommending the hotel for any visits to New York

title: Great hotel!
text: My husband and I stay in the city every December to have ourselves a "holiday weekend" but don't typically stay in this area. We picked this hotel because the reviews seemed good and it was in a convenient location to walk to Bryant Park, Rockefeller Center and the restaurant where we were having dinner, and I have to say: we were so pleasantly surprised! As soon as we walked into the hotel I noticed how pretty it was; the lobby was beautifully decorated for Christmas, and I could just tell it was a good choice. The staff was friendly and helpful, and we were even asked if we wanted a room on a higher floor (which we did!). We have never had a hotel with a great view, and here we got a PERFECT view of the Empire State Building. The room is small--which is pretty standard in NYC--but the bathroom actually was a nice size. Overall, great stay, would definitely book again!

title: Impressive hotel
text: Our room had a nice view and the mattress was very comfortable. The room was super clean and the carpet was new as well. We loved the coffee in the morning and water in the lobby. The hotel is close to everything

title: Lovely hotel and amazing staff
text: Thank you Yasir for your great accommodations and we loved our room. The room was spacious and  very clean. I had booked our room not noticing that I had a small room and we were 3 guests. I had explained it to Yasir and he was so amazing and made our stay memorable. I’d never forget that he went out of his way to accommodate us.

title: Excellent Experience
text: Excellent experience at Hotel Le Soleil, perfect location, close to all Midtown attractions. I appreciated the hotel services. The room was really good and clean.The staff was friendly, helpful and efficient. I recommend it.

title: Great location and service
text: I have stayed twice, excellent front desk, door man and concierge services. Clean rooms. The location in midtown is ideal to walk anywhere, close to Macy's, Times Square and lots of restaurants. The rooms are spacious and well supplied.

title: Exceptional Front Desk
text: Service was exceptional especially from the front desk team, namely Yadira Eranny who went above and beyond. She quickly addressed any questions or issues, resolving them immediately all with a smile and warm demeanor. Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: A rare gem in NY City
text: This place was Amazing! Close to everything, parking was convenient, good restaurants just steps away, impeccable accommodations! 5 stars from us! Would highly recommend and definitely stay here the next time we’re in the city!

title: Hotel is clean
text: Our room was very comfortable and the mattresses in our room was brand new. We paid a lot of money and that’s what rates are in the city and it was worth every dollar. I was impressed with the staff, the cleanliness and the size was ok too.

title: Thank you Yasir for your great service
text: I can’t write enough about this hotel and Yasir who was incredibly amazing. The hotel and the rooms were very clean. We had a minor issue and we ran into Yasir on our floor. We told him our concern and the next thing everything was like a magic. We were staying for 6 nights and the issue we had was not getting serviced. He checked everyday with us to make sure we are having a pleasant stay. I do recommend this hotel to others without any doubt.

title: Wonderful accommodation
text: Loved the hotel. It was small, quite and clean hotel. Staff were friendly and they were very nice to recommend few places in area. Coffee tastes amazing in the morning and we will be back to this hotel

title: Worth staying in this hotel in the city
text: We had a great stay and enjoyed every minute. The hotel is beautiful and nice Christmas setup. I love the tree and the fireplace. The hotel rooms are very clean and meet your needs. We will definitely be back in the future

title: NYC
text: Average hotel. Good location just off 5th Avenue. Poor ‘can’t be bothered to help’ reception desk experience. Being told to look things up online is not front facing customer experience I would expect.

title: Great stay!
text:
Just stayed at the hotel the past few days with our toddler. The staff were so accommodating! I needed a freezer for the breast milk and a microwave, and they delivered! Special thanks to Nicole and the rest of the staff. 

The baby slept in a crib in the living area - worked out perfectly. We were in front of the elevator and it was not noisy or loud at all. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. Even had a view to the Empire State Building!

Great stay and location. 

If arriving from JFK, I suggest the hotel recommendation: from the Airtrain, go to Jamaica Station and then use a Long Island Rail Road (LIRR) train that stops at Penn Station. So much easier and calmer (even faster) than the subway. 

Thanks again!

title: Exquisite hotel
text: We had come for our anniversary and we made a great choice of hotel. Staff were nice and we received cleaning service without request which was extremely nice. The rooms were clean and we love the lobby decor

title: Extremely polite staff and wonderful hotel
text: Yasir was extremely polite and very professional. We had trouble booking our rooms from third party but when we called the hotel we spoke to him. He really took care of us and sometimes it’s not all about money it’s about how you take care of the people. We were very happy with him and the hotel.

title: Wonderful Experience
text: Basic rooms are on the smaller side but are very clean and amenities are up to date. Beds are comfortable and the rooms are relatively quiet. The staff are very kind and helpful. Location is walkable to many attractions. We will be returning.

title: Never had such a bad experience in a hotel
text: Terrible experience at Le Soleil. Selected room (Penthouse) was so noisy because of some noise on the roof that I had to move to a small room facing a wall. Although I was due to stay a whole week, the GM was not quite ready to accomodate me and he left me no other choice than leaving on the day after Thanksgiving and find myself another hotel.

title: Great hotel with excellent customer service
text: Hotel is located in a good location near Macy’s. Walking distance to many places. Rooms were decent sized. Employees were very nice. We were provided great customer service. We had two suites.Rooms were beautiful. No complaints.

title: 2 days in New York
text: Visited out home city. Did a bit of sightseeing and saw old friends. The hotel was very conveniently located, clean, quiet, very comfortable.  The room was small but convenient.  Perfect for the two days. Near public transportation but the area is also very walkable

title: Hotel stay
text: Enjoyed the stay. The room was a bit smaller than expected but very cozy. The staff was outstanding. The reservation was done using Booking.com. Meredith helps us with a breakfast issue that occurred when the reservation was made using the site.  Keron was exceptionally helpful and courteous. We will be definitely making another stay directly with the hotel not thru Booking.com.

title: Best hotel, best team
text: Mon hôtel préféré à Nyc, il est génial!  Le lit est très confortable, la vue est incroyable, l’emplacement est excellent. Un immense merci à Yadira Eranny pour l’incroyable gentillesse et professionnalisme. Je reviendrai dès mon prochain séjour à New York.

title: We will be back
text: Loved the coffee in the morning and not lots of places do it anymore. The hotel is cute and they have done a marvelous job on the Christmas decor. The hotel staff are very polite and very professional

title: Best for Macy's Parade
text: Was visiting NYC and Macy's Parade. This hotel has a perfect location, great staff, nice decor and overall perfect for a memorable trip! We were able to walk one block to Herald Square and watch my sons band rehearsal for Macy's in the middle of the night. Safe and secure location as well...

title: Great location!  Reasonable size
text:
Yadira and Errany at check in were very welcoming. arrived 9am and they stored our luggage. checked in later on they surprised us with bottle of Prosecco. Nice touch. Location of hotel close to herald square and near Bryant park. Central location. Room had a queen bed and a double sofa bed. What we like was that the sofa bed was in a different room almost. With 3 people in the room it was a good size for nyc. Would definitely stay here again. Room seemed updated, clean. On the
3rd day though our room
Didn’t get cleaned.  Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Pleasure family trip for Thanksgiving Day Parade.
text:
We were recommended to stay here by the Music tours and Festivals company. My son marched in the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade with their band called Macy's Great American Marching Band. This hotel was a great choice since it was in a terrific location just around the corner from Macy's Herald Square, the Empire State building, and walking distance to Times Square and all the Broadway plays. 

The hotel lobby had a warm and welcoming ambiance, with beautiful lights outside, and cucumber, lemon water that I drink everyday after spending a day out walking around. Warm friendly faces always greeted me when I came to the lobby. The hotel concierge was always helpful with tips and advice regarding touring New York. They also set up car shuttle rides to and from the airport and elsewhere.   Our room was always neat and clean with complimentary bottled water. Tashi delivered me a tasty bottle of wine for Thanksgiving Day! 

Next time we'll bring the whole family and stay here again!

Thanks again Executive Hotel LeSoleil. Our first time in New York was a memorable and fun experience thanks to your whole team!

title: Surpresa agradável! Valeu a pena!
text:
Foi uma das melhores estadias em NY. O ambiente e decoração do hall que é pequeno é do estilo bem aconchegante e agradavel e de bom gosto. Otima localização proximo a Times Square, Herald Square e metro. Como fizemos um deslocamento de trem fomos a estação a pé mesmo. excelente. Quanto ao quarto, dividido em 3 ambientes, tamanho excelente, fora dos padrões de NY. Para quem precisa de 2 ambientes é o ideal. Cama, banheiro, e decoração perfeitos, 2 TVs, além de mesa de trabalho o que para nós foi fundamental. Café da manhã no restaurante anexo, do tipo a la carte, padrão americano mesmo. E um detalhe super importante: Não tem cheiro de mofo no hotel mesmo sendo de carpete! O atendimento em geral foi ótimo e deixo aqui meus agradecimentos ao Sam que prontamente nos atendeu em pequenos imprevistos ocorridos. Quanto a diária, é o padrão NY para este tipo de hotel e certamente voltaremos na próxima visita. Recomendamos.

It was one of the best stays in NY. The atmosphere and decoration of the hall, which is small, is very cozy and pleasant and in good taste. Great location close to Times Square, Herald Square and subway. As we traveled by train, we went to the station on foot. great. As for the room, divided into 3 rooms, excellent size, out of NY standards. For those who need 2 environments, it's ideal. Perfect bed, bathroom, and decoration, 2 TVs, in addition to a work desk, which was essential for us. Breakfast at the attached restaurant, a la carte, American standard. And a super important detail: There is no musty smell in the hotel even though it is carpeted! The service in general was great and I leave here my thanks to Sam who promptly attended to small unforeseen occurrences. As for the daily rate, it is the NY standard for this type of hotel and we will certainly return on our next visit. We recommend.

title: We had fun stay
text: Wonderful hotel nicer staff and loved our stay. The hotel very beautiful and very clean. We had a nice room with beautiful view of the city. The fireplace and the lobby decor is beautifully set and we will be back

title: Friends in NYC
text: Was a good hotel, nothing fancy but clean and comfortable rooms. only issue we had was the first day the room was not cleaned during the day and they came only at 18.00 when it was time for us to rest after long hours of walking. Also used the hotel car to transport to JFK which was more expensive than a yellow cab but comfortable.

title: A good stay
text:
A helpful, nice and very welcoming staff. We had a nice and smooth check in. The rooms are clean and very comfortable. 
We stayed 1 night and would definitely stay again. Christmas decor was nicely set up and we loved the coffee in the morning

title: Great job Le Soleil
