text: Everyone is quick to judge and post bad things but give them a chance. I had stayed here 2 years ago and I wasn’t too excited. I had decided to come back and I was extremely impressed. Staff are very professional and friendly. The rooms are in better shape then before and keep it up.

title: Very professional staff level
text:
Hotel at good level as always and comfortable rooms. 
At the reception a very kind and active gentleman, Yasir helped me. While he was checking us in, he explained about the hotel facilities, hours of operation and about the restaurant.

title: Ideal location
text: I had a great experience at Le Soleil Hotel. Everyone was very friendly and the rooms are very clean. The locations is close to everything and we will definitely be back to the hotel. Thank you for being such a great hotel.

title: Yasir is amazing
text: Loved our stay. I couldn’t stay at the hotel and had to cancel last minute. We made the reservation through booking.com and was very complicated. I spoke to Yazir who was able to assist me with the reservation. I was extremely satisfied and a happy client.

title: AMAZING STAY
text: hotel is so beautiful had a great time, service was too notch and the room as well. Yasir was very professional and very polite to greet us and we received warm welcome each time. This was very different and very modern.

title: State alla larga!!
text: L’unica cosa bella di quest’hotel e’ la posizione, centrale, del resto, tutto pessimo!dalla colazione SOLO americana, tutto salato, la colazione era inclusa e invece una volta arrivati ti rilasciano un voucher di 25 dollari, sembrerebbe tanto, ma contando che un piatto loro vale 21 euro poi tocca spendere per caffe’ e succo d’arancia, queste cose vanno dette prima, se la colazione e’ inclusa non andrebbe sborsato un dollaro!!la camera la puliscono quando ne hanno voglia, per ben due volte in cinque giorni non l’hanno pulita.Nel frigo bar a malapena una bottiglietta d’acqua che non rimettono!assolutamente non all’altezza di un quattro stelle!mai piu’!!

title: Superb Stay At LeSoleil
text:
Upon entering the hotel I was greeted with a welcoming smile from the concierge. I was then greeted by two more smiles at the front desk, Meredith and Yadira, who took care of my current reservation and assured me my future stay in two weeks would be just as exceptional. My room was clean, had two bottles of water, and three pieces of chocolate all for me -- how did they know I'm a lover of chocolate and all things sweet?

The service throughout my stay was consistent. Smiles abound at LeSoleil and the entire staff is helpful. The neighboring restaurant Trademark is a great place to dine as well.

Upon checkout the smiles were still present and welcoming. Meredith and Yadira were there to check me out and once again assured me that my upcoming reservation in two weeks would be just as great. 

While outside waiting on my Uber I felt like Johnny Gill, MY, MY, MY...MY,MY, MY, MY...I sure had a good time and I'm looking forward to my return in two weeks.

title: Customer service was top notch
text: Super friendly staff and check in was smooth and I was given a very lovely room on the higher floor. My room wasn’t clean one day and I was upset so I asked to speak to a manager and Yasir was very polite and very apologetic. I didn’t have any issues once I pass my concerns.

title: Great value
text: Thanks specially to Yasir who gave me a warm welcome and a room upgrade. Excellent hotel room hit clean rooms and super friendly staff. The bed are very comfortable and have a nice view. We will definitely be back and we will make sure to let our friends and family know about Le Soleil.

title: Some location
text: Rooms are small but you don’t travel to New York to stay in your room. The hotels really nice and very attractive. Rooms were clean and bathroom was a good size and water pressure was good. I would definitely stay again

title: Just ok
text: Could be better, rooms and lobby are very old. place looks like it belongs in the 70s or 80s. Carpets were old and stained. Spent the night with my wife for our anniversary and was disappointed in the price we paid. Restaurant was good hotel was expensive and not worth it.

title: This hotel looks like a 5 stars hotel
text: We had stayed here few times before and we will keep coming back. We appreciate all the attention, service and accommodations. The hotel has super friendly staff and during our stay we met Yasir. Yasir was extremely accommodating. We had received a bottle of red wine and hand written note wishing us a happy anniversary from him.

title: Fabulous experience
text: Le Soleil was incredibly awesome. The room was terrific with spectacular view with great location. The staff were super helpful and profession. We will definitely be back and we will see you soon thanks again

title: Perfect for me and my husband
text: When we booked our reservation I didn’t realize that I had book a standard room which was extremely small for us. When we arrived we were welcomed and were given keys to our room. When we checked in we were not to happy but it wasn’t hotel fault. We wanted to move our rooms and the hotel was sold out. Since it was our mistake and I wasn’t happy at all I asked to speak to a Manager, and Yasir was able to accommodate our request. I was very impressed with his professionalism and his hospitality. We will be back and we will make sure to book a right room until next time.

title: A great hotel to stay at
text: Great location close to Empire State Building, Penn Station and Macy’s. Hotel has a real homely feel to it. Very cosy and quiet. Not aware of any outside noise. The rooms are immaculate and vey comfortable. We had a Queen Suite room which gives a bit of extra space. Staff are very welcoming and are always checking that everything is OK or is there anything you need. We particularly found Jaime to be very helpful. If you want directions or recommendations then he is the guy to go to. He also takes care of your luggage and anything else you need help with. Hotel is a bit more expensive than some other hotels but it is worth every penny!

title: Wedding
text: Such attention to details. Great professional service. Extremely courteous. Had a spectacular time.our time spent there was fantastic and I would recommend this hotel. Thank you to the wonderful lady that made this so wonderful

title: Disappointing experience.
text: The carpet in our room was stained, the staff were unhelpful when we told them about this and asked to move. Multiple texts and emails asked about our experience during our stay but no one responded, the room and bed were small and the concierge lied to us when we asked about transport back to JFK. I did not feel welcome.

title: Whoa amazing place
text: We loved the choice of hotel we booked. This is the best hotel choice so far that we were impressed by everything. Ambiance of this hotel just speaks out, the hotel is a beaut. They have nice decor with Christmas lighting I think this hotel really care of their guests

title: Not as good as expected looked better on web site
text:
Hotel is well located  just on 5th av
But not very clean. Crpet in room was dirty with lot of staines and broken towel rail in bathroom
We told hotel staff who were not interested and would not allow us to swtich rooms

title: Amazing customer service
text: I came to visit nyc and I want to say how friendly the front desk was especially Yadira and Eranny these ladies treated me so nice and helped me get my transportation to the airport since I couldn’t understand the method.  They went over and beyond assisting in everything. Because of how they treated me I will return because the best thing is to receive excellent customer service. Thank you both so so much …. Cheers!!!!

title: Definitely recommend the hotel
text: We needed a hotel just because we were traveling to Canada and we needed a place to crash. We didn’t know that we will book such a nice hotel. The hotel seems very clean and the room as well. We will definitely come come for a special occasion

title: Top notch Hotel
text: Hotel seems very small from the outside but man it’s gorgeous from the inside. The staff are welcoming. I loved the Christmas decor and love the coffee in the morning. The lobby smells really nice. The gym is 24 hours and not bad for the hotel gym.

title: Location, Yasir and his staff were marvelous
text: Let me begin with Yasir and his staff. We came to enjoy our anniversary and I tell you was most amazing hotel we had ever stayed. Yasir Eranny and Yadira made our stay memorable. I’ll never forget our stay.

title: Clean and best hotel
text: The staff of the hotel were lovely and helpful. Everything was excellent. We were staying for 5 nights and each day our stay was enjoyable. We didn’t get our room cleaned one day and we spoke to Mr. Raza and he made sure we get house keeping service.

title: Wonderful stay
text: It was a wonderful stay. We loved the hotel and everyone in staff were wonderful. We will be back and the hotel itself were very clean. We loved the breakfast in the trademark and dinner was okay. The NYC is beautiful

title: Horrible Hotel
text:
First trip to NY City and wont be the last, but we for sure wont be staying here again. Bad customer service,SMALL rooms ( we even had a seluxe King room ) and there wasnt even enough room for us and our 2 large suitcases.
Front desk help was dismissive of our needs and the Concerge was NEVER around.
My advise do not waste your money on stsying here.

title: Molto hotel
text: I’d like to shout out Yasir and his great team. Everything from check in to check out was smooth. The room was clean and very spacious. I had a package request prior to my arrival to the hotel and it was out in the room. I want to write a lot more about how great everyone was at this hotel

title: Yasir was THE BEST
text: We get to travel a lot for work and leisure. We saw this hotel and looked very pretty. This hotel is just not nice but even the staff are amazing. I lost my bags during my flight and I was extremely upset with the airline. When I was checking in, Yasir was so helpful, he offered a bottle of water, toiletries and he even provided me a list of restaurants.

title: Pretty hotel and nice staff
text: Our room was very cozy and clean. The mattresses seemed like very new. The restaurant breakfast was excellent and we all ate very much. I don’t like heights and I was given room on the ground floor. We will be back

title: Best!
text: The staff was very helpful and lovely. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family. The loaction of the hotel is very close to everything. It was easy for us to navigate NYC because of the hotels location. Everything was excellent! Thank you!

title: Truly The BEST IN EVERY WAY!
text: I run a program that holds an annual four day meeting at Hotel Le Soleil New York.  We've run the program twice now, and I can truly say that Hotel Le Soleil is the absolute best hotel and venue in NYC! The staff is warm and friendly, the managers, Louis and Sam, are ready to meet your needs with a smile.  The hotel is gorgeous, sparking clean, comfortable and in the BEST location.  My participants LOVED the hotel and told me over and over again, what a great choice it was.  I am already going to book for next year, and I would never consider going anywhere else.  Hotel Le Soleil goes above and beyond and is truly a special place to stay.  There is just something really special about this hotel.  I'm grateful that we found it!

title: Tashi is the best!
text:
Tashi was very helpful during my stay at Le Soleil, he went above and beyond by bringing me plates when I asked for a mini microwave in my room.

He made the stay memorable along with the rest of the team.

title: Yasser and his staff were top notch
text: We had called from India in advance to make reservations with Yasser. He was polite and very professional. He made our reservation for since we had some trouble with 3rd party reservations. When we came to the hotel we met him and as he seemed so nice over the phone he was as polite, smile on his face and professional in person. His staff were also very nice as well.

title: Awesome hotel
text: We had come in early but we knew it was way to early to check in to the hotel. Hotel staff were very nice to us and they were able to accommodate us with early check in. The was so nice and check out was smooth as well.

title: Beautiful experience!
text:
This place is absolutely AMAZING!!! It is beautiful, clean, spacious and it smells Great!
The most impressive piece of this experience is the EXCELLENT team!  The team here breathes a positive life into this building.  They are genuinely kind and caring, they embody hospitality.  With all of that said one team member shines like no other, his name is Andre!  Andre is a rare talent in the hospitality industry he could set the current trends and standards of customer satisfaction performance.  Andre you will go far in Life I just know it… you should have your own hotel in the future!  And thanks to solid leadership from the manager Sam.  It is obvious that Sam has a quiet and confident approach to his team and his responsibilities.  Thank you for this wonderful experience.  I Love NYC!

title: Awesomeness!
text: What a gem. Intimate, extremely friendly staff, great location. Our 2 bedroom suite was clean, comfortable and would absolutely book again. Easy walk to key places in Midtown, Moynihan Train Station. The adjoining Tradewind restaurant was top notch, delicious food and excellent service. From a world traveler I highly recommend.

title: Good location and a very clean hotel
text: We celebrated my husband’s birthday. The hotel is great and we loved the locations. The rooms are spacious and the hallways are so cute. The hotel is Christmas decor already and it was so lively. We loved everything about the hotel.

title: Fantastic Le Soleil
text: We had booked a room not knowing that it was small. It was our fault because we thought we booked a room with a sofa bed. I was not happy and plus hotel is sold out. I had asked to speak to the manager and Mr. Raza worked his magic and got me into what we wanted. He was very generous, kind and professional. We were very happy

title: Loved it
text: Hotel is very nice and clean. Check in was smooth and Yasir was really polite. We asked him for extra bottles of water and few other things and it was all in the room wash day we stayed. He knew how to take care of the hotel guests.

title: Disappointing small details
text: Room did not look like the pictures it had suffered some wear and tear since pics taken and it made the room look alot bigger. Housekeeping was the biggest let down as they come so late in the day or not at all and it had to be requested - the room was dusty and never cleaned only bed made and extra towels were provided. We upgraded to a suite because we wanted a seperate area to relax and watch tv however the way the sofa was appointed was facing the door and the tv on the side of the wall it was wasted space as couldn’t use it - when booking it said there were luxury toiletries and pics showed different furnishings including alarm clock etc but this wasn’t the case when we got there. The location was good and the staff were friendly but the giant Xmas tree and Xmas music was really off putting for the start of November

title: Muy recomendable.
text:
El hotel es un 10, bien ubicado, cómodo, instalaciones nuevas, el personal amable y profesional, tienen atenciones con los huéspedes que marcan la diferencia con otros hoteles.
Pudimos hacer el check in antes del horario establecido, y como no tenían la habitación que contratamos limpia para que no esperemos nos dieron un upgrade.

title: Beware!!!!
text:
Pros- Great Hotel with a really caring front desk staff. Thank you Yadira and Eranny for your hospitality. Room with a view had a great view of the empire state building. Trademark is a hidden gem tucked inside this hotel! Rooms are well appointed with complimentary water daily. 

Cons-Beware of sketchy management team. Tall aggressive hotel manager would not leave  guests alone unless we mentioned him on reviews.  He even bribed a guest with a complimentary late check out if they would mention him solely on tripadvisor! reviews should be something someone wants to willing do and not be forced to write a review. This could have easily been a 4 to 5 star review if it wasn’t for the numerous pushy front office managers.

title: Hôtel très propre et parfaitement situé
text:
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l’emplacement de l’hôtel.
La personne de la conciergerie qui s’est occupé de nos valises on a été très compétent et très sympa
Nous avions le petit déjeuner inclus, mais en fait, les chaque matin lequel me donne un bon de 50 $ pour déjeuner
Ça paraît beaucoup mais c’est tellement cher que finalement tous les matins nous devions mettre de notre poche

title: Amazing stay
text: My friend and I were so relieved to learn that Executive Hotel Le Soleil had availability when we experienced a nightmare first night stay at a nearby (unaffiliated/competitor) hotel. The staff was extremely accommodating and kind as we booked our last-minute stays and transferred from our first hotel. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and bright, and the bathrooms were spacious. Le Soleil will be my first-choice midtown stay from now on and I regret not booking with them initially! I stayed back in 2016 and that experience was just as pleasant.

title: Amazing customer service
text:
Gracias Yadira y Eranny, por su  amabilidad, el Hoyel es excelente. 
Esta muy bien ubicado…thank you very much for everything. The hotel all  around was amazing. Location to all Stores good. They have the hotel decorated very nice for christmas Also………. I will return back next year………………………..

title: Just okay
text:
The room was advertised as a view of the Empire State Building.   Our view was a dark brick building.  The location is great and the staff was helpful.  
Not sure I would stay here again.  A bit pricey for what you get.

title: Boutique hotel New York
text: Nice hotel good position helpful staff rooms however very small we were not in a basic room but one up from that would not have liked to see the size of basic room. Easy walking distance of most attractions

title: Wedding Night
text:
Came to the hotel with the intention of going into my already book room at 1AM. Andre, at the front desk saw that my wife and I had just gotten married, out of his kindness and hospitality, he changed our room to penthouse room for the newly married couple. Room was flawlessly clean, the main entrance is spotless and service was impeccable. Highly recommend this hotel.

—Mohamed A.

title: Welcoming and Relaxing stay
text: We had a wonderful time at Le Soleil, the staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating. The lobby was beautiful and welcoming with great space to work towards the back. The restaurant attached to the hotel had great food and a nice atmosphere. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great location however staff could be more friendly
text: Location great within walking distance of a lot of site seeing nice restaurants around it room very nice hotel cosy. Only complaint which is a big one is that front desk staff not friendly at all at check in

title: New York Trip
text: We had an amazing stay at the Executive Hotel Le Soleil, everything was perfect from start to finish. Staff are very kind and efficient, especially Yaya! The rooms are clean and the location of the hotel is central to all the sights of NY while also being on a quieter street. 100% recommend ...!!!

title: Great location, but otherwise avoid
text:
Travelling with a teenage son, staying in a small queen suite on 2nd floor. Welcomed by a very uninterested receptionist. Room was a decent size by NYC standards. I was told the sofa bed was made up, but there were no pillows and only a very thin cover. Only one robe for 2 people. Shampoo not replenished. Water fountain near reception days old.  My biggest complaint was the repair of the ice-machine directly outside my room at 6:45am for 2 consecutive mornings.
When I mentioned these points no contact or effort made to fix them, except the one bathrobe was removed! Would not stay again.

title: Great place to stay in NYC!
text: Great friendly staff! Room was larger than expected and easily accommodated three adults. Very clean. Room for all our suitcases. Bathroom was very nice with a large walk-in shower. We all enjoyed our stay! Staff were very helpful and kind!

title: Ok hotel, good location, lacks warmth when it comes to customer service
text: The location is very good, the hotel itself is fine, but our experience of staying there was not ideal. Missing pillows, lack of soap, thin blankets, ice machine repairs right outside the door at 6.30am, some abrupt staff.... nothing major but enough to make it one to avoid on future visits to NY.

title: My kids loved the hotel
text: We have 3 kids and we often come to New York City to spend some quality time and they love the city. This was our first time staying at this hotel and we all love it. My youngest daughter got a bag of toys from a nice gentleman at the desk. The room was nice and clean

title: Excelente hotel, pésimo desayuno
text: El hotel es perfecto, la habitación y sus vistas, la limpieza, la amabilidad del personal, todo perfecto salvo por el desayuno, realmente pocas opciones, no era buffet sino a la carta por el valor del voucher, con muy poca variedad, y mala atención

title: We have found our NY hotel
text:
Greeting from Australia. We loved loved our stay and wanted to send you a quick message to say thank you for all your assistance during our stay and to compliment you on such a great hotel. We have nothing but praise for you and your staff. In fact my partner Rebecca commented today, " I would stay there again just because of Yasir and how friendly and helpful he was".
We look forward to our next trip to New York, and will have no hesitations on where to stay.

title: Quite, clean hotel and top notch service
text: We booked our room a while ago but never ever stayed here. I’m glad we made that decision because everything from check in to check out went smooth. We had unpleasant experience with a yellow cab driver and I was very unhappy. We were sitting down in the lobby, and Yasir came over to introduce himself and asked “if there’s something we could do to make your stay pleasant please let me know”. Mind though, it wasn’t any hotel fault they were just being very nice wiht us.  He brought us couple of bottles of water and made us dinner reservations at keens steakhouse. We were very pleased by his service and they we he handled our misunderstand about the cab driver.

title: Great experience
text: We had a lovely room since we had requested a higher floor. Yasir was fantastic and he was very easy to deal with. We needed help to be connected to wifi and he showed us what steps to take for future reference. The restaurant was also amazing and we loved the food.

title: Great customer service
text: Very pleasant front of house staff-really helpful. Room a bit small but it was only a base so okay as the location was perfect, right in the middle so easy to walk around viewing the sights and the nyc experience

title: Fine Friendly Service, Great Location
text: We had never heard of Executive Hotel Le Soleil until booking it for one brief trip to NYC.  We were so glad we did!  The check-in and bellman were so friendly and informative.  Our room was not too small (by NYC standards), clean and clever design.  Not ideal that our view was an air-shaft but at least it was quiet!  Location is so great for theater, 5th Avenue, Penn Station for trains.

title: Small but nice ...
text: Perfect location in the City for Empire State Building, Macy's, TImes Square and BROADWAY.  We usually take Uber or Lyft vs. Taxi.  Taxies can often utilize one way streets to increase fare.  Trust only Uber and Lyft with New York License Plates that start with letter "T" & end with "C".  Shows licensed by the city.

title: Great Location, Clean, Friendly Staff
text: This hotel is extremely clean. The staff (front desk, doorman and housekeeping) are all extremely friendly and go above and beyond to help with any needs. I’ve stayed here many times with children, elderly parents and traveling alone and everyone has been pleased and have had a great time. This hotel is well worth your time.

title: LeSoleil did it again
text: We often come to New York to spend some away time from our city. Each time we had come gets better and better. We also met Mr. Raza who was extremely polite and very accommodating. The last time we stayed was in July of 2019 but had a bit of a hiccup and we were going to stay elsewhere. I thought I’d give another chance so I called the hotel and spoke to Mr. Raza. He was very professional, accommodating and he apologized for our past experience. We came to the hotel and we were extremely pleased with his hospitality.

title: Stayed once before but this time was was incredible
text: We loved everything about the hotel. Staff are very accommodating and especially Yasir who went above and beyond to accommodate my family. My daughter received a nice bag of toys from him and we had some extra chocolate. We had asked him for few toiletries during our stay he was on top of our requests. Overall, we had a great stay. We stayed once before here but this time I was very pleased with the service I received.

title: Beautiful hotel! Outstanding hospitality!!
text: We love this place and cannot wait to return! In addition to the beautiful room, central location, and many comfortable amenities,  the staff and hospitality are just stellar! We met Yodira at the front desk and from the first moment she set the tone for the whole visit: warmth, care, attention to detail and an eagerness to make the visit a special occasion. Bravo! Job well done!! We will absolutely be returning!

title: What a wonderful hotel
text: We had arrived early on Sunday and I know the hotels gets really busy but we had waited a bit. I had noticed that Mr. Raza saw us sitting in the lobby and he asked us if we were waiting on a room. He personally worked with housekeeping to get our room ready. We just didn’t check in early we also had a very nice room. I was extremely impressed.

title: NYC Weekend Getaway
text: The staff, from the bellhop, front desk receptionists, and restaurant are all friendly and very helpful. Special shout out to Errany and Yadira for going above and beyond! We arrived on a Sunday and the Concierge wasn’t there so Errany and Yadira made sure we were able to see all the places we wanted to see and even grouped them together so we can save time traveling between places. And not only the staff is wonderful, the location is perfect!

title: Little attention
text: My boyfriend gave me a surprise trip to Manhattan and everything was great.  The staff at the front desk was welcoming, the room was clean and smelled fresh. We did have a minor issue with the temperature. A bearded technician came and set our temperature and played with the thermostat but it was not changing or cooling. He said he would return, but never did.  While he tried helping us all he did was speak  about himself. After not being able to fix the problem he left saying he would be back,  but never returned OR checked up on us.  Later on after calling the front  desk asking if he was returning, a tall man with glasses came by and actually took care of us.  He changed the thermostat, got the temperature to were we would be comfortable and apologized for the first guy not returning like he said he would.  I was happy that at least he was serious about his job. This was the only hick up in an otherwise great stay. We will be returning and hopefully we'll get the same service and attention we received from the staff, minus the one inattentive technician.

title: Super
text: Wonderful hotel with very helpful and friendly personnel (Yadira & Evanny & colleagues thank you!). Super location close to 5th ave, a wonderful breakfast & lunch shop/diner on the corner and another- Toast - just around the corner and a bus stop practically on your doorstep.

title: Great Hotel
text: First time in New York and couldn’t have chose a better Hotel, Location was excellent, room was big and spotless and cleaned on a daily basis, and the staff was really attentive, and after to speaking to other guests found they were of the same opinion as myself. Well done to everyone at The Executive  Le Soleil Hotel

title: Fabulous hotel
text: Fantastic hotel and fabulous location,  loved every minute of our stay, staff very friendly.  Room very spacious would highly recommend and will definitely return to this hotel when back in New York.

title: Simply the best
text: We had a wonderful stay at this awesome hotel.  Clean, safe. Reasonable and centrally located. The staff was so kind and helpful.  Just an amazing few days in the city at this perfect oasis. Recommend it in every way.

title: Le Soleil - great place to be!
text: Beautiful place with excellent service, highly recommended! We´ve been there for our honeymoon stay and everything was perfect, from booking to check-out we met only professional attitude and very nice persons. Thank you Le Soleil to make our stay unforgettable!

title: Great Location, Lovely Hotel
text:
Hotel Le Soleil was a perfect spot for our mini vacation. The rooms were well appointed and modern. The staff was friendly and accommodating. We were late in arriving in New York but the hotel staff waited for us so we would be greeted appropriately and welcomed to the hotel. 
The complimentary water and coffee in the lobby were welcomed.

title: Quiet Midtown Hotel
text: I stayed in a room with a pull out sofa and Queen bed that faced another building.  There was no view but there was also no sounds from the street.  It was very nice for sleeping.  The bathroom was well appointed, the pull out sofa was comfortable and private from the other bed.  There were two tv's which was a nice touch and there was a fridge in the room.  This is not a trendy hotel but everyone I dealt with was very friendly and there were no disappointments.  I would stay here again.

title: Front Desk Staff really do make a difference !
text: I stay in the city often and this hotel works well for me. Location is close to my office, room size is good, lounge area is quiet and relaxing, and the best front desk staff ever. Yadira really stands out and makes me want to return to this hotel. Her positive ways, guidance and attention to making a guest feel so welcomed is amazing!

title: Birthday celebration
text: It was a weekend get away from PA to NY to celebrate my birthday. We were given a very nice room, it was clean, quite and spacious. The hot coco was delicious and much needed on one our cold nights ..

title: Great place!
text:
What a perfect little hotel! Close to the subway, such a convenient spot to tour New York City!
I was doing a father daughter trip with my 22-year-old daughter and Yadira was so welcoming and helped us with an easy check in process, After a long day of traveling!

title: Enjoyable stay with Hotel LeSoleil
text: We had requested an early check in because we were flying from California and you know how that is. When I arrived Yasir was so accommodating he checked us in early and gave a bag of toys to my daughter. I recommend this hotel.

title: Outstanding service
text: Hotel rooms are very comfy and we had great sleep at night. Quite room and you don’t hear anything not ever elevators. Yasir had recommended nice restaurant and he was very kind and professional. We will be back

title: Great-ish!
text:
First and foremost this hotel is ideally located and the staff is EXCELLENT.  Customer service is a top priority here and it shows.  I do a lot of business travel and I can tell you that the staff here is top of the top.  Doorman and Concierge were amazing and extremely detailed, friendly and on point.  Desk staff were welcoming, efficient and maintained security and privacy on each interaction.  Front desk answered the phone on on first ring and attended to all requests immediately.  A lot of great little restaurants and bars are along this street so it's easy to grab a bite or a drink 'close to home' if needed.
 
Now for the 'ish-iness".  Our stay was a family vacation weekend with my spouse and two tweeny daughters.  We booked an Executive Suite with a queen bed and sofa sleeper.  This is really just one room, there is no door separating the 'living space' from the bedroom.  But it's New York for god sake, so that's fine.  The bathroom had a pocket door that was off the track so getting it opened and closed took some work, so luckily we are no the type of family that needs too much privacy.
The biggest issue was the lighting.  Somehow there were three wall switches, but it was impossible to have one room light and one room dark.  So we just kept them all on and used the actual light switches on the lamps to turn off and on.  The 'living room' lighting is wall hung sconces so getting the kid's lights off or on required crawling onto the sofabed.
On our first night we realized the can light at the door did not have a switch to turn it off and this was in the 'living room' where the kids were sleeping. We called the front desk and they sent an maintenance guy at midnight to actually take the light OUT OF THE CEILING.  So that was the fix.  Staff and maintenance were great...but REALLY?  You have a light in a hotel room that cannot be turned off?  

Anyway, that was it.  We loved our trip and the hotel was otherwise super lovely.  Lots of families staying there, but the room was so well sound insulated, we didn't hear a peep from anyone else or the street, which is saying a lot.  
Fitness room was clean and had plenty of equipment, towels and water.  Hotel restaurant and bar was great, but closed on Sunday which is a big ?????????
I'd like to give 4 1/2 stars but having to choose I went with 4.  You won't be disappointed here.

title: Great location and staff
text:
Great hotel and amazing staff, special shout out to Kevin the concierge for his help in getting to the airport on time.

Rooms are comfortable, and it’s a very convenient location. Just remember to get your breakfast vouchers if your room rate is breakfast included.

title: Morning coffee was very satisfying
text: Hotel coffee is the 1st thing I’d say is amazing. The hotel itself is clean, pretty updated with decor and the rooms are worth it. I had stayed maybe 3 years ago but the hotel is way much better than before.

title: Definitely coming back
text: We loved our room. The mattress and the pillows were very comfortable during our stay. Our kids loved the hotel and they loved Yasir because he brought them toys to our room. He was such a nice guy, my family loved him. We definitely recommend this hotel. Everyone is so nice

title: Loved it
text: It was a great stay and we loved everything. Yasir was amazing at check in and throughout over stay he was very accommodating. The room was very clean and spicy. We had received the room as Yasir described.

title: A Midtown Gem
text:
I can't say enough about the staff at Le Soleil. Samrat, Meredith, and Keeron all worked so hard to make our recent stay comfortable and memorable. We'd booked eight rooms for family and friends visiting from near and far for our son's wedding. Everyone at the hotel went out of their way to ensure that we were comfortable and  had everything we needed, even to the point of going out and purchasing coat racks so we'd have more hanging space for our multiple wedding-related outfits.

The hotel itself is chic, charming, and comfortable, in a great location just a few blocks from Bryant Park. For anyone looking for a reasonably priced, home away from home in the heart of NYC, you've found it at Le Soleil.

title: Professional facility
text: What could be more perfect if everything is worth each penny. We definitely loved our stay and couldn’t pick anything to say wrong about this hotel. The staff were all very nice and they’ll smile at you from far away.

title: Enjoyable stay
text: We had trouble booking the reservation, called the hotel and we were all set. We arrived very late and there was someone at the desk. We loved the fruit water in the lobby. We also had coffee in the lobby which was free. The entire hotel was nice.

title: Birthday celebration
text: I’d like to say a special “Thank you” to Yasir Raza. We had a very nice note from him, a bottle of champagne and chocolates. We requested for a very nice room and higher room, we had a blast. This hotel is on our favorite list.

title: Comodamente nel cuore di New York!
text:
Superlativa posizione nel cuore di Manhattan, vicina a tutte le principali attrazioni; stanza confortevole, silenziosa e di ampia dimensione per lo standard di New York. Molto buon la colazione continentale, servita nel ristorante incluso nell'albergo: preciso che in base alla scelta della camera (Queen con vista su Empire state Bulding) ci veniva corrisposto giornalmente un voucher di 50$. In base al menù scelto alla carte, l'eventuale sovrapprezzo dei piatti si paga a parte. I costi sono nel complesso mediamente alti, quindi in coppia, con la cifra corrisposta, si riesce a consumare, ad esempio, un toast all'avocado con uova in camicia e una spremuta d'arancia. Eventuale caffè lo paghi a parte, ma lo sconsiglio, è quello americano. Poco distante trovate pasticcerie o locali dove servono caffè Illy o Lavazza. Sinceramente ho trovato il personale della reception non particolarmente accogliente: all'atto dell'arrivo neppure un saluto di benvenuto, nessuna spiegazione (d'iniziativa) sui servizi disponibili e sugli orari dei vari servizi, del genere Don't ask, don't say. E quando poi sei "costretto a chiedere" la risposta è sbrigativa, alzando a malapena lo sguardo dal PC (Se malauguratamente non si ha una più che buona conoscenza dell'american english...
...beh, provate a farvelo spiegare
nuovamente). Questo, in un contesto comunque elegante e di gusto, oggettivamente rilevabile, lo trovo una nota stonata.
9,0
Fine
Vuoi scrivere una recensione che sia davvero utile? Leggi le relative linee guida, troverai i nostri consigli.
Inoltrando il mio giudizio accetto questi termini e condizioni.

title: We loved the hotel
text: The hotel lobby has such a nice decor and cute. Everyone was so happy I mean the staff. I had a quite and view room. At night the view was breath taking. It was our first time booking at this hotel and we recommend this hotel

title: Customer service was outstanding
text: We loved our stay and the hotel staff are amazing. I needed help with late few times and they were all very helpful. There was a tall gentleman, I don’t recal his name maybe Yafer but he was extremely helpful

title: Executive Hotel Le Soleil New York  - overall good one
text: its really a boutique hotel with good access to the main touristic events. We mostly were able to go on foot to go to our events or - if needed - the public transport modes were literally around the corner. We opted for an additional breakfast package and we were not disappointed on the the food. There are some minor sloppy service in their basic room amenities but hopefully they will learn from it and improve it for next time. Would recommend it.

title: Service of this hotel is top notch
text: We love doing parties and New York City is our heart. There a lot of nice restaurants and bars in the area. Keens steakhouse was phenomenal. The hotel has free coffee in the morning and the coffee is freshly brewed.

title: Gorgeous boutique hotel
text: I didn’t know this was a Canadian hotel. We had to pick this hotel last minute and it was our excellent choice. We requested a late checkout and Yazir helped us with luggage and late checkout. We were very pleased with the hotel.

title: Enjoyed every moment
text: Everything was fast from check in to checking out. The room was spacious I think but very clean. Yasir gave my son a gift of toys. He was a trooper because he saw my son crying loudly and presented toys to him. Thanks Yasir

title: I was very happy with Yassir’s hospitality
text: I reached out to the hotel since I was having trouble from travel agency but calling the hotel was my amazing choice. I spoke to Yassir and I had booked the room with him directly and he was a sweetheart. When we checked in everything was in order and I met him in person. He was a kind gentleman

title: Midtown hotel
text: We had stayed at this property before pandemic but wow the hotel before and now is just what a big difference. All I’m trying to saying is hotel is much better now than before. The lobby smells good m. We will be back.

title: Great hotel
text: We keep to celebrate our anniversary and when we arrived we had a nice rooms arranged with personal card from Yasir. He went above and beyond to make us feel very special. We choose cold weather but it was all worth it

title: Empfehlenswert
text: Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral mit Blick auf das Empire State Building. Die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und mit täglichen Reinigungen. Ausserdem sind die Zimmer gut ausgestattet. Falls man mit mehreren Koffern anreist empfehle ich ein etwas grösseres Zimmer zu buchen, da der Platz etwas beschränkt ist jedoch für New York trotzdem ausreichend. Als allein Reisende Frau fühlte ich mich sehr wohl und ich wurde sehr freundlich bereits bei der Rezeption empfangen.  Das Personal ist freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Koffer wurden mir direkt nach Ankunft auf das Zimmer gebracht. Insbesondere möchte ich bei Hector für den Service und die Hilfsbereitschaft bedanken. Insgesamt ein wundervoller Aufenthalt in einem super Hotel. Sehr empfehlenswert.

title: Top tier in Midtown
text: Top tier in New York, well situated in midtown, 1 min walk to subway or 5 min walk to train in Penn Station. Great staff, top cleaning. Great concierges, in particular Juan. Top tips, nothing negative in this hotel, plus the gym is well equipped.

title: Great staff and perfect location
text: Cosy hotel in a perfect location. Great service - kudos to all the staff - from desk & room service, to waiters & bar men - all of them. I would like to highlight Andrew at the front desk who was extremely helpful when we had an issue with the room, made our dinner reservation, helped with our luggage and was just super friendly and supportive. Big kudos to full staff, thank you so much!

title: Great Overnight Stay
text: I was only in NYC for the night and had to drive in for an appointment. I stayed and really loved it. Easy check in and comfortable. Fantastic location. So great that I could pre-book parking too. Also very safe travelling alone as a woman.

title: Great location, amazing view and very quiet hotel in the heart of NYC
text: Amazing hotel room with the empire state as view from my hotel room (I chose the city view option, worth paying a couple of dollars more). Very clean and quiet room with everything you need for a nice rest after long days walking through the city. Staff very helpful and friendly. Nothing to complain except the breakfast experience. The restaurant room is not very cozy and the menu is limited to a couple of quite heavy-like brunch options. I don't think the food is bad, is just not my cup of tea. I always like a more continental-like breakfast

title: Best hotel ever!!
text:
During our stay, all the hotel staff were very kind to us, especially Yadira, Meredith and Eranny.  all very friendly and always with good predisposition.  The room is very nice, large and comfortable.  I definitely recommend the hotel.
María

title: Clean and welcoming midtown gem
text: Le Soleil was a lovely hotel well situated in midtown close to everything on the upper side of NYC with restaurants all around. The hotel was very welcoming from the door person to the front desk staff, everyone there to help and make your stay pleasant. The hotel was immaculate and clearly well-cared for. Even though the room was very small with little space for moment or luggage, it was clean, quiet and had a great view and bathroom with no issues with hot water availability. Would highly recommend Le Soleil NYC.

title: Superb Stay!
text: From the staff, room, concierge, all of the above, and everything in between my stay was five star! I even had a southward facing room with another building right outside of my window -- so not much to look at and yet I still had a great experience. For my next stay I will see if I can get a room facing 36th street.

title: Anniversary celebration
text: Came to the city to enjoy and celebrate our wedding anniversary. We had called in advanced to speak to a manager and Yasir was just fabulous. When we had arrived we had a very nice room with breathtaking view and a bottle of wine, box of chocolate and a personal note from him. Thank you for making us feel special on our special occasion

title: Thank you Mr. Raza
text: First of all, I want to say BIG THANK YOU to Mr. Raza. He was very accommodating to me and my family. We had ordered many many packages not knowing that we had to pay for it but speaking to Mr. Raza. He was very kind hearted and treated us like a family. Especially, my mother was very impressed by his professionalism.

title: EXCELENTE ELECCION DE HOTEL, UBICACION Y SERVICIO DEL PERSONAL.
text: La habitación fue totalmente completa, buen confort que es lo que se busca para vacacionar, la ubicación perfecta y el servicio del personal  fue excelente, desde mi llegada André, Sam, Yadira, gracias. La limpieza diaria y ordenada de Maria. Me sentí como en casa.

title: Excellent stay in midtown!
text: Lewis and his crew were awesome!   We got great recommendations, were able to check our bags with them and head out for the day. When we forgot some important items in the room they called us. A 5/5 experience by all accounts! Thanks again and we’ll see you soon!

title: Beautiful, convenient, and great value
text: Stayed 2 nights with my sons, was able to reserve (and receive - which hasn't always been my experience in NYC) double room. Very clean, great location, friendly staff and amazing value for the quality. Also great location, we came for a concert at Madison Square Garden which was short walk, short walk to Times Square as well. Got to do lots of sightseeing in 2 days and the subway was convenient to get back to hotel for when we were too tired to walk back.

title: Great Boutique Hotel
text: This hotel was just what we needed for a short business trip in the city. The room was cozy, but still felt luxurious. Meredith kindly answered all of our questions on the phone, prior to our check-in. All the front desk staff was so very nice and accomodating. They provided a microwave for our room and a couple of extra chocolates. These are the nice touches that made us feel like people, and made us feel welcomed. They accomodated my needs as a visually-impaired disabled person. The gym was fantastic. There are weights, treadmills, and a Peloton bike. Our suite was clean and cozy. We were on a business-related trip, but would stay here again as a quick getaway. It’s a good place to stay if you don’t mind walking to your destinations in the City. Although I do walk alot, I still think this hotel is in walking distance to everything. The lady who checked us out was also very nice and made sure our checkout was smooth. One last thing, the evening valet-person was kind enough to keep an eye on our car while we checked in.

title: Great location to the Empire State Building
text:
This hotel is located very close to the Empire State Building and is very close to many subway points. Our overall experience was mid range as we experienced a few issues with staff and housekeeping. The room itself was lovely with great views, the bed let the room down.
Overall we probably wouldn't stay here again but would recommend it for people who want to be near the main sightseeing areas.

title: Better Places to stay for the same price
text: The facility is dubbed modern but it's pretty aged. I requested a room away from the elevator but got one right next to it. The hotel was not attentive, and the room I received was not an executive room.

title: Great exprience
text: Best vacation in New York the hotel was great we want to mention the excellent service from the front desk especially merdith , Simon and yaya thanks for all the help to make our vacation great breakfast is recommended we are defiantly choosing executive le soliel for the next trip in New York

title: Kindest Reservation Agent @ Executive Hotel Le Soleil NY
text: Just wanted to let everyone know that ive just had the kindest reservation agent helping me bookin a 10 day stay in this hotel. Thanx to Yadira Aviles | Reservation Agent / Executive Hotel Le Soleil, New York

title: Thank you Le Soleil
text:
We were very happy with our stay… specially because of the excellent service and the fantastic location of this hotel…The staff are extremely pleasant and helpful in all categories of services, reception, housekeeping etc…
We dealt with the following staff and all were super friendly and nice:
Tashi 
Eranny 
Meredith
Yadira
Luis
Thank you for our great experience 🌹

title: Thank you Le Soleil
text:
A perfect smile ..a generous service .. friendly atmosphere .. a special thanks to the reception staff namely Luis Erranys Meredith and Yadira .. you were radiant like Le Soleil 
Highly recommended hotel 
From room 407 - Aug,29 - Sept. 8

title: guest review
text:
Would recommend this hotel based upon the supportive staff and their efforts to ensure all needs are met. 
The facilities were clean, the staff was exceptional, and the location was convenient for a quick night out.

title: Hotel and the restaurant are fantastic
text: The service I received in the hotel is not less than luxurious brands. The rooms are small but meet the needs of your purpose. The food in the Trademark is delicious but the staff were relatively new there.

title: Hotel staff are nice
text: Hotel staff are very friendly and very polite. The hotel is clean and the rooms are very nice. The beds are very comfortable and the milk chocolate in the room are delicimo. We will be back and thank you for you hospitality

title: Yasir was Super
text: We are everyday travelers but I was extremely impressed by the management of this hotel. I have reached out to Yasir before our stay and he was prompted with is responses. We needed our Amazon packages to be delivered prior to us and everything was in order when we came in. Thank you very much Yasir

title: We loved our stay if it wasn’t for Yasir
text: Everything was very smooth until one day we couldn’t get to our room. Maintenance guy came in and he was helping us to get into the room and we were exhausted. I asked for the hotel manager and Mr. Yasir came to apologize in person. He was extremely nice and professional. He helped the maintenance guy to get us in quickly and not only that he check on us throughout our stay. How good is that!! We loved our stay.

title: Fabulous stay
text: Hotel is amazing and worth the money. We had a great stay and we will be back to this hotel. The phones are not working in the room and spoke the the manager Yasir. He was absolutely a gentleman and he apologized to us. I don’t blame him but he handle the situation very professionally.

title: Andre was a big help!
text: Great Hotel. Andre at the front desk helped make a chaotic situation into a seemingly smooth transition.  His customer service went above and beyond my expectations. Would definitely stay here another time. Thanks again, Andre

title: Bday weekend
text: Yadira & Eranny we’re super helpful and so kind!!  Will definitely be booking the same hotel next time! Very central to  everything.  Loved the flavoured water in the lobby!! Thanks so much for the great wknd!!

title: Een aanrader!
text: Dit hotel is echt een aanrader. Een goede centrale locatie, ruime kamer (308) voor 2 personen met aparte living zodat je ruimte hebt voor je bagage. Vriendelijk onthaal. Elke dag wordt de kamer gepoetst, de handdoeken vervangen (hoewel dat neit echt nodig was voor ons), koffie aangevuld en telkens 2 flesjes water en extra te verkrijgen aan de receptie. Bagage wordt ook kosteloos apart gehouden op je laatste dag. Het hotel heeft ook mogelijkheid tot ontbijt, lunch en diner. Maar in de buurt van het hotel zijn ook veel eetgelegenheden. De metro is 2 blokken verder, wat ook heel gemakkelijk is om je te verplaatsen. Kortom, het hotel is een aanrader.

title: Bom hotel
text:
Bom hotel.
Localização impecável. Atendimento cordial, staff solicito.
Quartos limpos e bem equipados, todo mobiliário e roupa de cama de qualidade.
Não é um hotel barato, mas vale o preco pra quem quiser ficar bem hospedado. Voltarei em breve.

title: I’ll be back!
text: After an exhausting day of travel, I checked in late in the evening & Andre & Sam made my stay at Hotel LeSoleil so welcoming & easy. The rooms where very clean & all the staff were amazing. Their service was amazing. I’ll definitely be back.

title: Sunshine at Le Soleil
text:
A wonderful welcome ! A Spécial and warm thank you to Andre and Sam !! The perfect reception team ! You rock Guys ! 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
Perfect location in the center of Manhattan ! Good restaurants and bars  in the street ! 
It’s a nice place and nice rooms. And the view from the room is really cool ! 
Thank you

title: Nice hotel, amazing location
text: We were 4 friends travelling together, staying in a suite with a sleeping couch. We arrived late thursday night, and the sleeping couch was broken at one of the ends. The next day Sam and Nicole helped us switch hotelroom, so we got moved up 6 floors and got a bigger room with a great view. Had an overall great experience. The location was also amazing, staff were nice and the suites had a good standard.

title: Yasir and Errany were amazing
text: We came from Ohio for 2 nights and we had a nice room wiht a view. We wanted to leave the room after check out time and Errany gave us a late checkout. There wasn’t any bell staff so Yasir had helped me take my bags from the room and put them in my car. Good hotel

title: Impressed and satisfied 100%
text: I have been going back and forth with Mr. Yasir Raza. He’s very active on responding back his emails and calls. I have asked him a nice room and few other items to be placed before we come to the hotel and everything was as expected. Very well done Mr.Raza

title: Service and the hotel is amazing
text: Top notch service was given by Mr. Raza. Check in was smooth. The hotel itself is a beaut and close to everything. We had took train which was fun and then we walked most of the times. We do recommend this place.

title: Great Hotel
text: This was my 3rd visit  and I was not disappointed. The staff were extremely helpful and courteous. I had an issue with my card: Yadira @ Eranny were so helpful & understanding & made me feel so welcome

title: Mr preet sagar
text: Location and cleaniness of hotel good. Room service  especially on call not so good. Staff deployed for cleaning not so good.Mr Toshi made our 5 days stay very comfortable.we are thankful to him for making our stay memorable. Best wishes for him

title: We loved everything about the hotel
text: The lobby of the hotel is gorgeous as we have seen in the pictures. The lobby smells nice and the hotel is very clean. They have complimentary coffee and most importantly they have toys for the kids. My kids loved the toys.

title: Great stay and great hotel
text: Everything from check in and check out for smooth. Came for only two days and we loved our stay. We had called the hotel in advance and spoke to Yasir about parking our car. When we arrived he personally showed us where the parking garage was and yet also helped us with bags. We recommend this hotel

title: Incredible!
text: Sam and staff were incredible. Beautiful hotel and excellent amenities. 5 stars for their excellent service and attention to creating a beautiful customer experience. Meredith was a pleasure to meet and to engage with throughout the check in process

title: Very beautiful hotel
text: Such a beautiful hotel. We felt like we were in a very high class hotel. The hotel was very clean, beautiful lobby. And room was very beautiful too. We really enjoyed the view from our room. Our stay was to celebrate my birthday. I’m glad we stayed at this hotel. The ladies at the front desk were very nice and polite . And because we had a special room they haves a bottle of champagne.

title: My birthday weekend
text: My friend planned a stay at Executive Hotel LeSoleil for my birthday. When we were to ready to go out Yasir greeted us and he was great, very helpful, friendly and he made us feel very comfortable.  He made us dinner reservations at Parlour room and we loved it. We are hoping to come back soon

title: Clean, Classy, Convenient
text: Girls trip for my daughter and me. The hotel was conveniently located for walking to many attractions. The street was quiet at night and the views of the city were lovely. Immaculate cozy room. Accommodating friendly staff. We would stay here again.

title: Amazing service !
text: The whole staff is super friendly they make you feel like home !  The hotel is well located, the service is excellent and warm. The rooms are nice and confortable, clean and well designed and equipped !

title: Awesome service will never pick another place again.
text: Andre and Sam help us out to the max of there abilities.  Super happy with the stay. Will definitely come back again for my business meeetings. Awesome room and with all the utilities needed to make us guess súper confortable

title: Late check-in Love
text: After having a terrible experience at the airport, I trotted into the lobby of this gorgeous hotel, to be greeted by Sam and then Nicole. The two of them at the front desk really cheered me up. And they made sure that my room was really nice and that I was all set up with complimentary bottles water! It just gave me a smile and made me feel a lot better after a rough day. Thank you!

title: Great hotel to stay in New York
text:
Great hotel in good location and affordable prices.  It’s in close proximity from all the New York touristy locations but not in the busiest area. 
Awesome service (concierge Sam was especially helpful). We would definitely recommend this hotel .

title: Nice view
text: Hotel rooms are clean and smells good. Hotel itself is gorgeous and the lobby is beautiful. We had a great room and view of Empire State Building. We were next to the elevator but didn’t hear any noise. We will be back

title: Management is phenomenal
text: I’m not sure how to start this but I’ll try my best to add everything. We came on Tuesday night and we had a long flight from Italy. We were with our family and the airline had lost our bags. We were very upset. We met Yasir and he was incredibly amazing and a saint. He treated us like we were his family. Our kids received toys and we had received toiletries and he checked on us everyday until we received our bags. We appreciate that great service.

title: Love the hotel
text: We enjoyed free coffee in the morning and then the cold drink in the afternoon. This hotel is spoiling all their guests. This was our first time visiting to city after a very long time and it was an amazing stay.

title: Great place for vacation in NYC
text:
We had some wonderful vacation days in NYC and could sleep very good in the hotel. The location was perfect to explore the Times Square, Empire State Building and many more sightseeing options.
We could clarify every question with the service team and manager on duty. Thanks again for this great time.
